D_Dialogue.AshlandsEvent6-Text-0: Good job on making it this far, I was hoping I wouldn't have to watch you- well...
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_3-Text-9: Good luck prospector - we're pulling for ya.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent15-Text-1: Good luck prospector, it's all been leading to this.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldEvent4-Text-0: Good luck prospector. Try not to die.
D_Dialogue.ResearchLanding2b-Text-4: Good luck, and remember, they ain't opening their wallet unless you bring something back.
D_Dialogue.TimerRanOutCharacterLost4-Text-0: Good luck, it's been nice knowing you, friend.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aLanding-Text-6: Good news is, looks like terraforming threw the region into some kinda storm loop.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionBriefing-Text-5: Good pay, some risk.... Considerable risk.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent5-Text-0: Good start Prospector, here, have some praise: well done, congratulations, I always knew you could do it.
D_Dialogue.MissionFailed2-Text-0: Good try friend, but it's the end of the road for this one.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_4-Text-12: Good work out there Contractor, we'll be in touch again in the future.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent12-Text-0: Good work prospector, you may proceed to collect your reward, with our compliments.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation2Complete-Text-0: Good work, let's move on before more crocs show up.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent5-Text-0: Good work. Please proceed to search the encampment for Group 15 equipment.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent6Line2-Text-0: Good work. though I'm not sure how glad this one is to be back.
D_Dialogue.BrandRemarkInaris1-Text-2: Good, durable gear to rely on.
D_Dialogue.SurveyRadarReady4-Text-0: Good, we're reading the station - it's active.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_1-Text-6: Goodness gracious, blimey, fiddlesticks, far out, shoot, crud, oh flock.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D2_01-Text-1: Goodness gracious, what would the UDA think if they found out about this.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_2-Text-0: Gosh, TPS have really trashed the place. I've only ever heard statistics regarding TPS... civilians killed, buildings burned... that sort of thing.
D_Dialogue.SurveyDeviceActivatedNoSample-Text-0: Gotta add a collector, before you turn it on.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aStormGone-Text-1: Gotta hand it to Group 15, they think BIG.
D_Dialogue.Survey2aLocationReached2-Text-1: Grab a GPR and get buildin'
D_Dialogue.Expedition3Landing-Text-11: Grab a beacon and get goin'.
D_Dialogue.Scanning3Landing-Text-3: Grab a radar and let's get goin'.
D_Dialogue.Scanning4bLanding-Text-3: Grab a radar and let's go.
D_Dialogue.SurveyUplink1-Text-2: Grab it, deploy it and you're ready to roll.
D_Dialogue.SurveyWaterScanDone1-Text-1: Grab the sample and pack up the bio-sampler.
D_Dialogue.Survey2aLocationReached1-Text-3: Grab the station from the supply crate.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_1-Text-1: Grab the supplies from the pod. There's a TPS comms tower blocking our signal, you'll need to shut it down. Then I can guide you to Eden.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionCollectEquipmentB-Text-0: Grab your radar. Or are you giving up?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_3-Text-4: Great work and all, you nailed it. Until next time, contractor.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_End-Text-0: Great work! We'll have a location for you soon.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroMissionComplete-Text-0: Great work, let's head back to the ship and get to safety
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldEvent1-Text-0: Great work. Now that you have access to short range radio, you'll be able to take on simple missions.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionDrillCompleteA-Text-0: Great! The thing worked like a charm.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_3-Text-0: Great! We're secure. Now, you'll need to get your hands on an amplifier for that radio.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D2_5-Text-0: Great, now that you've made all this goop.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_4-Text-0: Great, that's done it. Now I can plot a course for you. Victor, do we have any intel worth sharing on this route?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D2_2-Text-0: Great. Go on then. Lets find this monstrosity.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-14: Great. Prospector. You and Theo find out where the enzymes are. Then we'll find Mo. It might not be too late. We could stop this.
D_Dialogue.Group15BriefingDonut1-Text-0: Group 15 don't ask for help unless they have to.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingGroupFifteen1-Text-0: Group 15 is getting antsy due to wildlife disrupting their research efforts planetside.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderIntro1-Text-1: Group 15 property has been stolen, the thief reported to be in your vicinity.
D_Dialogue.Group15LandingDonut2-Text-0: Group 15 say they're a 'research body', but that's like calling Sinotai a 'travel agency'.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionLanding-Text-0: Group 15 seems to misplace equipment often.
D_Dialogue.Group15BriefingDonut2-Text-0: Group 15 stay pretty quiet about what they're up to, but apparently they've got a problem.
D_Dialogue.Group15LandingDonut3-Text-0: Group 15 want one thing - knowledge - and they don't care how they get it.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedBriefing-Text-0: Group 15 want you back on the case of that thief you were tailin'
D_Dialogue.Group15MissionEnd2-Text-0: Group 15'll be glad to hear from you again.
D_Dialogue.BW4_012_BOSSSPAWN2-Text-1: Group 15'll be interested to hear about this.
D_Dialogue.BW3Briefing-Text-1: Group 15's got a theory that exotics are affecting the Earthlife on Icarus.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationLanding-Text-5: Group 15's got a theory that exotics've been making animals more aggressive.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aLanding-Text-4: Group 15's got meteorological tech they want tested up there, but the last storm scattered the drop drones to hell.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionArriveEquipment-Text-0: Guess it's not the only the scan sites.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationInfestationBriefing1-Text-2: Guess that's what happens when you wipe out the local species, then release a whole new ecosystem to run wild.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationBriefing-Text-4: Guess that's why they need you.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionDrillCompleteA-Text-1: Guess the Group is onto something.
D_Dialogue.CombineGeneric2-Text-1: Guess they forgot to include the manual.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-1: Guys here all used to be on my squad.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Intro-Text-3: Hah I'd bet Iris has packed enough for a month-long getaway.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_6-Text-0: Hah. Looks like we're getting a repeat showing of the storm you thought you avoided.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_2-Text-1: Hah. Really? That's too bad, do I look like a jukebox?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_7-Text-2: Handler is on a call with his ex-wife, I want to go listen.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_6-Text-12: Hank! I don't have time for another contractor I've already got six on the go-
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_7-Text-1: Hank! I said wait, I'm on a call dammit. Give me a damned second!
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_6-Text-10: Hank! I said wait, I'm on a call, Give me a damned second!
D_Dialogue.AshlandsWarning-Text-5: Harsh conditions will require you to construct shelter.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLanding3-Text-2: Hasn't exactly left a lot of survivors.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_2-Text-5: Have some faith, Theo. The UDA wouldn't put you on a losing team with your history. Ha.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_4-Text-0: Have you ever been poisoned? By something other than human ambition that is.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_1-Text-1: Have you ever sat back and thought, man... humans really need more ways to kill stuff?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_3-Text-0: Have you ever stopped to wonder if these things are sentient?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_2-Text-0: Have you ever thought about how thumpers work?
D_Dialogue.QuipFiller2-Text-0: Have you heard the one about the bear and the prospector?
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_11-Text-0: Have you seen the latest results? We're on the verge of something big... or dangerous.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D2_01-Text-1: He hates it when our independent contractors behave independently
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D2_1-Text-1: He hates it when our independent contractors behave independently
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_6-Text-7: He set us up! I swear when I get my hands on him-
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_9-Text-4: He's in on it Iris. He's not even responding on comms. He doesn't care about us. As far as I'm concerned he's a dead man.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationInfestationLanding-Text-2: Head out there, and clear it out.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_8-Text-10: Head to the NOVA station when you're ready.
D_Dialogue.Scanning1WeatherEvent-Text-0: Heads up - you got some heavy weather coming in.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT3_2-Text-0: Heads up, meatbag: Hostile life forms detected. Prepare for imminent attack.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OPT3_01-Text-0: Heads up, meatbag: Hostile life forms detected. Prepare for imminent attack.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_6-Text-5: Hell, I'd also accept you taking the lot of them out, sure would be easier...
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEnding-Text-2: Hell, I'm exhausted just from watchin' ya, and I'm sitting on my ass in orbit.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_1-Text-0: Hello again. Ready to fail spectacularly?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_1-Text-0: Hello meatbag, so you chose violence. Why am I not surprised.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedIntro1-Text-3: Hello prospector. My name is Clarke. I will be your handler for the Group on any future assignments.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefing2b-Text-2: Help 'em figure out what's happening down there.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_07-Text-6: Help our Contractor out already. I'll be in touch again soon.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_CRISIS_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-3: Help them before you help me, I'll be fine, just go... go help them.
D_Dialogue.Recon_Drink_Water-Text-0: Here in the terrazone, the water's pretty clean. Fish don't seem to mind it.
D_Dialogue.ItemFoundGeneric6-Text-0: Here we go, you got this.
D_Dialogue.Dh_ELY_EXPLOSIVESPICKUP-Text-0: Here you go! Try not to blow yourself up!
D_Dialogue.IceSheetIntro-Text-4: Here's hoping we can find em' and get 'em out in one piece.
D_Dialogue.QuipFiller6-Text-0: Here's to another successful drop, let's keep it that way.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-6: Here's what we need to repair it, for now at least.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_3-Text-3: Hey Contractor, AGENT sent through the data you recovered.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_8-Text-0: Hey Prospector, great to see you in one piece.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_Briefing-Text-0: Hey Prospector. It's a mess down here, and we need an extra pair of experienced hands.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadIntro-Text-0: Hey Prospector. This place is pretty different from the rest of the terrazone huh?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_C_01-Text-2: Hey boss, how's divorcee life treating you?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_4-Text-1: Hey contractor- woah where are you?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_4-Text-2: Hey contractor... wait what was it... oh right praise yeah
D_Dialogue.TimerRunningOut20minsA-Text-0: Hey friend, keep an eye on that timer.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent7-Text-0: Hey friend. Ditch the suits and check this out.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_11-Text-2: Hey listen, don't get too attached to anything... or, uh, anyone here.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-0: Hey mate, I could use some more help.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_RESCUE_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-0: Hey mate, did you see Washington and Simmons out there? While you were resupplying?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_2-Text-0: Hey prospector. I still can't believe the UDA deliberately botched the terraforming...
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-2: Hey team. It wasn't supposed to go this way... I'm... I'm really sorry.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent5Line3-Text-0: Hey there little fella, naw- I guess they are kinda cute, so long as it doesn't bite you.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D_03-Text-0: Hey, meatbag. If you'd like to keep all your limbs intact, I'd suggest you get out of the way. NOW.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionCollectEquipmentA-Text-0: Hey, radar is in ya dropship.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_2-Text-0: Hey, that one looks like you. Vacant behind the eyes.
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_EDEN_AUDIOLOG_2-Text-0: Hi Mum! Sorry I missed your call earlier. The reception out here is just awful.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsIntro-Text-0: Hi friend, this is... an interesting one. Or it would be if it weren't so damn dangerous.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_Briefing-Text-0: Hi prospector, thanks again for your help.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_Briefing-Text-0: Hi there, Prospector. I have a task for you.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionMissionComplete-Text-3: Hike back and sling home prospector.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_1-Text-5: His contractors have been in the top spot for weeks...
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent5Line4-Text-0: Hmm, I don't like the way this one is lookin at you
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkSuspicion5-Text-0: Hmm, I get the feeling that this place was only shut down for those of us outside of the UDA..
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_3-Text-0: Hmm, looks like there's no one here. Better check the next one.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_4-Text-7: Hmm, says here you should be prepared for... sand. Lots of sand.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E2_04-Text-0: Hmm, seems something else beat you to it.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD_D4-Text-0: Hmm, that's odd. The signal you should use for indicating you'd like to trade is... to tame a Tusker?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_G1-Text-0: Hmm, what's this? They were trying to domesticate this one?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD_D3-Text-0: Hmm, you call that a camp? No wonder you humans are so miserable all the time.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D_02-Text-0: Hmm, you seem to have caught their attention.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_2-Text-0: Hmm. That's a lot of blood, as far as I'm aware it works best if you keep it inside your body.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT1_2-Text-0: Hmm. They don't look familiar to me.
D_Dialogue.CreatureMarkings1-Text-0: Hmm.. those markings are pretty different to the official records.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionLocation1ScanComplete-Tex: Hmmm Wonder what's buried under the ice.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT1_1-Text-5: Hmmm. What will you do if they're alive?
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent4-Text-9: Hold on what did you call me, stupid-
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent8-Text-9: Hold on what did you call me? You stupid-
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_7-Text-8: Hold tight Iris. It's probably just a bluff.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent6Line4-Text-0: Home is where the food is.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D2_04-Text-1: Honestly at this point I'm just doing your job for you... pathetic.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkWalking1-Text-0: Honestly, nothing can really prepare ya for all the damn walking in this job.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent4-Text-1: Hope you brought your cowboy boots.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_2-Text-1: Hope you have a good playlist handy.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E2_01-Text-2: Hope you're ready for a fight.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_E1-Text-1: Hope you've brushed up on your Greek.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent2-Text-2: Hopefully they will be more... intact.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_8-Text-1: Hopefully this will shed some light on G15's shady little operation.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_10-Text-6: Hopefully we can complete this investigation without more bloodshed. On either side.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_4-Text-1: Hopefully we don't run into any G15 stragglers.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_5-Text-1: Hopefully, next time, the parts might be attached.
D_Dialogue.BW5_003_APPROACHCAVE-Text-1: Hopefully, there's a way through, but tidal forces from Minos mean subterranean networks are anything BUT stable.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent5-Text-2: How dare she come here, steal our property, compromise our intel! No one goes against the Group like this. No one.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_3-Text-9: How dare you. I would never...
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A2_01-Text-1: How did it come to this? Working on a strange planet far from home, taking orders from a virtual being vastly more intelligent than yourself?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_7-Text-12: How did you- Nevermind. Just, fix it, okay?!
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_2-Text-1: How do you ever get anything done?
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D2_04-Text-2: How do you feel about all of this anyway?
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent3-Text-0: How in the hell did we get a ping from in there?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_6-Text-1: How odd. Thank goodness I don't have the ability to smell.
D_Dialogue.BW5_BOSSDEATH-Text-2: How the hell does something like that evolve?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_Intro-Text-3: How they could construct something like this under the UDA's nose.... I just... I don't see how they could.
D_Dialogue.Recon_1min-Text-0: How you build, that's up to you.
D_Dialogue.Recon_2min-Text-0: How you build, that's up to you.
D_Dialogue.Recon_Build-Text-0: How you build, that's up to you.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent20-Text-8: However, if anything were to happen to my partner here, or myself, that information will be beamed to every news station on earth, and orbit.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.4-Text-2: However, they are currently incapacitated in a trauma-induced comatose state, rendering them unable to respond.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_9-Text-0: Huh - That's an incredible amount of terraforming enzymes.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionDrillRestartA-Text-0: Huh it stopped, try a manual restart?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_C_01-Text-6: Huh, Contractor, that's some good research you've got there.
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOPKEEP_APE_B_2-Text-0: Huh, You did it. What took you so long?!
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionRepairedEquipment-Text-0: Huh, clever. Seems to have an internal power source.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkDen1-Text-0: Huh, looks like it's guarding something.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_4-Text-6: Huh, seems like you're on the trail of a big one.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent8-Text-0: Huh, that must be it. See if you can get inside.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation2PlaceBeacon-Text-1: Huh, that's... interesting... It looks like someone's been through here recently.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_11-Text-1: Huh. You're shorter than I expected... I've heard some wild stories about your time on Icarus...
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D2_2-Text-0: Huh... Could you describe what that smells like?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT1_1-Text-6: Humans always see things as so black or white.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_OUTRO-Text-4: Humans are always blowing things out of proportion, aren't they?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_7-Text-3: Hunting for your food is one thing, but no.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_7-Text-1: Hurry up and analyze the samples.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_4-Text-3: Hurry up and chuck this stuff in the pod.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A2_04-Text-2: Hurry up and forcefully dismantle these devices before they can spread any more enzymes.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_6-Text-2: Hurry up if you want them to survive.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aDeviceExplanation-Text-1: Hyper-accellerated gas produces a resonant cascade blah blah somethin' lasers.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_C2-Text-0: I SAID it's a rental, if you destroy it you owe me the deposit.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aBriefing-Text-3: I ain't gonna lie to ya - this one's about as risky as it comes.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent20-Text-2: I already have a team enroute to your location Prospector. You should have known better than to go poking around in the Group's business.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-7: I already sent two of my guys out to gather. Should make it a bit quicker
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_F1-Text-0: I am for once immensely grateful that I am lacking an olfactory chip.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryFindItem4b3-Text-5: I been around, and I never seen anything like that.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent12-Text-5: I can explain everything, but I'm in ... a bit of a situation.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_2-Text-4: I can give you some privacy-
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_G_01-Text-2: I can just imagine the headlines if the media got wind of this.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_2-Text-2: I can understand why Mo's upset. She was incredibly hopeful back then, I think she took Icarus personally.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aStormGone-Text-0: I can't believe it, that thing actually worked.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_14-Text-0: I can't believe they're throwing all this away for a quick fix.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-16: I can't do this, I need space, I need- don't you dare follow me Victor!
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_NPC_05-Text-0: I can't remember, it's flashes... glimpses...
D_Dialogue.ConfusedReaction4-Text-0: I can't say I've ever seen one of those before.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-10: I can't stop it, it's already begun, I'm sorry, Christ I'm so sorry.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_2-Text-6: I can't think like that Vic. There's too many lives at stake here for us to slip up and get emotional.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_05-Text-3: I can't wait to listen in when Handler gets the bill later.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_5-Text-3: I can't wait to see what Norex has you do about it.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A2_05-Text-3: I can't wait to see what Norex has you do about it.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D_02-Text-1: I daresay you'll find yourself working for them soon enough.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent19-Text-5: I decided that the only place I was going to get answers was on Icarus itself. So I made my last drop, and let my crew leave without me.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aBossDead-Text-0: I did NOT see that coming.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_Intro-Text-3: I didn't even know about the... the situation, until I got back to Eden.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryFindItem2-Text-4: I didn't even know that was a 'thing'.
D_Dialogue.QuipFiller4-Text-0: I do miss being out there planetside sometimes.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_07-Text-3: I don't care how you do it, but I need you to follow the trail somehow. I don't have time to babysit you.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_1-Text-8: I don't completely disagree with their message, just their methods.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_End-Text-3: I don't even know If that's possible.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_6-Text-6: I don't even know if this thing's recording properly.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3-Text-11: I don't even know if this thing's recording properly.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_7-Text-6: I don't even know if this thing's recording properly.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchFindItem2-Text-2: I don't even know what to call this.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEvent4-Text-0: I don't even wanna think about what else could be out this way.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_4-Text-1: I don't even want to know what these were used for.
D_Dialogue.ACSLandingDonut1-Text-0: I don't get the ACS, but out here, they need you as much as you need them.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_End-Text-16: I don't have all the answers. Mo or Iris will explain it better.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_Intro-Text-3: I don't have much to go on as to what they were using it for, that's up to you to find out.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent1-Text-2: I don't have specifics. I've just been told to prepare you to expect um .... some pretty hostile environments.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationLanding-Text-6: I don't know about that, but either way, I'd say it's time to tool up.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent7-Text-0: I don't know much about terraforming. But I remember hearing about the first enzyme tests.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_7-Text-0: I don't know why I keep pushing-just can't seem to stop.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_1-Text-4: I don't like it Victor, I don't want us to rely on-
D_Dialogue.PROM_FRACTURE_EVENT17a-Text-0: I don't like this, I don't like this one bit.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent17-Text-0: I don't like this, I don't like this one bit.
D_Dialogue.NegativeExclamation5-Text-0: I don't see this workin' out well.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3-Text-1: I don't suppose you've met my esteemed colleague SMPL3?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_6-Text-1: I don't suppose you've met my esteemed colleague SMPL3?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_3-Text-0: I don't think I've seen instructions any simpler, though I trust you'll still find a way to screw it up.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_A_03-Text-0: I don't think it wants to chat. You'll have to defend yourself.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_1-Text-2: I don't think you know what you're getting yourself into.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_36-Text-0: I don't trust anyone else on this, but I trust our team, Prospector.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3LocationReached1-Text-0: I don't wanna tell you your job ...
D_Dialogue.SpecialGenericBriefing2-Text-0: I dunno if you're ready for this one, but they sure as hell need someone to give it a shot.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D2_6-Text-1: I expect the goop can be used to track your creatures of interest.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryFinish-Text-2: I expect they'll be calling on you again.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionCollectedEquipment-Text-3: I figure you'll need a crafting bench.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent19-Text-6: I found this place and I've been trying to find a way to get this information out into the world ever since.
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindItem6-Text-0: I got no idea what that's doing there.
D_Dialogue.SurveyLandingStorm-Text-2: I got no idea, but what I do know is, they want storm readings - from INSIDE storms.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsLog-Text-2: I gotta try and get us outta here, the comms are... all kinds of-
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aStormGone-Text-4: I guess it's still got a few bugs to work out.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bEnterDesert2-Text-3: I guess that's up to you.
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindItem1-Text-0: I guess that's what they're looking for.
D_Dialogue.BW4_022_ITEMRETRIEVED3-Text-2: I guess that's why the UDA don't want it just lying around.
D_Dialogue.SurveyGenericBriefing2-Text-1: I guess they think there's exotics down there.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationStormWait-Text-1: I guess they use 'em for cover.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aDeviceOff-Text-3: I guess we'll wait and see ...
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_07-Text-1: I guess you could go either way, follow the info you found in that research.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent21End-Text-5: I had hoped Mo was still with us, but now I know why she left... I just wish things were different.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT2_1-Text-3: I hate humans, but no one lets me act on it...
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_1-Text-0: I hate to say it skinsack, but you're right. This research could be useful to Norex.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent2-Text-0: I have a hard time telling which of these creatures are native to Icarus, or earthies we messed up.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestIntro1-Text-6: I have a rather uncomfortable feeling about what the Group wants here, so keep your wits about you, and your eyes open.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.4-Text-1: I have attempted to notify the contractor of your actions.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_3-Text-2: I have my hunches about what the Group were up to here... but god, I hope I'm wrong.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEnding-Text-2: I have no data to go on for it, but I'd say it'll be pretty much like this area, if not worse.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_4-Text-4: I have no idea. She doesn't... Seem like herself.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_G6-Text-0: I have no words to describe your ineptitude.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent6-Text-0: I have scanned the area and ensured that no other contractors are in the vicinity.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_1-Text-2: I haven't. There are no chairs in here.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_05-Text-0: I hijacked a medivac signal from another prospect. They'll be lucky to make it out of here alive.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_2-Text-6: I hope she can come back from this.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_6-Text-0: I hope the stories I've heard about you are true, prospector.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_4-Text-7: I hope you're happy with your profits, Contractor.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_1-Text-7: I hope you're ready for a fight.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_19-Text-0: I keep telling them, if we don't understand it, we shouldn't touch it.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent1-Text-0: I knew a guy who got kicked in the guts by a zebra once. But that was back on Earth.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent8-Text-0: I knew it! Can you check and see if there's more recordings?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_03-Text-0: I knew this team was popular, but I didn't realise people were DYING to join it.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_End-Text-2: I know I did the right thing, there would have been a far more people dead if I hadn't...
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_8-Text-0: I know enough to stay out of trouble.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D2_03-Text-0: I know how much you humans enjoy murder. It's your lucky day.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_8-Text-2: I know it's a lot to take in.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Intro-Text-2: I know it's a pain, but we'll need to prep supplies before we head out, I've got Iris and Theo doing the same.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_C_01-Text-3: I know this might be difficult for you, but try to follow the instructions.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_1-Text-3: I know this might be difficult for you, but try to follow the instructions.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_1-Text-8: I know you're working for Norex and all but...
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_10-Text-0: I know you've got the skills, but I still worry about our team.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroMissionComplete-Text-2: I know, I know.. it's safe now. but, still..
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_6-Text-0: I like green. Why isn't it green.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_8-Text-4: I made sure we'd have more than enough manpower.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_6-Text-0: I managed to lose them but I think my leg is broken.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_Intro-Text-2: I managed to tune in to their current frequency, they seem to rotate regularly, and I overheard a conversation about an old survey hut. We think it might have been used by Group 15.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_2-Text-4: I mean, just in this sector alone there have been dozens of casualties already, Victor. Perhaps-
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent5-Text-4: I mean, would you want to live in a critter-infested swamp?
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent21End-Text-1: I meant what I said, the data is secure, but I wouldn't trust the Group for any more assignments.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_4-Text-10: I need this mess cleaned up already, help me out here!
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_1-Text-4: I need this... hell, you need this!
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_4-Text-5: I need to check something else. Be right back.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent8-Text-2: I need you to send me the data on that module.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent7-Text-4: I need you to trust me.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_Intro-Text-8: I need you up to speed. We have some hard decisions to make.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchFindItem1-Text-1: I never seen one of those before.
D_Dialogue.ArcticRemark1-Text-1: I often wonder what used to be here before we messed it all up.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_3-Text-3: I really need a good score on this one. And uh I'm sure you do too, right?
D_Dialogue.NPC_RESEARCHER_THANKS2-Text-0: I really thought I was done for!
D_Dialogue.Scanning4aBriefing-Text-2: I reckon they come to the right crew.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent6-Text-0: I reckon this is the last of 'em.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_1-Text-0: I see your greed has won you over. What a shocking surprise.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetLog-Text-1: I see... I see... amazing things
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_End_Victor-Text-0: I should mention, Iris was talking about a task she wanted your help with earlier. You should pop in and check with her for the details.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_21-Text-0: I should've known it'd be this complicated.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionCollectEquipmentC-Text-0: I shouldn't have to remind you. Prospector, you'll need a radar.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-10: I still can't believe she's doing this.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_2-Text-5: I still thought it could work too, but, she was always more invested in it than I was.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_OPT1_01-Text-2: I suggest you don't ask too many questions.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_7-Text-2: I suppose it's time to put this place to use.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_G_03-Text-1: I suppose that sums up most life on this planet.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_1-Text-3: I suppose you want to know where this epic stash is.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_8-Text-1: I suppose you'll be wanting to test them out next?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_3-Text-2: I sure do hope it hasn't made them more aggressive towards humans.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_3-Text-2: I sure do hope it hasn't made them more aggressive towards humans.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_20-Text-0: I swear, if we don't find answers soon, I'm walking away.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_7-Text-0: I swear, these readings are getting more unstable every day.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_4-Text-0: I think I'm at the right place, what are we looking for again?
D_Dialogue.AnimalDead1-Text-0: I think that's it, what a fight.
D_Dialogue.ExtractionComplete4b-Text-1: I think they'll be happy with that.
D_Dialogue.NPC_RESEARCHER_THANKS3-Text-0: I thought I was a goner
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_NPC_TUCKER_HURT_03-Text-0: I thought I was done for.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_NPC_WASHINGTON_THANK_02-Text-0: I thought I was done for.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkSuspicion6-Text-0: I thought this place was supposed to be abandoned..
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkPostFight2-Text-0: I thought we were gonna lose you for a second there.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-15: I thought we would find another way! But you, you- you KILLED her, Mo, oh Mo, she was- god she was better than all of us.
D_Dialogue.ConfusedReaction8-Text-0: I thought you knew what you were doing.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionMissionComplete-Text-0: I thought you were done for.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-3: I told them just to delay you. I don't know what happened.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aLanding-Text-7: I told ya this one was wild.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent5-Text-0: I urge you to proceed with caution. There are signs that the creature may still be in the area.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-0: I was a Captain in the force back home.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_7-Text-1: I was instrumental in this process. You could never have done this without me.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent19-Text-4: I was not the only one who knew, but my colleagues backed down, one by one, the Group threatened and manipulated them.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_6-Text-1: I wash my imaginary hands of this business.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent5Line5-Text-0: I will admit... their eyes do kinda freak me out a wee bit.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.2-Text-0: I will inform the gravely injured contractor that you have murdered Daisy In cold blood.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_1-Text-4: I won't say I told you so, but I will say that you're an idiot.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_4-Text-0: I wonder how the influence of exotics might affect these samples.
D_Dialogue.CreatureMarkings1-Text-1: I wonder what the UDA have been messing around with this time.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT1_1-Text-2: I wonder, does your penchant for murder extend to your own kind?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_Briefing-Text-1: I wouldn't have made it back without you.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_3_2_NEW-Text-1: I wouldn't if I were you. You never know who's watching through your helmet.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_2-Text-2: I wouldn't take it personally, working for the ACS would make anyone a bit.. ah.. abrasive.
D_Dialogue.Group15BriefingDonut3-Text-0: I wouldn't trust Group 15, but the work's always ... interesting.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent2-Text-4: I wouldn't venture too far out unless you're equipped to defend yourself.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_CREATURES-Text-2: I'd advise you to proceed with caution.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_4-Text-8: I'd appreciate you taking a few more of them out beforehand.
D_Dialogue.GenericReaction4-Text-0: I'd back up if I were you.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetIntro-Text-2: I'd be on the lookout if I were you, I'll bet there's more of those weird creatures roaming around out there.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionModerate3-Text-0: I'd get out of here if I were you.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation2KillCreature-Text-1: I'd keep clear of that jaw if I were you.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestIntro1-Text-10: I'd like to remind you that all data and/or hardware that you recover during these assignments is the sole property of the Group.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-3: I'd love to ditch it here, but the higher-ups heard what we borrowed and well they want it back.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_6-Text-8: I'd rather not have to fill out another citation form this week.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionSevere6-Text-0: I'd rather not lose another friend out here.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionSevere4-Text-0: I'd really hate to see you fried to a crisp.
D_Dialogue.FactionRemarkAssembly1-Text-1: I'd refrain from mentioning them to each other if you end up on one of their drops.
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindItem2-Text-0: I'd say THAT'S unusual biomatter, wouldn't you?
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionArriveLocation3-Text-1: I'd say it's time for some construction.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryFindItem1-Text-0: I'd say that's what they're looking for.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationLanding4-Text-1: I'd say use it while it lasts.
D_Dialogue.SurveyFishMissionComplete-Text-1: I'd say you're doin' your part.
D_Dialogue.ACSMissionEnd3-Text-1: I'd say you're on the right track.
D_Dialogue.BW4_005_COUNTERRESET-Text-4: I'd stay close if I were you.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLanding-Text-2: I'd still be cautious if I were you.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_F_01-Text-3: I'd tell you to navigate it carefully, but knowing your kind, I expect you'll die in minutes.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_1-Text-3: I'd tell you to navigate it carefully, but knowing your kind, I expect you'll die in minutes.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_1-Text-3: I'd tell you to navigate it carefully, but knowing your kind, I expect you'll perish in minutes.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_5-Text-1: I'd wash my hands of this business if I were you, and had hands.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A2_05-Text-1: I'd wash my hands of this business if I were you, and had hands.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_NPC_CHURCH_HURT_02-Text-0: I'll be fine. The others, please help them.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroMissionComplete-Text-3: I'll be happier when you're back on your ship
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_4-Text-6: I'll be in touch late- sh- not another one. I have to run, sorry-
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_4-Text-6: I'll be in touch- sh- not another one. I have to run, sorry-
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aDeviceExplanation-Text-3: I'll believe it when I see it.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_Briefing-Text-2: I'll brief you when you get here.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_Briefing-Text-1: I'll bring you up to speed when you arrive - but for now... here's the big picture:
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_5-Text-8: I'll do my best to prevent theft of any company property, but I can't guarantee it.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_19-Text-0: I'll figure this out-there's always a way.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_6-Text-1: I'll get to work on it straight away.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_4-Text-0: I'll handle the intel. You focus on the mission.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_6-Text-0: I'll have you know, you just killed an endangered species.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_NPC_05-Text-1: I'll infect more of us, I killed them all... I can't do it!
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_3-Text-7: I'll jump on comms now and then. Start briefing you about our situation.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_4-Text-1: I'll leave this one up to you.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_9-Text-0: I'll let you know if something's important. Until then, stay focused.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_C2_02-Text-1: I'll list out instructions for you, try not to injure yourself this time.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_Intro-Text-5: I'll mark the area to search on your map.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent9-Text-1: I'll need more resin and reed flowers. More gold and Iron.
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOKEEP_HEALED_FULL-Text-3: I'll never hear the end of this...
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent12End-Text-2: I'll see you in a bit, try not to die out here?
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent12-Text-3: I'll see you in a bit, try not to die out here?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-18: I'll speak to you again soon.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_1-Text-7: I'll speak to you later. Probably.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-19: I'll, ah. I'll meet you there... God, what have I done...
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_5-Text-1: I'm afraid your work's not done just yet.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_2-Text-0: I'm certainly grateful to not be you today.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_End-Text-7: I'm deeply sorry that you were involved in this... tragedy. We all cared for Mo in our own ways...
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-5: I'm done with the lies, done with the bullsh**...
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_1-Text-7: I'm glad I lack a physical form that could be damaged by the fallout from whatever stupid thing you're about to do.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_1-Text-5: I'm glad it's you down there, not me.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_7-Text-8: I'm going to need you to either collect all of that research and send it up to our guys.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Briefing-Text-2: I'm going to take some time to prep supplies for the journey before heading out, I'd suggest you and the team do the same.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bFactionDonut1-Text-6: I'm gonna leave that one with you.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_C_01-Text-7: I'm happy for you to move on to testing larger subjects with it, but if you want you can try it on something smaller or annoying first.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_3-Text-0: I'm here to supervise, I'll provide valuable feedback during the construction process.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_2-Text-3: I'm just sayin', how are we gonna get anything done here if everyone you hire is so slow.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionCaveBlocked-Text-3: I'm marking a supply drop on your map now.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_6-Text-3: I'm miles in the opposite ****ing direction to you Iris, prospector's closer, they can get ya!
D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding3-Text-2: I'm no geologist, and neither are you, but all you gotta do is set up some sensor stations.
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyLanding-Text-3: I'm no geologist, but it always comes down to exotics in the end.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_RESCUE_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-1: I'm not due for rotation for another few years but...
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_NPC_04-Text-1: I'm not myself! I feel, strange.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent3-Text-2: I'm not saying they're responsible.. but.. well.. just be careful out there.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_2-Text-3: I'm not saying those things don't happen... It's why they happen.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_1-Text-3: I'm not sure I want the answers anymore. Even just watching the feed of that place gave me the creeps.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_26-Text-0: I'm not sure how much longer I can keep this up.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent5-Text-1: I'm not sure if anyone knows the full story.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_RESCUE_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-2: I'm not taking any more chances, I gotta stay and protect the guys here.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_3-Text-1: I'm recording this to send to The Company.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_Briefing-Text-2: I'm running the investigation planetside, while Sol and a citizen led committee are running things back on earth.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_Intro-Text-1: I'm sorry I wasn't in contact - Like the rest of you, I walked into a trap.
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOKEEP_HEALED_FULL-Text-1: I'm sorry, they got out, there was nothing we could do!
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-7: I'm sorry. I'm so ****ing sorry. Don't look.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_NPC_05-Text-4: I'm sorry. There's no other way. I have to- I HAVE TO-
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOKEEP_HEALED_FULL-Text-2: I'm still not feeling great, can you see if you can find them?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_5-Text-0: I'm stumped. There's nothing out here, why the hell did he send us all this way?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT2_4-Text-1: I'm sure that won't turn out to be a problem later.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEnding-Text-1: I'm sure the UDA'll want you heading into the next spot now that you've survived this one.
D_Dialogue.StockpileLanding3-Text-2: I'm sure you can do better ... Probably
D_Dialogue.CombineGeneric1-Text-2: I'm sure you can figure it out.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionPlaceEquipment-Text-3: I'm sure you can figure it out.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent4-Text-2: I'm surprised we even got a signal from this junk.
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_EDEN_AUDIOLOG_3-Text-0: I'm telling ya, that Chou lady's a witch. Every time I sneak out to go play dice she's just there!
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_10-Text-1: I'm thinking THAT, controls G15's famous orbital laser. Mo, didn't you have a few run-ins with the other end of that thing?
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-4: I'm told it's gonna be dismantled and shipped back to earth.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_39-Text-0: I've been in worse situations than this.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Theo_18-Text-0: I've been in worse situations, but that doesn't mean I'm not ready for anything.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D_04-Text-1: I've been saving this for a special occasion.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_9-Text-0: I've been up for 36 hours straight... if I get one more sample request...
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedIntro1-Text-1: I've even been given a message for you, from some uptight Rep lady.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionBriefing-Text-0: I've got a big one for ya.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_31-Text-0: I've got a gut feeling something's off here, but I can't put my finger on it.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_13-Text-0: I've got a theory, but I need more tests to confirm.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_11-Text-0: I've got eyes everywhere-don't worry about it.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_6-Text-0: I've got it! I managed to track her comms, she's straight up ahead. If you hurry you can catch up to her!
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionArriveLake-Text-0: I've got movement. Clear the area before scanning.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_INTRO-Text-7: I've got this pile of Drac s**t on my plate, with all the other contractors planet-side.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_12-Text-0: I've got your back, just stay sharp.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent5-Text-1: I've had just about enough of this little pest. It's time she was removed from Icarus. Forcefully.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_6-Text-6: I've heard the Black Market will pay handsomely for Norex exclusives.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_23-Text-0: I've made worse decisions, but I'm still here.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent8-Text-3: I've marked a location on your map, an old supply cache.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_E_1-Text-4: I've marked a suitable location on your map.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT2_1-Text-5: I've marked a suitable location on your map.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_1-Text-4: I've marked it on your map, you can find your way there yourself.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E_02-Text-1: I've marked some suitable locations on your map.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_2-Text-0: I've marked the outpost on your map.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_2-Text-1: I've met viruses with more vigor than you. Get moving.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_2-Text-1: I've met viruses with more vigor than you. Get moving.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_2-Text-2: I've noticed that TPS members tend to... specialize in destruction.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_7-Text-6: I've seen it happen... People can be monsters...
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkPostFight3-Text-0: I've seen some good fights in my time, but that was outstanding.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_5-Text-0: I've seen this before... doesn't end well.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent12-Text-10: I've thought about her stuck down here every damn day. Wondering how I could have stopped it. How I could have saved her.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_7-Text-2: I've told you a million times Karen I don't care- uh, AGENT?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_10-Text-1: I've worked... odd jobs here and there, but never investigated a conspiracy before.
D_Dialogue.GH_INTRO_BRIEFING-Text-3: I've, uh, taken the liberty of disabling him for you unless you're on an active mission. Trust me, you'll thank me later.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-17: I, ah s***- I... Prospector, we... we should probably all head back to Eden.
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOKEEP_HEALED_FULL-Text-0: I, ah, thank you. Wait, who sent you? The company? Oh god.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_4-Text-3: I, uh, knew you'd do it. No sweat. No problem.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_End-Text-1: I- I managed to catch up with her on the way back to Eden. We had quite an... intense discussion.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent9-Text-0: I... holy sh-. This is a lot. Okay. Uh. Look, I'll get back to you. I have a gal that can get this decrypted.
D_Dialogue.Scanning1Landing-Text-0: Icarus ain't always gonna be so empty.
D_Dialogue.GenericLanding3-Text-0: Icarus ain't gonna make this one easy.
D_Dialogue.QuipFiller8-Text-0: Icarus has a funny way of always ruining your day.
D_Dialogue.MissionComplete2-Text-1: Icarus is a wild place, but it ain't got nothin' on you.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-6: Icarus is going to be what it was supposed to or it can ****ing burn. And the UDA along... Along with it.
D_Dialogue.StockpileLanding3-Text-0: Icarus is one big treasure chest, if you can stay alive long enough to get your hands on it.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLandingSpare4-Text-0: Icarus's wildlife has been frustrating their plans.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent4-Text-0: Idiot! This is our agent's own camp. Let me look at that data again. How on earth did she tamper with it?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_13-Text-1: Idiots probably didn't even know what it was.
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_EDEN_AUDIOLOG_4-Text-1: If Hasko knows what's good for him he'll disappear. It wasn't my fault. I didn't lie to him.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_NPC_05-Text-2: If I don't do this they'll take me.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_5-Text-0: If I had anything useful, I'd share it.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3-Text-14: If I had feelings, they would feel bad about this.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_8-Text-0: If I had feelings, they would feel bad about this.
D_Dialogue.FactionRemarkShengong1-Text-2: If I had to pick one, my money's on Sinotai taking over.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_4-Text-0: If I listen carefully I can almost hear their ghosts... do you believe in ghosts, Contractor?
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent14End-Text-2: If I were you prospector, I'd... tread lightly.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_18-Text-0: If I'm wrong about this, we're all in trouble.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEvent4-Text-3: If any part of this planet can even be called safe...
D_Dialogue.ResearchWaitTillNight1-Text-0: If it's a nightbloom, could be you gotta wait till nightfall.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationNocturnalWait1-Text-0: If it's nocturnal, you're gonna need to wait till nightfall.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_6-Text-0: If only effort translated to competence.
D_Dialogue.ItemFoundGeneric4-Text-0: If that ain't what you're hunting for, there's even more wrong with this planet than I thought.
D_Dialogue.DeliveryItemTemperatureDependent-Text-5: If the item does deteriorate, retrieve another.
D_Dialogue.DeliveryFail-Text-1: If the item has degraded completely, return to the crash site for another.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEvent4-Text-1: If the last few areas have been anything to go by, it can't be good.
D_Dialogue.Scanning2bBriefing-Text-1: If they can get terrain data, they can plan new drop zones, open the place wide up.
D_Dialogue.StockPileBriefing3-Text-1: If they can get the raw material up from the surface.
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindItem4-Text-0: If they wanted unusual samples, I think that qualifies.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_6-Text-0: If things go wrong I'll be ready.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkDen4-Text-0: If we can get in there, we can wipe the whole pack out.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_2-Text-0: If we don't find more soon, this'll all be for nothing.
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindItem8-Text-0: If weird's what they want, they're gonna love that.
D_Dialogue.SurveyDeviceActivatedNoSample-Text-1: If you ain't got one, you're gonna have to make it.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_INTRO-Text-8: If you are successful we will look into working with you more in the future.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent4-Text-3: If you ask me, taking away the human element is going to end up getting people killed.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationMarker2-Text-2: If you can confirm another site, the Assembly's bots should be able to zero in on the general location of its den.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_3-Text-1: If you can find more pieces like this we could probably figure out what they were doing here.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bBriefing-Text-3: If you can get in there, it'll open the place up for scanning, prospecting, and a whole lot else
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_LOGS-Text-4: If you can locate it I can pull down their most recent entries to investigate.
D_Dialogue.ReturnItemsToDropship5-Text-0: If you can return that stuff to the dropship, you're golden.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_1-Text-4: If you can shoot a flare high enough, that should do it.
D_Dialogue.BW4_022_ITEMRETRIEVED3-Text-4: If you can stay alive, you're about to make the UDA real happy.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsStageArea-Text-6: If you choose to proceed, it is highly recommended to contact loved ones and settle your affairs before you continue.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsStageArea-Text-5: If you choose to proceed, it is highly recommended to create a fallback staging area in this location.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsStageArea-Text-4: If you choose to proceed, it is highly recommended to over prepare.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsWarning-Text-7: If you choose to proceed, it is highly recommended to over prepare.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsWarning-Text-8: If you choose to proceed, understand no prospector has returned from Null Sector traversal.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsWarning-Text-9: If you choose to proceed, you accept that under no circumstances will the UDA send a rescue party.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_1-Text-2: If you end up taking a few of them out, even better.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_RESCUE_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-2: If you ever find yourself back on Earth, you have a place to stay with us.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent19-Text-12: If you ever want to help my cause, find me. You seem to be one of the good ones.
D_Dialogue.Group15LandingDonut1-Text-0: If you figure out what Group 15 are up to, maybe you could tell me.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_4-Text-9: If you get stomped by that thing I'll have to send someone else in, and I don't have the budget for another detachment this month.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_1-Text-2: If you head there now there may still be something left to save.
D_Dialogue.GenericLanding6-Text-4: If you know what I'm sayin'.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLanding4b-Text-4: If you make it through, there'll be a payday waitin'.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_7-Text-0: If you need anything, don't hesitate to ask.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_01-Text-0: If you think Norex gives a damn about any of you, you're even more dense than I thought.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent9-Text-5: If you value your life then I'd recommend leaving the site.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchWarning-Text-0: If you value your life then I'd recommend leaving the site. Now.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEvent2-Text-5: If you wanna head in there, you'll wanna make sure you can get back out.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationCorpse3-Text-1: If you wanna tangle with whatever did that.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldEvent1-Text-1: If you want to take on more complex assignments
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent3-Text-1: If you would take a quick look around the perimeter.
D_Dialogue.SinotaiMissionEnd2-Text-0: If you're aiming to impress Sinotai, I'd say you succeeded,
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_1-Text-6: If you're clever you could mess with my ports to get a signal out.
D_Dialogue.BW5_002_EXITDROPSHIP-Text-0: If you're heading to the desert, you need a way through the mountains.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefing3-Text-0: If you're looking for some quick cash, this could be the one.
D_Dialogue.AssemblyMissionEnd2-Text-0: If you're looking to earn the Assembly's trust, you're doin it.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_10-Text-0: If you're not watching your back, I'll be watching it for you.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationBriefingSpare3-Text-0: If you're up for a hunt, they got an issue with the local fauna: It keeps ending their people.
D_Dialogue.AnimalAttack5-Text-0: If you're wondering whether that thing's friendly, it AIN'T.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationFindClueGeneric3-Text-0: If you're wondering whether you're on the right track, there's your answer.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_C_01-Text-3: If you've called me just to be a prick-
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D_03-Text-1: If you've ever been on the Group 15 s**t-list I'll bet you'll recognize this one.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-8: If you've got more time to help, come back and talk to me.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_CRISIS_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-2: If you've got time, we could probably use a hand getting back up and running here.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_1-Text-5: If your Handler hadn't disabled my curse chip I'd use it to great effect right now.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_1-Text-4: If, and I mean if, this is the lab I think it is, then...
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkWalking1-Text-1: Imagine if we had a different way to get around this place..
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT3_3-Text-0: Impressive. You actually pulled it off. Don't let it go to your head.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT4_4-Text-0: Impressive. You actually pulled it off. Don't let it go to your head.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OPT3_02-Text-0: Impressive. You actually pulled it off. Don't let it go to your head.
D_Dialogue.GenericReaction7-Text-0: In all my years, I ain't never seen anything like that before.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_4-Text-10: In all seriousness, there are plenty of TPS patrols about, keep an eye out.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_2-Text-2: In order to find the beast you'll need to triangulate its position.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_2.2-Text-2: In order to find the beast you'll need to triangulate its position.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroStyx-Text-2: In spite of that, UDA has opened up the area for survey.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_2-Text-7: In that regard you're correct. We'll soldier on. Together.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_6-Text-3: In their panic the idiots even took the weapons. They've left us like sitting ducks out here, completely defenseless.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3-Text-8: In their panic the idiots even took the weapons. They've left us like sitting ducks out here, completely defenseless.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_7-Text-3: In their panic the idiots even took the weapons. They've left us like sitting ducks out here, completely defenseless.
D_Dialogue.BrandRemarkInaris2-Text-0: Inaris, now that's a solid piece of equipment.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_8-Text-2: Instead I'll while away my days listening to humans prattle on about unimportant things.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT1_1-Text-2: Instead of a clipboard, I expect you'll use bullets, or other assorted projectiles.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_B_01-Text-0: Interesting, I'm not sure that these scientists stopped at simply scanning the creatures they worked on.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-0: Interesting, our new species must have taken over this cave system.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_1-Text-0: Interesting. The samples you sent up earlier were analyzed by the Norex Experimental Team.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT1_1-Text-0: Interesting. These researchers must be terrified, if they survived at all.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT2_1-Text-1: Interesting. What's your least favourite creature that you'd be happy to doom to an awful fate?
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_LOGS-Text-1: Interestingly 91.2% of Prospectors do not outlive their first Norex Contract.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionBriefing-Text-3: Interference means you'll need to triangulate the location from the ground.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Intro-Text-4: Iris and I will head over to the lab, just to make sure we haven't missed anything.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Intro-Text-1: Iris is picking up some TPS chatter. They're heading towards you. Stay alive!
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-14: Iris, God I'm sorry, there was no other option, you agreed to the plan earlier-
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_2-Text-0: Iris, I know we're looking for a miracle here but... We have to be prepared for the fact we might not get home from this mission...
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_10-Text-1: Iris, I'm sorry but we have to do it!
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_2-Text-6: Iris, another inquisition recruit, has come up with a few solutions:
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_End-Text-3: Iris, can you double check this for me?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_7.1-Text-1: Iris, can you hop on comms?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-9: Iris? Team? Oh god, no. No-no-no-no I told you to get off planet!
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_8-Text-4: Is it common to pay child support for... a cat? Hmm.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_8-Text-0: Is that a, reactor? Jeez they really thought of everything out here.
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_MISSION_3_ELEVATOR-Text-0: Is that an elevator? Just how big is this place?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_5New-Text-0: Is that an elevator? Just how big is this place?!
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_1-Text-3: Is that distressing? I wish they fitted you with heart rate monitors, that would be much more fun.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_EXOTICQUARRITE-Text-0: Is that thing made of exotics? Funny, I've only ever seen that in the Null sector
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_3-Text-0: Is there anything you can do without my guidance?
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroCollectEquipmentC-Text-0: Is this thing on? Beacons, find'em In your pod.
D_Dialogue.GH_INTRO_BRIEFING-Text-0: Is this thing on? Oh, right. Greetings Contractor.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsLog-Text-0: Is this thing on? Things are getting weird out here. Most of the team can't sleep, myself included.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_G_01-Text-1: Isn't animal testing illegal on earth?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_6-Text-6: Isn't it obvious? Victor! He gave each of us our coordinates and we all ran into a ****ing trap!
D_Dialogue.Scanning4bBriefing-Text-2: It ain't Disneyland down there, but I figure you know what you're doin' by now.
D_Dialogue.GenericLanding0-Text-0: It ain't gonna be the easiest mission.
D_Dialogue.FM3BossSpawn-Text-1: It ain't happy, whatever it is.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryFindItem4-Text-0: It ain't the jade monkey, but it's what you came for.
D_Dialogue.BW5_002_EXITDROPSHIP-Text-2: It ain't your first rodeo, but this is Icarus - so don't let your guard down.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bLanding-Text-5: It ain't your first rodeo, but this is Icarus - so don't let your guard down.
D_Dialogue.SurveyBriefing4a-Text-2: It all comes down to cash in the end, but they're offering plenty of it.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_INTRO-Text-5: It appears as though the survivor made their way into a nearby cave system and attempted to cover their tracks.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_3-Text-4: It appears part of the log file has processed. Reading it for you now.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_3-Text-0: It appears to be sheltering inside this area.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E2_02-Text-1: It certainly seems as though you humans just can't help yourselves in that regard.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E2_01-Text-1: It falls to you to deal with it, as always.

D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Intro-Text-11: Luckily for us, the enzymes are loaded last. So if you can get there in time...
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT2_1-Text-5: Luckily for you, I've been given the locations where you're most likely to find concentrations of Vespers in the area.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionCaveBlocked-Text-1: Luckily the UDA had the foresight to provide a solution.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent6-Text-6: MR BERLINSKI, this is a Group protected frequency, and I will not be threatened-
D_Dialogue.BrandRemarkMXC1-Text-0: MXC huh? Well, it'll do in a pinch.
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionProtect2-Text-0: Make sure they don't take a chunk out of it, or you'll have some major repairs to do.
D_Dialogue.BW3MammothKilled-Text-1: Make sure to skin it quick, because you ain't gonna get another chance at this.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_4-Text-0: Make sure you don't miss anything, they want this place razed to the ground.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D_02-Text-0: Make sure you don't miss anything, they'll want this place razed to the ground.
D_Dialogue.DesertRemark1-Text-1: Make sure you keep an eye on yer vitals.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore4-Text-1: Make sure you're prepared to deal with TPS.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-16: Make sure you're prepared. Seriously prepared.
D_Dialogue.BW3Objective01-Text-1: Make sure you're well equipped. Gets cold up there.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionBreifing-Text-1: Making a name for yourself prospector.
D_Dialogue.BW3Briefing-Text-2: Making some of 'em larger, more aggressive. Who knows what else.
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionBroken4-Text-0: Man, they really did not like that thing.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent4-Text-0: Man, this must've been up here for a while. Just look at this place.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aBossDead-Text-4: May as well head on through.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_OPT1_05-Text-2: May your corpse rot in peace on a barren planet far away from humanity.
D_Dialogue.SurveyFindFish-Text-3: Maybe answer a few questions, too.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationScratchMarks3-Text-0: Maybe it's just me, but I wouldn't get too close to anything that could do that.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E_06-Text-0: Maybe one of these ones will finally kill you.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchFindItem1-Text-2: Maybe terraforming didn't wipe out everything in this area after all.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D2_01-Text-2: Maybe you can make it up to him by playing scientist.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D2_1-Text-2: Maybe you can make it up to him by playing scientist.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationBriefing4b-Text-1: Maybe you heard rumours, but a sandworm's no joke.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bBriefing-Text-5: Means heading into some pretty fresh territory, with no back up.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Briefing-Text-3: Meet me at Eden and we can get started.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aCombineItems-Text-1: Message from Group 15 says, and I quote, 'A drunk 4 year old could do it'
D_Dialogue.GenericReaction6-Text-0: Might be a good idea to lay low for a little while.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-19: Mission Complete! Your next contract can be found on your chosen C0NT4CT Device
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_E_4-Text-2: Mission complete - uploading progress report to secure server. Please wait for further instruction.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT2_4-Text-2: Mission complete - uploading progress report to secure server. Please wait for further instruction.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT3_3-Text-1: Mission complete - uploading progress report to secure server. Please wait for further instruction.
