D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_END-Text-0: Mission complete - uploading progress report to secure server. Please wait for further instruction.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_3-Text-11: Mission complete. Your next contract can be found on your chosen C0NT4CT Device
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_End-Text-4: Mo wants to see you as soon as possible.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Intro-Text-6: Mo was going to lead this one but... I told her I'd handle it.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_4-Text-5: Mo, hi, sorry. I was, uh, busy.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_End-Text-4: Mo, while clearly driven to extremes by her anger, was a source of hope for many.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bFoundFragment4-Text-2: Moral of the story: don't drop into unmapped territory.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_5.2-Text-0: More TPS. Keep your head attached.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_10-Text-0: More blood on his hands, that backstabbing bastard.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEvent3-Text-7: More importantly you'll be able to manually map out a path through the area.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT3_1-Text-1: More murder for the meatbag, marvelous.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT4_1-Text-1: More murder for the meatbag, marvelous.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore1-Text-5: More recently, the UDA had mostly wiped them out. Then our news of the Icarian Genocide broke.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_4-Text-1: More survey huts, buildings and such. Hopefully we can find some that haven't already been looted out here.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_3-Text-1: More than I can say for you
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_LOGS-Text-3: Most mining outposts have a data center where their logs are kept.
D_Dialogue.FM4Finish-Text-1: Most of Icarus is a still a blank on the map.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent12-Text-3: Most of the Group 15 goons don't last that long, you did pretty well.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore1-Text-10: Most of them aren't bad people. You've seen what it's like on Icarus. It's gruelling, there's death around every corner.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_2-Text-3: Most of them work for the UDA. Pesky, pesky meatbags.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_3-Text-0: Most of us have been here for a couple of months now, you're the last one to arrive.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent6-Text-4: Mr Berlinksi, how did you connect to this frequency?
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent18-Text-1: Mr Berlinski, I really must insist-
D_Dialogue.BrandRemarkGroupFifteen1-Text-0: Must be Group 15 tech you've got there.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkDeadProspector4-Text-0: Must have been caught in a storm.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkDeadProspector3-Text-0: Must have been here for a while.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkDeadProspector6-Text-0: Must have been out here alone.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionMissionComplete-Text-1: My data feed no longer says redacted
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent8-Text-4: My function is to guide you through basic assignments for the UDA. Communication is one way.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent4-Text-4: My function is to guide you through basic assignments for the UDA. Communication is one way.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_3-Text-0: My intel shows that TPS are mostly using drones now due to all the casulties out here.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_CRISIS_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-2: My team are badly injured, and we ran out of food and water days ago.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_10-Text-2: NO. No-no-no-no. No! I won't do it-
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Intro-Text-1: Nasty spot, it'll be quite the trek to get there.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore3-Text-3: Naturally, there was a fair amount of interest about why they would keep an entire sector to themselves.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_11-Text-5: Never hurts to be too careful with enemies around every corner.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLanding-Text-3: Never know what's lurking out there.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBriefing4a-Text-1: Never made it to their supply drops.
D_Dialogue.BW3Objective01-Text-5: Never underestimate Icarus. Not if you wanna live.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_4-Text-2: Nevermind, I don't have time. I have more data for you.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryLanding-Text-1: New Larkwell gear - a tool, a weapon, they're not saying.
D_Dialogue.DeliveryItemTemperatureDependent-Text-3: New enzyme terraforming technology could change the face of Icarus.
D_Dialogue.SurveyBriefing3b-Text-1: New lifeforms finding their way into the terrazone.
D_Dialogue.MoveToNextLocation4-Text-1: Next marker should be on your map.
D_Dialogue.MoveToNextLocation5-Text-1: Next step's marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent6Line3-Text-0: Nice and safe. Well, for Icarus anyways.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation3PlaceBeacon-Text-0: Nice job, you're a natural at this stuff.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEndingA-Text-0: Nice work, sounds like your paycheck just arrived.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent8-Text-0: Nice work, this thing should help us stay in touch in the future.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent7-Text-0: Nice work, though I wish you didn't have to use it.
D_Dialogue.Scanning1ScanComplete3-Text-2: Nice work, time to head home.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionCollectDrill-Text-0: Nice, a Drill like this will get through almost anything.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation1Complete-Text-0: Nicely done, not even a scratch.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent12-Text-0: Nicely done, okay let's crack this thing open and-
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent6Line1-Text-0: Nicely done, you made it back safely.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_1-Text-7: No Hank! I told you we cant provide medivac for downed contractors. They know what they're getting themselves into.... Well sometimes they do.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-2: No Victor, I won't do it, I can't!
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEvent3-Text-1: No matter what they try from orbit, they just can't get a clear picture of what's down here.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_16-Text-0: No one's safe here, not really.
D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding3-Text-1: No prizes for guessing it relates to exotics somehow.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_NEW_2-Text-0: No respect for them, even in death?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_End-Text-1: No this can't be right. We would have seen this when we started terraforming
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryFindItem2-Text-5: No wonder they want it back.
D_Dialogue.TimerRanOutCharacterLost3-Text-0: No! Dammit. You're on your own now prospector.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_12-Text-0: No, No! They can't seriously be doing this.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_NPC_03-Text-0: No, no! Get away from me.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_4-Text-8: No, of course you wouldn't... AGENT?
D_Dialogue.IceSheetLog-Text-5: No, we have to stay... we have to-
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingAny5-Text-0: No-one else will take this job.. that's why they're askin' you.
D_Dialogue.Group15MissionEnd1-Text-0: No-one knows exactly what Group 15 do, but they're gonna be pleased with you.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLandingGeneric2-Text-0: No-one's claimed the crash, which can only mean one thing ...
D_Dialogue.ResearchLanding3-Text-2: No-one's quite sure what's happening down here, but there's top dollar on data right now.
D_Dialogue.ResearchLanding3-Text-1: Nocturnal plants, mineral oddities - you name it.
D_Dialogue.MissionComplete11-Text-1: Nope, I reckon this one's just about over.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_INTRO-Text-2: Norex would like to extend an offer. Please note this is not a UDA-approved contract.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3Landing-Text-0: Normally, Lagos'd get their own people to open up new areas.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationBriefing5-Text-4: Not a lot of folk have survived this far.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLanding4b-Text-1: Not a lot of folk raising their hand to tangle with a sandworm.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_11.1-Text-0: Not a single one left alive, what a waste. Prospector, check the room for evidence before you move on.
D_Dialogue.TimerRanOutCharacterLost2-Text-0: Not another one. Why couldn't you just-
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT2_2-Text-0: Not content with the murder of individuals, you're now going to murder entire families?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_7-Text-1: Not elegant, but then neither are you.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionLanding-Text-2: Not even a single blip from an active radar.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent4-Text-6: Not like I've been here since pretty much the start of Icarus operations, but damn there's no way the Underwhelming Department of Assholery could feed that bot enough information. People are gonna die getting this chrome potato up to speed.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingLagos1-Text-1: Not much of a brief here, seems a bit shady but hey, that's Lagos for ya.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent8-Text-5: Not much of a replacement then? ...Bucket of bolts.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_1-Text-4: Not on yourself, sadly. Though it wouldn't be the first time...
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent18-Text-3: Not people. This information is classified, you do not have Group clearance to discuss such-
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_2-Text-3: Not something I'd know anything about.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent11-Text-0: Not sure if this has been brought up before, but we have a new way of doing things now.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_1-Text-10: Not that I expect you to find any of them alive, but we have to keep up appearances, don't we?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_6-Text-4: Not that it matters, our bullets just bounced right off of them.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3-Text-9: Not that it matters, our bullets just bounced right off of them.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_7-Text-4: Not that it matters, our bullets just bounced right off of them.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_C2_01-Text-1: Not that you'd have a job if it weren't for me.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_1-Text-1: Not that you'd have a job if it weren't for me.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_1-Text-1: Not that you'd have a job if it weren't for me.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_F_01-Text-1: Not that you'd have a job if it weren't for me. If I could sigh, I would.
D_Dialogue.GenericReaction1-Text-0: Not to be rude but, that doesn't seem like the best idea.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_5-Text-0: Note to self: order a new Geiger counter. Second note: do not lend out Geiger counters...
D_Dialogue.RelocatedIntro-Text-4: Nothing like a nice walk to get ya going.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent5-Text-0: Nothing. Well... it seems like we'll have to take matters into our own hands.
D_Dialogue.BrandRemarkLM1-Text-2: Now I hear they've been reduced to using Shengong's scraps.
D_Dialogue.SurveyWeatherStationReady-Text-1: Now all we need's some weather.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionRepairedEquipment-Text-1: Now get that laser on site.
D_Dialogue.ReturnItemsToDropship1-Text-0: Now get that stuff back to the Dropship.
D_Dialogue.BW3Objective03-Text-1: Now get that thing back to the dropship.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent6-Text-3: Now hang on just a second, Prospectors aren't guns for hire. You think we'd do anythi-
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOPKEEP_APE_B_1-Text-3: Now hurry, if the UDA finds out about this we're both done for.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aEnterRegion-Text-2: Now it's ice, rock, chasms and caves.
D_Dialogue.ResearchAllItemsFound-Text-2: Now just get it to the cargo pod, and you're good.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkMidfight3-Text-0: Now might be a good time to run.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent20-Text-4: Now now, let's not be rash about this.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation1PlaceBeacon-Text-1: Now that that's outta the way, time to mark the spot.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_8-Text-2: Now that you're armed with that delightful tidbit of knowledge we can proceed to the next hunt.
D_Dialogue.BW3Objective02-Text-2: Now they need you to kill it, so they can find out what the hell exotics are doing to them.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryBriefing-Text-3: Now they want their toy back.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationLanding-Text-1: Now they're looking to change that, but local wildlife's been making problems for their survey teams.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_6-Text-2: Now you can craft even more of those horrible things, how fitting.
D_Dialogue.AfterRetrievingItem-Text-0: Now you got it, how about finishing the job?
D_Dialogue.CombineGeneric2-Text-0: Now you gotta put it together.
D_Dialogue.GenericGetItemsToCargoPod1-Text-0: Now you just gotta deliver it to the cargo pod.
D_Dialogue.LocationReached3-Text-1: Now you're gonna need to search the area.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_2-Text-1: Now you've had a nice little stroll, search the area for the faca- facil- the ****ing entrance.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent10-Text-0: Now, Sinotai have come up with a fancy new way of shipping your exotic hauls off-world.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent11-Text-1: Now, Sinotai have come up with a fancy new way of shipping your exotic hauls off-world.
D_Dialogue.GenericLandingSuspicious1-Text-0: Now, before you say it, I know, bio-research.. what the hell does that even mean?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_01-Text-3: Now, head on out and follow those beacon signals already.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBodyFound-Text-1: Now, you gotta carry her back.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent16-Text-1: Now. Let's find whatever Mo needs us to find.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-6: Now. You have a choice. I have two urgent reports.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldEvent1-Text-8: O.E.S. Schematic should be available, if ya want to build one.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldEvent3-Text-0: O.E.S. Schematic should be available, if ya want to build one.
D_Dialogue.GenericLanding6-Text-3: Odds are on you, but this is still Icarus.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_INTRO-Text-5: Of all things... mate... the bloody manufacturer wants to display it in their HQ!
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionFoundWall-Text-0: Of course it's blocked. Think this would be easy?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_4-Text-0: Of course they couldn't just leave it unguarded. I hope your data is worth it Iris.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT1_1-Text-1: Of course, humans love to research with murder as their main method.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D2_03-Text-0: Off we go, ready to kidnap an unsuspecting child.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT2_1-Text-2: Oh I know. Vespers. Everybody hates Vespers.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_8-Text-0: Oh I would hate to be a courier.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-6: Oh and uh, one last thing.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_OPT1_01-Text-3: Oh and you'll be expected to thin out the numbers along the way.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkAngry1-Text-0: Oh boy, that one looks angry.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D_04-Text-0: Oh come on, don't look so surprised.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_3-Text-0: Oh god, I could barely watch that.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent18-Text-8: Oh god, is that a child? I think I'm gonna be sick.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_E3-Text-0: Oh good, I mean, look out.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D2_7-Text-0: Oh great, your research has run off.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D_04B-Text-0: Oh great, your research has run off.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionTeenageWorms-Text-0: Oh hell, no, that's not okay.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT3_1-Text-0: Oh joy, you're back. I can hardly contain my enthusiasm.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT4_1-Text-0: Oh joy, you're back. I can hardly contain my enthusiasm.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_G7-Text-0: Oh look, it got out. Perhaps its favourite food is actually human flesh. Wouldn't that be fun?
D_Dialogue.AnimalAttack4-Text-0: Oh man, that's some ANGRY wildlife.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent15-Text-0: Oh man. I guess this is the 'little friend' she was talking about.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_1-Text-0: Oh meatbag! Your penance isn't over yet my little murderer.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_4-Text-0: Oh my, they have been busy. Messing around with enzymes were they?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A2_04-Text-0: Oh my, those scientists have been busy. Messing around with enzymes were we?
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent7Line4-Text-0: Oh no, that one was my favourite... :(
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent7Line1-Text-0: Oh sh- you better go get the rest of 'em
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent18-Text-11: Oh sure, I'd like to see you survive the toxic hell we dumped on Icarus.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkWalking1-Text-2: Oh well, dreams are free I guess.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent10-Text-3: Oh will you shut up with all that crap.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_End_Theo-Text-0: Oh yeah, Iris mentioned she had something she wanted your help with. I have more important things to do though, so you should run along and see what she needs.
D_Dialogue.BW4_004_ACTIVATESATTELITE1-Text-1: Oh, I forgot to mention that.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldEvent2-Text-0: Oh, almost forgot, one last thing.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent19-Text-0: Oh, friend? I found another file in the data we decrypted. Playing it for you now.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_9-Text-0: Oh, hi there, Prospector! Nice to meet you, I mean, properly, in person of course. I'm Iris.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryFindItem4b2-Text-0: Oh, it's one of those ... whatever it is.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_E_3-Text-0: Oh, the device that was used to hurt and control creatures has made them want to eat you.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT2_3-Text-0: Oh, the device that was used to hurt and control creatures has made them want to eat you.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_FOUND_LOGS-Text-0: Oh, they're corrupted. Of course they are. This couldn't be easy could it?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_3-Text-0: Oh, those are usually... inside the caves?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_3-Text-0: Oh, those must be your new friends.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_3-Text-0: Oh, those must be your new friends.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D2_7-Text-9: Oh, uh well that's great. Why are you calling me? Can't you just deal with it?
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_EDEN_AUDIOLOG_3-Text-1: Oh, we don't gamble in this unit Theo. Oh, that's not behaviour befitting of a soldier of your rank, Theo.
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOPKEEP_APE_B_1-Text-0: Oh, yes, hello again. Our research is in shambles out here, if we don't deliver then Norex- I mean, THE COMPANY won't process my contract.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_End-Text-0: Oh. S***. MO! Mo you need to see this.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_4-Text-0: Oh. So that's what they meant by unpredictable behavior.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroScoutLandingZones-Text-1: Oh. The UDA also requires you to clear the immediate area, did I... forget to mention that?
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionFindBlockage-Text-0: Okay I'm being told UDA has you sorted.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aDeviceAssembled-Text-0: Okay it's ready, but something like that needs shelter to function, or the storm's gonna tear it apart.
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionSetUp1-Text-0: Okay just get that thing set up quickly.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent3-Text-0: Okay let's see here, says you can activate their trackers by using some sorta terminal.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT4_2-Text-0: Okay meatbag, time to hit one with your spicy bullets.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_E1-Text-0: Okay meatbag, you'll need to conduct tests in three different environments.
D_Dialogue.BW3Objective01-Text-0: Okay, Group 15 wants that mammoth. But it's a long way to the mountains.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_3-Text-10: Okay, I gotta go. Corporate are on my ass about- ah nevermind, uh, good luck out there.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_7.1-Text-3: Okay, I think that should open it.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_7.2-Text-2: Okay, I think that should open it.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore1-Text-0: Okay, briefing time. Let's start with TPS. The People's Syndicate.
D_Dialogue.GenericLandingExploring2-Text-0: Okay, let's get this show on the road.
D_Dialogue.AfterCombiningCollectedItems-Text-0: Okay, let's put that thing to some use.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionRecoverEquipment-Text-0: Okay, lets see what Group 15 has in store for us.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bDrillFuelled-Text-0: Okay, looks like that sucker's ready to go.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_07-Text-0: Okay, looks like you've found some leads! Uh, nice work.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionSevere2-Text-0: Okay, now is not the time to go exploring.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Intro-Text-0: Okay, right, I can see your location!.
D_Dialogue.ScanComplete3-Text-0: Okay, that's it - scan's finished, we're clear.
D_Dialogue.MissionComplete2-Text-0: Okay, that's it - you did it.
D_Dialogue.ItemFoundGeneric1-Text-0: Okay, that's what we're looking for.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroScoutLandingZones-Text-0: Okay, time to find some lovely spots for landin' a dropship.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryFindItem1-Text-0: Okay, you found part of their device, whatever it is.
D_Dialogue.SurveyReachLocation2-Text-0: Okay, you made it to the sample zone.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestSolBeg4-Text-0: Okay. I get it. I'll quit nagging. But I need you to do this.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_Intro-Text-1: Okay. The data has given us a... rough location - some partial schematics.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionFindLake-Text-0: Okay... got a general heading. Bots are confirming...
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_5-Text-0: Okay... um more bad news. If the terraforming fails, which... as you know, is very likely.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroOly-Text-0: Olympus. Closest we came to successful terraformin'.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_3-Text-0: On closer inspection, this seemed like an intelligent being.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation1Complete-Text-1: On the beacon that is, can't say the same for you.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadIntro-Text-3: On the topic of not working, I have a brand new bit of experimental garbage for ya.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionBriefing-Text-4: On top of that we've had reports. Uh I'm not sanctioned to share until you're on planet.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionAverage3-Text-1: Once saw a prospector cooked in their suit.
D_Dialogue.AssemblyLandingDonut2-Text-0: Once the Assembly got Africa working together, nothing could stop 'em - and now, here we are.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_3-Text-1: Once we get you settled in we can start doing some real digging.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT1_1-Text-5: Once you get a few tracked we'll be able to narrow down the ones from the lab.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.4-Text-3: Once you have concluded stealing from your dying compatriot...
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.6-Text-2: Once you have concluded stealing from your dying compatriot...
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_3-Text-3: Once you manage to get a link online to us...
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyBriefing-Text-2: One area in particular's really got their attention, exotics most likely.
D_Dialogue.BW4_017_ENTERZONE3-Text-0: One more warhead, then we can all sleep tight ... till the next time UDA loses one of their toys.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_1-Text-1: One of our contacts at the UDA heard that we had a contractor in place near that doomed outpost.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_3-Text-7: One of our personnel didn't show for their afternoon shift.
D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding3b-Text-0: One of their advance teams reported new marine organisms in the region.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchBriefing-Text-2: One of their bot satellites detected unusual bio-patterning, and their xeno-research arm's got curious.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefing2b-Text-0: One of their forward teams reported unusual bio-material in the region, whatever that means.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderIntro1-Text-9: One of their satellites picked up a signal from the stolen tech. Location marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent6-Text-1: One of your fellow contractors has been severely injured, and returned to orbit for treatment.
D_Dialogue.ItemFoundGeneric11-Text-0: One thing Icarus does better than anywhere else.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationSandwormMarker1-Text-1: Only one thing could've made that.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD_D4-Text-2: Only one way to find out, I guess.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_E_4-Text-1: Only one way to find out.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT2_4-Text-1: Only one way to find out.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_7-Text-0: Oooh. Contractor, another log file is available. Enjoy some background noise.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_3-Text-6: Operations were halted by an incident at around 1300 today.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_5-Text-1: Or even if it does succeed. There's an unsettling high chance of a... I don't even know what to call it.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestBriefing-Text-1: Or in this case, people. A whole team has dropped off the radar.
D_Dialogue.BW4_005_COUNTERRESET-Text-2: Or maybe the arming circuits took a few hits coming down.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroOly-Text-6: Or move gear and resources from orbit to planet ... and vice versa
D_Dialogue.PromNomadIntro-Text-5: Or move gear and resources from orbit to planet ... and vice versa
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroStyx-Text-6: Or move gear and resources from orbit to planet ... and vice versa.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_1-Text-3: Or rather, what went wrong with it.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionLanding-Text-4: Or some people would think that. *nervous laugh* not me of course.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D2_02-Text-1: Or were you just planning on throwing the poor beast directly into a pod?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_2-Text-3: Or you could also go charging in guns blazing.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_5-Text-0: Or you could just blow them up I guess.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_7-Text-9: Or, completely wipe it from the face of the planet.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_07-Text-2: Or, track down those tagged experiments.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_7-Text-5: Or, you can go on a homicidal rampage and take out a bunch of those new creatures you've been sighting for us.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-8: Or... A swarm of our newer friends have been sighted in a local cave.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefing4b-Text-1: Orbital image analysis shows unusual geoforms in the region.
D_Dialogue.BrandRemarkInaris1-Text-1: Otherwise known as that company that built the space elevator.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestBriefing-Text-3: Otherwise we'll be sending someone else to get you as well.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aDeviceExplanation-Text-3: Oughta cut right through any amount of ice and snow in your way, though.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_2-Text-0: Our Engineering team use a different network to us.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedIntro1-Text-4: Our analysis of your performance confirms your viability as a potential partner to the Group.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionLanding-Text-3: Our best guess is they never made it to the scanning sites.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestIntro1-Text-9: Our forecast indicates that weather may be an obstacle.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureIntro-Text-1: Our forward team has discovered a trail, the suspect is in this area. We believe they may be wounded.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Intro-Text-9: Our only hope is that you get there before they launch the payload.
D_Dialogue.AnimalWarning1-Text-1: Our tech tends to aggravate those little guys.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEnding-Text-3: Out this way, it pays to be prepared for anything.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_4-Text-10: Override. Wipe all log records. Erase verbal history for this job ticket.
D_Dialogue.Recon_Consume_Oxygen-Text-0: Oxite. Just another minor miracle brought to you by the weirdest planet in the spiral arm.
D_Dialogue.Scanning1ScanComplete1-Text-2: Pack it up, and head out.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_5-Text-2: Package that stuff up and get it here now, don't waste any more time.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLostTeamBodiesBriefing-Text-2: Parents are big players, and they'll pay anything to get her body back.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT1_3-Text-2: Pathetic. At least now you don't have to deal with them being a problem.
D_Dialogue.DeerRemark1-Text-1: Pays to be extra cautious around them.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_1-Text-2: People never do... though at least it's not yours. Hmm, but surely now you're at least an accessory.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_2-Text-4: Perhaps they can shed more light on your rather... sticky situation.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OPT3_02-Text-1: Perhaps you can put this in your nonexistent dating profile.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_1-Text-0: Phew! You made it.TPS can be quite a handful.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_2-Text-8: Placing the Beacon should give us your location, and then I can guide you to Eden.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestSolBeg1-Text-0: Please Prospector. I wouldn't ask you if it wasn't important.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_BRIEFING-Text-1: Please accept the request at your earliest convenience.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_7-Text-0: Please check the map for your next location.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_19-Text-0: Please deliver the contents to the O.E.S nearby.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.2-Text-3: Please do not murder the tomato.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_NPC_SIMMONS_HURT_03-Text-0: Please don't. Don't let me die out here.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_11-Text-0: Please note, there may be hostile wildlife in the surrounding area.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_10-Text-0: Please note, this area contains high concentrations of chemicals toxic to humans.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.7-Text-1: Please place it in the O.E.S pod for retrieval.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent2-Text-0: Please proceed to the last known location of the criminal. You'll find it marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_3-Text-1: Please proceed with caution, if you even know what that means.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_18-Text-0: Please reinstate the scanner to progress.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent7-Text-3: Please return to your previous objective and place the sample in the O.E.S pod when ready.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.1-Text-2: Please return to your previous objective and place the sample in the O.E.S pod when ready.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent6-Text-5: Please, please save Daisy. She's saved me more times than I can count. It's the least I can do for her
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroSRR-Text-1: Plenty of folks need help, and factions pay well for prospectors that offer their time.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent1-Text-1: Poor Barry was never the same afterwards...
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_3-Text-1: Poor things, subjected to such experimentation and cruelty.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_3-Text-1: Poor things, subjected to such experimentation and cruelty.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionBriefing-Text-2: Powers that be want more information and to open up that slice of terrazone for development.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionBriefing-Text-2: Preliminary data gives us only a rough idea where.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureBriefing-Text-1: Prepare to drop everything and follow their trail immediately.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent7-Text-1: Pretty volatile... By design.. trying to rework a planet.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_4-Text-1: Probably best to wash your hands afterwards.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroOly-Text-1: Probably the safest place on Icarus... uh... but that's not sayin much.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_8-Text-9: Probably time to give your experiment a field test.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent2-Text-1: Probably wanna clear this place out before bringing the herd back here.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3EnterRegion1-Text-3: Problem is, no-one knows exactly how exotics are affecting this place, or how any of it's gonna develop long term.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_5.3-Text-0: Prospector - TPS are headed your way.Show them what you're made of.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_End-Text-0: Prospector, I- she's refusing to talk to me, I'm sorry.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_OUTRO-Text-0: Prospector, Norex were clear that they were only willing to pay full price for the scientist if he were still alive and/or mostly in one piece.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_1-Text-1: Prospector, Theo and I will be on comms to provide assistance.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_CRAFTING_A-Text-0: Prospector, a new crafting mission is available.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_DEFENSE_A-Text-0: Prospector, a new defence mission is available.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_EXTERMINATION_A-Text-0: Prospector, a new extermination mission is available.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_RECOVERY_A-Text-0: Prospector, a new recovery mission is available.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_RETRIEVAL_A-Text-0: Prospector, a new retrieval mission is available.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_SCANNING_A-Text-0: Prospector, a new scanning mission is available.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_STOCKPILE_A-Text-0: Prospector, a new stockpile mission is available.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_1-Text-0: Prospector, are you alright? I thought we'd lost you!
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent8-Text-0: Prospector, can you hear me? I'm transmitting direct via encrypted short wave, got a neat trick to get it through the upper atmosphere.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_29-Text-0: Prospector, hope you're settling in well.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionLeavingScanningAreaE-Text: Prospector, need you to get back to the radar.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchBriefing-Text-0: Prospector, the Group has every reason to believe that we have located the safehouse of our suspect.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Briefing-Text-0: Prospector, this is it. We've got their location.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_22-Text-0: Prospector, this is not the correct location.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureBriefing-Text-0: Prospector, we believe the suspect is sheltering near your current location.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Briefing-Text-0: Prospector, we've gathered a few more locations of interest from the lab data.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_7-Text-3: Prospector, welcome to The Eris Inquisition.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_STOCKPILE_B-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with amassing a stockpile of various resources from the surrounding area.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_SCANNING_B-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with completing a terrain scan in the surrounding area.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_CRAFTING_C-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with crafting a select number of items for UDA exclusive use.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_EXTERMINATION_C-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with culling the numbers of local wildlife to an acceptable level.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_DEFENSE_B-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with locating and protecting a fallen piece of UDA orbital equipment.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_CRAFTING_B-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with locating and repairing a piece of malfunctioning equipment.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_RECOVERY_B-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with locating and retrieving a cache of supplies valuable to the UDA.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_RECOVERY_C-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with recovering an item considered valuable to UDA personnel.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_RETRIEVAL_B-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with retrieving the dogtags of a fallen contractor.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_EXTERMINATION_B-Text-0: Prospector, you have been tasked with the extermination of a creature corrupted by exotics in the area.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_INTRO-Text-0: Prospector, you have received a work order. I will read you the content of the request.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_9-Text-2: Prospector, you have to get there before TPS does. If they drop those enzymes... I'm not sure what will happen.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestIntro1-Text-8: Prospector, you may start at any time. Final contact with our staff has given us multiple possible locations.
D_Dialogue.PROM_FRACTURE_EVENT17b-Text-0: Prospector, you must leave this area at once.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent17-Text-1: Prospector, you must leave this area at once.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Intro-Text-0: Prospector. After sifting through all the data from the lab, it appears there's a few more locations worth investigating.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_Intro-Text-0: Prospector. I heard you're responsible for saving Iris... Thank you.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_Briefing-Text-0: Prospector. I need you to come talk to me. ASAP.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureIntro-Text-0: Prospector. We have need of your services once again.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_7-Text-0: Prospector? How the hell did you- Nevermind. Hurry up and get inside before someone sees you!
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent1-Text-0: Prospector? You're gonna need that chip, that O.E.S pod should be around here somewhere.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT1_3-Text-0: Prospectors, and researchers are very different creatures aren't they?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_2-Text-0: Prototype technology is prototype for a reason.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3EnterRegion1-Text-4: Question is, is Icarus gone ... or just restin'?
D_Dialogue.TimerRunningOut5minsB-Text-0: RUN. Get the hell outta there!
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionLanding-Text-6: Radar can be found in your dropship.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionCollectEquipmentB-Text-0: Radar is in your dropship. Go grab it.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionLanding-Text-4: Radar is in your dropship. Make sure to bring it along.
D_Dialogue.ExtractionRadarShowsArc1-Text-0: Radar's sayin' there's something in that direction.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionCollectEquipmentC-Text-0: Radar's still back at your ship.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_INTRO-Text-2: Radio comms have been scattered and patchy at best. The last check in mentioned some form of unrest... ah... Undocumented wildlife...
D_Dialogue.BW5_009_RADARSTOPPED-Text-1: Reactivate the radar ... when you get a moment!
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_4-Text-4: Ready yourself for a fight. I'll transmit your location to The Company momentarily.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_End-Text-4: Ready yourself for a fight. I'll transmit your location to The Company momentarily.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_4-Text-4: Ready yourself for a fight. I'll transmit your location to The Company momentarily.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Intro-Text-14: Ready yourself prospector, let's move out.
D_Dialogue.FTUE_Weather-Text-1: Real storm's are bad news if ya ain't got a roof over ya head.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_OPT1_04-Text-0: Really? You want to honor his last wish?
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionBriefing-Text-0: Received a new work order. A big one.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLandingSpare3-Text-1: Recent site's on your map - good luck.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aEnterRegion-Text-3: Regardless, UDA wants this place for prospecting.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aDeviceExplanation-Text-1: Releases a burst of infrasonic sound, supposed to disrupt the storm cell, break it up.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetIntro-Text-3: Remember, chain those trail beacons and you'll have a shot at making it back outta here.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT2_1-Text-3: Remember, the UDA is always watching.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionCollectEquipmentA-Text-0: Remember, there's a Scanner in your dropship.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_5-Text-0: Reminder: Do not forget your supplies.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionComplete-Text-3: Report immediately to medical if showing these symptoms -
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_4-Text-0: Rescue missions are not my speciality.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT1_1-Text-0: Research and observation is the key to any investigation.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent6-Text-1: Rest assured, this will not stain your public record with the UDA. Only you and I will know the particulars of this assignment.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.5-Text-3: Return to your objective and escort the organic transport.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.3-Text-2: Return to your previous objective and place the sample in the O.E.S pod when ready.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.4-Text-4: Return to your previous objective and place the sample in the O.E.S pod when ready.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.6-Text-3: Return to your previous objective and place the sample in the O.E.S pod when ready.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent10-Text-5: Ridiculous? Ridiculous is believing a single bloody word you lot say.
D_Dialogue.Recon1Briefing-Text-5: Right now, it's about learning to survive on the surface.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLanding4b-Text-0: Right now, you're on your own.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadBriefing-Text-1: Right on the fringe, where the terraforming started falling apart.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadBriefing-Text-1: Right on the fringe, where the terraforming started falling apart.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_1-Text-0: Right, You've chosen destruction. Not surprising.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D2_04-Text-0: Right, we're online. The location has been marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_7-Text-3: Right, where was I, oh yeah so you've got another choice to make.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEvent3-Text-6: Rinse and repeat. We should be able to get a signal between beacons so we can stay in contact.
D_Dialogue.RecoverySEUseDeviceAgain-Text-0: Run it again, this thing's got full ACS encryption.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_5-Text-2: S***- What the hell was that?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_4-Text-0: S***. It's so much worse than we thought!
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent9-Text-6: SMPL3 will provide various missions, not just tomato-based activities.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent9-Text-6: SMPL3 will provide various missions, not just tomato-based activities.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT2_1-Text-2: Said safe location will be marked for you.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBriefingGeneric2-Text-2: Salvage law's good, even out here.
D_Dialogue.RecoverySEInteractPod2-Text-0: Same story - it'll need juice if you want to open it up.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent4-Text-10: Sample quality and composition will be used to calibrate A.P.G. for future assignments.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_C_01-Text-0: Sandra for the last time he needs the gluten-free kibble or else-
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_5-Text-3: Save yourselves, get out of there! I won't ask again.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation1PlaceBeacon-Text-0: Saw a prospector try to pet one of those once. Didn't take kindly to the attention.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent11-Text-1: Say you wanna order some shiny new gear from the workshop up there?
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent11-Text-7: Say you wanna order some shiny new gear from the workshop up there?
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_B_03-Text-0: Says here you should capture one alive. Hah. Good luck.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_2-Text-2: Says here you should make a Research Monitoring Station so that you don't blow yourself to smithereens.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedIntro-Text-1: Says here you'll have to creep up on 'em so as not to spook 'em.
D_Dialogue.ScanComplete2-Text-0: Scan complete, data received, looking good.
D_Dialogue.ScanComplete7-Text-0: Scan's all done, friend, and the data's uploaded.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_1-Text-1: Scientists seem to be getting in over their heads, even worse than you prospectors these days.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bLocationReached3-Text-1: Search it out if you can.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent7-Text-2: Search the corpse for any valuables to be returned before you leave.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_2-Text-2: Security is tight for a reason at Norex. There are many nosey people out there.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D2_7-Text-12: See if we can provide you with more information.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E2_04-Text-1: See if you can find a trail to follow.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_G1-Text-2: See if you can find any research left behind.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationMarker3-Text-4: See if you can find its den ... and end this.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_5-Text-1: See if you can muster up some coordination and hit something with those.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_3-Text-2: See if you can push them back.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bLocationReached1-Text-1: See what you can turn up.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedIntro1-Text-0: Seeing as how you did so well last time, Group 15 want you back on the case, Sherlock.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT3_1-Text-4: Seeing how your conscience certainly won't.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT4_1-Text-4: Seeing how your conscience certainly won't.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderBriefing-Text-1: Seems like Group 15 have a thief on their hands
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_4-Text-1: Seems like a cruel way to die.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent6-Text-1: Seems like our thief built a defensible encampment for a reason.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedIntro-Text-2: Seems like there's five in total, you can go rescue the whole family.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsBriefing-Text-2: Seems pretty sketchy, but that's kinda your thing now right?
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedBriefing-Text-1: Seems they've found another set of tracks.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroBriefing-Text-1: Seems... kinda odd, seeing as it's been tagged a red site since that incident with the ACS
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_2-Text-0: Seen snails move faster than that one. Honestly just letting anyone in these days-
D_Dialogue.SurveyLandingStorm-Text-4: Sensor equipment's been dropped at points marked on the map.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_End-Text-2: Seriously prepared. I think this is going to get ugly. See you soon prospector.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent4-Text-0: Set her down here, this should do.
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyScanComplete3-Text-4: Set it up by the lake.

D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent4-Text-0: So the UDA want you to test some new tech.

D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-1: So they don't just travel through the earth; they live in it.

D_Dialogue.GenericBriefing5-Text-1: So they wanna bring in some heavy hitters.

D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding2a-Text-2: So they want you to set up GPR stations to take readings.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionBriefingMultiLocation2-Text-: So they're looking for a crew to build some basic outposts for their advance teams.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefing2-Text-1: So they're looking for a hand, and paying good ren.
D_Dialogue.Scanning2aBriefing-Text-1: So they're looking for terrain scans, before they start dropping folk out of the sky.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationBriefing3-Text-2: So they're not exactly sure what kinda predator you're hunting, or how many there could be, but you can handle that ... right?
D_Dialogue.ConstructionLandingMultiLocation2-Text-1: So they're taking a few shortcuts.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_1-Text-1: So you chose to assist the outpost. Brave of you.

D_Dialogue.Survey2aLocationReached1-Text-2: So you need to get ... high.

D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent3-Text-2: So you'll still have me around for a while.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_C_05-Text-0: So you're going to attempt it alone? Bold of you.

D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryLanding-Text-0: So, the ACS were testing something in the desert.

D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-3: So, the names stuck. But out here we're all equal... equally screwed.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT2_1-Text-0: So, you figure if this experiment worked on Mammoths, it might work on other Arctic creatures too?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_1-Text-3: So, you want to be useful?
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_3-Text-6: So, you'll want to prepare for that.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore3-Text-0: So, you're mostly up to speed at this point, what else? Ah, Eden. Right.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-9: So... We need to leave right? She's completely ****ing lost it!
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore2-Text-6: Sol was rotated back earthside to testify and help with the investigation, at his request.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore2-Text-9: Sol's got this way of always making you do the right thing. It's infuriating, bless him.
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_EDEN_AUDIOLOG_1-Text-0: Sol? Hey, it's Mo. Yeah, it's secure. How are things? I hope the media are behaving themselves...
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionBriefing-Text-1: Some kinda geological formation has been spied from orbit.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent4-Text-2: Some kinda newfangled jukebox that spits out basic objectives.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_INTRO-Text-3: Some miners are refusing to work.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryLanding-Text-5: Some of 'em are pretty hard to reach, but that's where you come in.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_5-Text-5: Some of our men are talking about leaving for orbit. They refuse to work with this threat hanging over us.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_4-Text-3: Some of our men are talking about leaving for orbit. They refuse to work with this threat hanging over us.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent2-Text-2: Some of them are locals. Some seem to be... altered versions of earth wildlife.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Briefing-Text-1: Some of them look quite tricky to get to, we'll have to pass through some areas of radioactivity.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchBriefing-Text-5: Some wild territory they're sending you to.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aBriefing-Text-5: Some wild weather patterns happening in there, which has got Group 15 interested, too.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestIntro1-Text-5: Someone I haven't been in contact with for a long time.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkSuspicion3-Text-0: Someone has definitely been through here recently.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLanding2a-Text-3: Someone musta sent them some intel, 'cause they want you to investigate a few locations, see what you can turn up.
D_Dialogue.StockpileLanding2-Text-1: Someone who can source raw materials, process 'em, and get em up to space in one piece.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefing1-Text-1: Someone who knows what they're doing.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionLanding-Text-2: Someone within the UDA doesn't want you poking around the oasis too much.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bFoundFragment2-Text-2: Somethin' hit that bird on its way down.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionBriefing-Text-3: Something about it not being formed naturally... Not sure If I like the implications of that statement.....
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyScanComplete3-Text-5: Something about it's got them real interested.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_5-Text-0: Something feels off. Do you think you could make it 'pop' more.

D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_6-Text-0: Something killed this creature from the inside.

D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding3b-Text-1: Something we definitely didn't bring here.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aCombineItems-Text-2: Something's definitely not right with these people.

D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyScanPaused-Text-1: Something's wrong with one of the units.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aDeviceActivated-Text-0: Sometimes you just gotta LOVE Group 15.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBodiesLandingBodies-Text-4: Sometimes, it doesn't matter, I guess.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Theo_12-Text-0: Sometimes, you just can't plan for everything, you just gotta roll with it.
D_Dialogue.GenericLandingFriendly1-Text-1: Soon you'll be guiding me around the place.

D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-17: Sorry about him, damn robot's been around since the start, it's seen some stuff.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_6-Text-11: Sorry, uh, right, well done on all that stuff you're doing.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_7-Text-2: Sorry, uh, right, well done on all that stuff you're doing.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedIntro1-Text-7: Sounds like you're WELL on your way to being redacted out of UDA reports.... good for you.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent11-Text-0: Sounds like your paycheck's just arrived.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_END_5-Text-0: Stand by for your next available task.

D_Dialogue.IceSheetEvent3-Text-2: Starvation really is a lousy way to die.
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyScanComplete2-Text-0: Station two is up and active.

D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkDen6-Text-0: Stay alert, there could be more where that came from.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_4-Text-1: Stay alive dammit. I'll be with you each step of the way!
D_Dialogue.BW4_018_ACTIVATESATTELITE3-Text-2: Stay close, in case it changes its mind.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore2-Text-10: Stay safe prospector. You're making good time.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_33-Text-0: Stick close and stay quiet, we don't need any extra attention.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aLanding-Text-4: Still ... you came to Icarus for adventure, right?
D_Dialogue.Scanning1Finish-Text-2: Still a damn mystery, but you gotta start somewhere.

D_Dialogue.RiverlandsRemark1-Text-2: Still, they had a lot going on.

D_Dialogue.WeatherEvent4-Text-0: Storm cell just curled up outta nowhere.

D_Dialogue.BW4_024_BACKTODROPSHIP-Text-3: Success brings problems all of its own.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_8-Text-3: Such as joint custody... of Mittens...
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore1-Text-6: Suddenly, TPS propaganda was being force fed to everyone in orbit, and back home.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionCollectEquipment-Text-1: Supply drop marked on your map
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionScanOasis-Text-3: Suppose this is more fun though.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent6-Text-8: Supposed to be a secure line, honestly.
D_Dialogue.ExtractionLanding2a-Text-1: Supposed to be an exotics vein thereabouts.
D_Dialogue.MissionComplete5-Text-2: Sure looks like it from here.
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindItem3-Text-0: Sure looks like what they sent you to get, and if it ain't, well, I'd say they're gonna be interested regardless.
D_Dialogue.StockpileLanding2-Text-3: Sure sounds like you - so check your HUD and roll out.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Theo_11-Text-0: Sure, I trust my gear. I trust my instincts more.
D_Dialogue.BW4_019_BOSSSPAWN3-Text-0: Surprise surprise, the locals don't like you firing up the satellite.
D_Dialogue.Recon_Low_Oxygen-Text-0: Surviving's about more than just nails and boards ...

D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_7-Text-0: THIS IS AN ANNOUNCEMENT FROM THE PEOPLE'S SYNDICATE
D_Dialogue.ExterminationSandwormSpawn-Text-1: THIS IS WHAT YOU CAME FOR!
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_Intro-Text-1: TPS are deliberately low-tech when it comes to their comms, I must admit... it's rather clever. We couldn't figure out how they were communicating with each other for weeks.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_11-Text-3: TPS bastards are everywhere. If you like something... chances are they'll steal it, shoot it, or blow it up.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore1-Text-4: TPS was designated a terrorist organization. Even though it was just mostly families, trying to build better lives.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEnding-Text-4: Take care my friend, I'm glad you made it.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation1KillCreature-Text-1: Take care of that would ya
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_6-Text-1: Take it out, and we can get to Mo.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D2_03-Text-1: Take out any affected creatures you see.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionFindBlockage-Text-1: Target co-ordinates for gear pickup were added to your map.

D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent1-Text-4: Test out some new UDA bullcrap.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent12-Text-1: Test test. Alright, hey there Prospector.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent2-Text-2: Thank god there were no people down here when it happened.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEvent2-Text-4: Thank god you've got those trail beacons.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_9-Text-0: Thank you prospector, that's already much better. But I've been thinking...

D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_8-Text-0: Thank you, Prospector. Excellent work today.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-5: Thanks again for your help mate. You're the best.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_RESCUE_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-0: Thanks mate. Seems I owe you once again.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_Briefing-Text-1: That data you found... It's given us a location.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent7-Text-1: That data you sent me was more than just a recording. Guided me to a totally new spot.
D_Dialogue.TimerRunningOut20minsB-Text-0: That dropship's leaving with or without you.
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionWarning2-Text-0: That frequency is going to drive the local wildlife mad.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_3-Text-8: That goes for you too, AGENT. No funny business, alright?
D_Dialogue.DeliveryMissionSuccessful-Text-4: That is all we can tell you at this moment.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent2-Text-1: That little stunt we pulled with the audiolog, they're watching us now. Both of us.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent13-Text-2: That means it'll get you into direct contact with Faction reps.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkDen3-Text-0: That might be its den behind it.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionAverage2-Text-0: That nasty looking storm is heading right this way, stay sharp.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_1-Text-0: That research team of yours was investigating some rather dicey stuff.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_4-Text-4: That research you recovered? It helped us create a... form of biosignature tracking.

D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_2-Text-2: That seems a rather... convenient excuse, don't you think?
