D_Dialogue.RecoverySEConfession-Text-3: That site marked on your map, it's an ACS drop point.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_4-Text-1: That sounded like a big one. And I bet Norex will want you to take it down for them.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_4-Text-1: That sounded like a big one. And I bet Norex will want you to take it down for them.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLanding2a-Text-2: That tech was beyond top secret, now it's just waiting out there for people to find 'em.
D_Dialogue.RecoverySEInteractPod1-Text-0: That thing ain't gonna open up without power, hombre.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationSandwormDead4-Text-1: That thing did NOT go down easy.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD_D1-Text-0: That thing isn't going to tame itself, perhaps you should bribe it with food.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkAngry2-Text-0: That thing looks like it means business.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionAverage3-Text-2: That thing sorta stays with ya.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEnding-Text-1: That trek can't have been easy.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_End-Text-1: That was a big one! And I bet Norex will want you to take it down for them.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_2-Text-3: That was a while back. You sure you don't want to dictate a new one?
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkPostFight5-Text-0: That was close, let's keep moving.
D_Dialogue.AllItemsFound4-Text-1: That wasn't so hard, was it?
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_3-Text-8: That way you can hit the ground running when you get to Eden.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_4-Text-4: That would be a screenshot of your contractor's hard work, boss.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent4-Text-0: That would be the aforementioned obstacles. You will need to clear a path.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D2_1_2-Text-1: That would explain their insides turning to goop.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationFinish-Text-1: That's a few less exotic-crazed critters to worry about.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent7-Text-2: That's before exotics were tossed into the mix...
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent18-Text-12: That's enough, you don't get to-
D_Dialogue.Expedition3BeaconActivated3-Text-0: That's it - we got a signal.
D_Dialogue.Survey2aRadarActivated3-Text-0: That's it - we got a signal.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_3-Text-0: That's it! Sorry, I ain't dying down here! You guys are on your own.
D_Dialogue.ItemFoundGeneric5-Text-0: That's it, gotta be what we're looking for.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_7-Text-0: That's it, just a bit further.
D_Dialogue.ScanComplete1-Text-0: That's it, scan's good, data's clean.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryFindItem2-Text-1: That's life and death in jar.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_6-Text-14: That's likely enough information to get us to the source of this nonsense.
D_Dialogue.BW4_009_BOSSDEATH-Text-1: That's one less psychotic, genetically-engineered beast jacked up on exotics for you to worry about.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-5: That's some great data you just sent through. Hopefully I'll get the lead off my back.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkSuspicion7-Text-0: That's strange, looks like there's been other prospectors here..
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkDen2-Text-0: That's strange, what is it guarding?
D_Dialogue.Recon1Landing-Text-3: That's why you came all the way out here, and dropped with nothing - 'cause you could.
D_Dialogue.ACSMissionEnd3-Text-0: The ACS are paranoid, but when you tick their boxes, good things happen.
D_Dialogue.ACSBriefingDonut1-Text-0: The ACS have big plans for Icarus, and you're part of them.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingACS1-Text-0: The ACS have some prototype tech they need you to test out.
D_Dialogue.ACSMissionEnd2-Text-0: The ACS may be crazy, but they know talent when they see it.
D_Dialogue.ACSLandingDonut3-Text-0: The ACS might be loud, weird and paranoid, but they got the tech and the cash to do whatever they want.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryCraftItem1-Text-2: The ACS never got to test the device, so now ... they want you to.
D_Dialogue.ACSMissionEnd1-Text-0: The ACS tend to value results.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryBriefing-Text-1: The ACS were performing some kind of equipment test in the desert.
D_Dialogue.FactionRemarkAssembly1-Text-0: The African Assembly and ACS do not get along.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingAssembly1-Text-0: The African Assembly have some prototype tech they need you to test out.
D_Dialogue.AssemblyBriefingDonut3-Text-0: The Assembly are expanding their footprint on Icarus, and looking for experienced people.
D_Dialogue.AssemblyMissionEnd1-Text-0: The Assembly are gonna appreciate this and pay well.
D_Dialogue.AssemblyBriefingDonut1-Text-0: The Assembly are new to Icarus, but if their track record's anything to go by, they'll be running the place soon enough.
D_Dialogue.AssemblyLandingDonut1-Text-0: The Assembly came up fast, and they're doing the same on Icarus, but they don't trust anyone.
D_Dialogue.AssemblyMissionEnd3-Text-0: The Assembly can be slow to trust people, but if you keep this up, you'll do well with them.
D_Dialogue.AssemblyBriefingDonut2-Text-0: The Assembly don't trust anyone, but they need help.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationFinish-Text-0: The Assembly sends their thanks, and their cash.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationLanding-Text-0: The Assembly weren't always a big presence on Icarus.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationBriefing-Text-0: The Assembly's reporting wildlife issues on the surface.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_OPT1_01-Text-1: The Company has a vested interest in his whereabouts.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_C2_01-Text-0: The Company has sent us coordinates for your next job.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_1-Text-0: The Company has sent us coordinates for your next job.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_1-Text-7: The Company have been explicit in their instructions. I know this may be difficult for you but try not to disappoint them.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_01-Text-2: The Company refuses to promise help, since then contractors tend to get complacent.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT1_2-Text-0: The Company told me I'm not allowed to wish people were dead, out loud.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_C_01-Text-1: The Company would like you to set up comms with our Engineering team.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_1-Text-1: The Company would like you to set up comms with our Engineering team.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent2-Text-3: The Group could kill us over this, you gotta listen to the recording, here-
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent10End-Text-2: The Group provides, especially for favoured contractors such as yourself.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent19-Text-10: The Group will kill anyone they need in order to keep this under wraps. So. Watch your back.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingLagos1-Text-0: The Lagos Group has some bio-research they need you to help with.
D_Dialogue.LagosUnitBriefingDonut2-Text-0: The Lagos Unit have a problem, which ain't surprising when you're tryna run a planet.
D_Dialogue.LagosUnitLandingDonut3-Text-0: The Lagos Unit may be UDA, but four lightyears from Earth, they decide what flies, and what dies out here.
D_Dialogue.LagosUnitMissionEnd3-Text-0: The Lagos Unit may be cowboys, but they're cowboys who run Icarus.
D_Dialogue.LagosUnitBriefingDonut3-Text-0: The Lagos Unit needs all the help they can get, holding this place together.
D_Dialogue.LagosUnitBriefingDonut1-Text-0: The Lagos Unit runs Icarus for the UDA, but they don't like getting their hands dirty.
D_Dialogue.LagosUnitBriefingDonut5-Text-0: The Lagos Unit runs this show, but they're always lookin' out for good crews.
D_Dialogue.BW5_001_BRIEFING-Text-1: The Lagos Unit's looking for data on the deserts.
D_Dialogue.LagosUnitBriefingDonut4-Text-0: The Lagos Unit's put up a contract, if you're looking for a payday.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_1-Text-0: The R&D team are pretty impressed with those bullets of yours.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationLanding5-Text-0: The UDA ain't exactly known for a relaxed attitude to regulations, but they can't keep you outta here forever.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetBriefing-Text-0: The UDA are ready for you to head into the next area of the Null Sector. The Ice Sheet.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore3-Text-2: The UDA found that interesting, on account of the whole sector being tagged as a black zone, by G15.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsStageArea-Text-2: The UDA has marked this area as a Black Zone. Traversal is not recommended.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsWarning-Text-1: The UDA have marked this area as a Black Zone.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_1-Text-5: The UDA is always listening. Except to Norex, of course.
D_Dialogue.LagosUnitLandingDonut1-Text-0: The UDA may officially run Icarus, but out here, the Lagos Unit's the real power.
D_Dialogue.FactionRemarkShengong1-Text-0: The UDA may present a united front but lemme tell ya...
D_Dialogue.ExplorationLanding4-Text-0: The UDA seems to trust you. They've given you open access to this whole area.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_END_3-Text-0: The UDA thanks you for your efforts.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetIntro-Text-1: The UDA want you to keep up that good work and push on through to the Ice Sheet next.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsIntro-Text-5: The UDA want you to locate the teams first outpost - figure out what's happened to them.
D_Dialogue.Scanning1Landing-Text-1: The UDA wants exotics, and the Lagos Unit's under pressure to scale operations up.
D_Dialogue.RiverlandsRemark1-Text-1: The UDA weren't exactly creative with the naming in the Terrazone.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_4-Text-7: The UDA will never find out. Hopefully. You wouldn't talk, right?
D_Dialogue.AshlandsStageArea-Text-3: The UDA will not be held liable to damages or losses sustained by prospectors who choose to ignore this warning.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadIntro-Text-4: The UDA's testing out some 'groundbreaking' new tech, some kinda AI.
D_Dialogue.Scanning1Briefing-Text-2: The Unit wants new dropzones, which means gettin' terrain scans, and they'll pay for the privilege.
D_Dialogue.Scanning1Landing-Text-4: The Unit wants scans from three locations on your map.
D_Dialogue.BW5_006_EXITCAVE-Text-1: The aftermath of our attempt to cool this planet down to something liveable.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bEnterDesert1-Text-1: The aftermath of our attempt to cool this planet down to something liveable.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_2-Text-1: The amount of work that went into it, they must have falsified all of the data they provided to my team.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsWarning-Text-3: The area is unlikely to contain usable resources.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_1-Text-2: The area you'll be travelling to is showing a high amount of these biosignatures.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_F_01-Text-2: The area you'll be travelling to is showing a high concentration of poisonous gas.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_1-Text-2: The area you'll be travelling to is showing a high concentration of these biosignatures.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_1-Text-2: The areas of interest are marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_2-Text-2: The bad news first - We still have no idea where you are.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aLanding-Text-2: The bad news is the delivery drone got pasted by a storm.
D_Dialogue.BW3Briefing-Text-3: The bigger the animal, the stronger the effect.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD_D3-Text-2: The black market likes to keep traitors waiting, so why don't you use this time to hone your home improvement skills?
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent4-Text-8: The blueprint for it should be around here somewhere. Ah.. marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsIntro-Text-4: The brains say there's something going on at a molecular level, hell even looking at the area from orbit is.... disturbing. Gets worse the deeper you go too.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_2-Text-0: The caves in this area are rich with resources, hence the mining operations nearby.
D_Dialogue.ArcticRemark2-Text-0: The cold here can kill ya without you even noticing.
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindItem9-Text-0: The contract said 'unusual biosamples', but I think we can be pretty sure this is what they meant.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent6-Text-6: The contractor currently lacks a functional trachea. I did my best to substitute.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.2-Text-1: The contractors mental state has deteriorated. Psychological evaluation is recommended.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryLanding-Text-4: The crash zones are marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent18-Text-9: The creatures were deemed to be non-sentient by the Group.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_8-Text-5: The data we've gathered so far is limited...
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_End-Text-1: The data you found was a goldmine of intel.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_1-Text-3: The data's fresh, but these things are fast so you'd better head out quickly.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_6-Text-0: The data's not adding up-something's wrong.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bFoundFragment2-Text-1: The debris has impact markings that've got nothin' to do with that crash.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_G1-Text-1: The depth of human brilliance will never cease to amaze me.
D_Dialogue.DesertRemark1-Text-0: The desert areas of the Terrazone are pretty unforgiving.
D_Dialogue.DesertRemark2-Text-2: The desert can be cruel like that.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_1-Text-0: The device is located in the supply crate nearby.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_2-Text-0: The device is stowed in your dropship.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_12-Text-0: The device should be somewhere near your vicinity.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefing4b-Text-0: The ecology of Icarus is changing, and not just lifeforms.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_1-Text-0: The equipment has shown us a trail you can follow for your next job.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_13-Text-0: The equipment should be somewhere near your vicinity.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent18-Text-10: The fact that they were unable to adapt and survive the terraforming process proves that.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroOly-Text-8: The faction higher ups didn't do it for your sake.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroStyx-Text-8: The faction higher ups didn't do it for your sake.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchLanding-Text-4: The first area they want investigated is marked on the map.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent5-Text-0: The fringe of the terrazone.... Never thought I'd ever see it open up.
D_Dialogue.DeliveryMissionSuccessful-Text-3: The future of this planet - and possibly our species - lies in the balance.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_2-Text-5: The good news is, if we can't find you, neither can TPS.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-7: The guys I sent to help have kinda disappeared.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_End-Text-5: The hell are you guys talking about? It's just a bunch of graphs?
D_Dialogue.AshlandsIntro-Text-2: The higher ups have lost contact with the forward science team. Their goal was to set up outposts deep in the Null Sector.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_3-Text-0: The hubris will never cease to amaze me.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.1-Text-1: The impact on their resolve remains uncertain.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent7-Text-1: The injured contractor would be greatly relieved that Daisy made it back home, had they not died horribly from their wounds before I could inform them of your success.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_14-Text-0: The item should be somewhere near your vicinity.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationLanding-Text-2: The kind they didn't walk away from.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationSandwormMarker3-Text-0: The kinda thing that does that ... you better know exactly what you're doing, chasin' it down.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationLanding-Text-3: The latest encounter's marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_15-Text-0: The less you know, the safer you are.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D_01-Text-1: The location changes each week, I happened to guide another contractor to a deal a few days ago.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_1_2-Text-1: The location changes each week, I happened to guide another contractor to a deal a few days ago.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_3-Text-0: The minerals gathered here are so different to anything else I've studied...
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBodiesLandingBodies-Text-0: The missing woman's one of the leadership's kids.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLanding3-Text-3: The most recent site's marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Intro-Text-1: The ones we'll be tackling first appear to require passing through radioactive zones.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_9-Text-1: The only place that has terraforming enzymes at such a scale out here is... well the Lab.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.6-Text-1: The probability is high that, without your assistance, Daisy will be ruthlessly torn apart by local fauna.
D_Dialogue.BW5_007_ENTERRADARZONE-Text-2: The radar does the work, all you gotta do is keep it safe.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_F_01-Text-0: The research has shown us a trail you can follow for your next job.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_7-Text-5: The researchers from the base we checked earlier were experimenting with enzymes. Sound familiar?
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchLanding-Text-6: The rest's on you - good luck, friend.
D_Dialogue.DeliveryMissionSuccessful-Text-2: The results of this mission have far-reaching implications.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_Briefing-Text-3: The riots back home... well, they've spread here. Prospectors are being recruited into TPS.
D_Dialogue.ScanComplete6-Text-0: The scan's finished, and the data's come through.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_16-Text-0: The scanning location should be somewhere nearby.
D_Dialogue.SurveyBriefingStorm-Text-0: The storms down here have put a major spanner in their works.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_7-Text-2: The team will want to meet you as well, no one's going to believe you made it here all by yourself.
D_Dialogue.Recon_Low_Food-Text-0: The terraforming went to crap, but they left a few critters behind.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchIntro-Text-2: The thief has tried to undermine our work on Icarus, and is no longer due civilised treatment.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent5-Text-1: The thief stole a geological scanning device that you will need to utilize.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryFindItem2-Text-2: The thing you're collecting is serious kit.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aDeviceExplanation-Text-0: The thing you're looking for, apparently it's some kind of sonic device.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_1-Text-4: The weapons that this thing could power would be a breakthrough in biotech.
D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_15-Text-0: The wildlife should be somewhere near your vicinity.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchLanding-Text-3: Their bots have identified unusual growth patterns emerging in part of the terrazone.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_1-Text-5: Their methods may be different on the surface but they're just as bad as TPS in some ways.
D_Dialogue.BW4_001_BRIEFING-Text-3: Their payload's some kinda enzyme, biotech designed to reshape worlds.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionLanding2a-Text-1: Their people'll need beds, at a minimum.
D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding2a-Text-1: Their research teams think they can predict where it forms, but they need more geologic data.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefingGeneric2-Text-0: Their sats have spotted somethin' strange on the surface.
D_Dialogue.FactionRemarkShengong1-Text-1: Them four factions fight day in and day out.
D_Dialogue.RecoverySELanding-Text-3: Then bring it to the test location, and fire it up.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent20-Text-13: Then you better get going, so long, ta ta.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_Intro-Text-5: Theo has some equipment for you, go talk to him first.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_Intro-Text-4: Theo still blames me I think.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_1-Text-4: Theo they're not all bad. Most of them are just looking for a better life.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_6-Text-8: Theo! We don't know anything yet, AH- Prospector, can you come and help me?
D_Dialogue.Extraction2aOptionalObjective-Text-2: Theory is, they tend to cluster.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_1-Text-2: There are humans who research creatures just for fun, you know. No stabbing required.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_1-Text-3: There are recipes for prototype equipment available which you may test for suitability in your work.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_5-Text-4: There are so many loose ends to this case, I just need you to deal with them.
D_Dialogue.UniaoMissionEnd3-Text-1: There are worse friends to have, I guess.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Theo_5-Text-0: There aren't enough bullets on Icarus...
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent7-Text-0: There is a... moderate amount of movement. Headed your way.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aReachAvalanche-Text-0: There it is - a million tons of ice and snow.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_3-Text-0: There it is. Doesn't seem like TPS has staked a claim.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D2_05-Text-0: There it is. Take it out.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_4-Text-0: There it is. You know what to do.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkSuspicion8-Text-0: There may be more to this place than they've been tellin us
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_12-Text-2: There might be... There might be validity to their claims.
D_Dialogue.ScanComplete5-Text-0: There we go, scan's good, data's up.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore1-Text-3: There were deaths, which radicalised a handful of members. You've probably heard of the attacks they've claimed over the years.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_1-Text-9: There were several scientists posted there that you'll need to locate.
D_Dialogue.Recon_Low_Water-Text-1: There's a lake down there. Go take a drink.
D_Dialogue.BW5_001_BRIEFING-Text-4: There's a lot of questions here, and they're payin' top dollar for answers.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bBriefing-Text-4: There's a lot of questions here, and they're payin' top dollar for answers.
D_Dialogue.GenericLanding5-Text-0: There's a lot ridin' on this one.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_1-Text-0: There's a lot riding on this one, Contractor.
D_Dialogue.ResearchLandingGeneric2-Text-1: There's a lot we don't know about Icarus.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_1-Text-3: There's a particularly dull chap on the R&D team who's come up with a formula they want you to test out.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_2-Text-0: There's a perfect specimen for your test. Let's see how this turns out.
D_Dialogue.DevicePaused5-Text-0: There's a problem with the machine.
D_Dialogue.Recon1Briefing-Text-4: There's a ways to go before you head out hunting for exotics.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Intro-Text-8: There's absolutely no sugar coating this. We're in just about the worst position we could find ourselves in.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkWary4-Text-0: There's almost never just one of 'em. Stay sharp.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_5-Text-3: There's also the experimental creatures that were set loose, if any of those are spotted it could lead to some uncomfortable questions.
D_Dialogue.MoveToNextLocation3-Text-1: There's another marker on your map.
D_Dialogue.MoveToNextLocation7-Text-1: There's another marker on your map.
D_Dialogue.MoveToNextLocation6-Text-1: There's another zone marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.SurveyFishMissionComplete-Text-0: There's answers there, if they can find 'em.
D_Dialogue.Scanning1AnimalAttack-Text-1: There's been reports that wildlife don't like technology.
D_Dialogue.BW4_001_BRIEFING-Text-6: There's fragments right up into the arctic, so you'll be facin' the worst of the wilds.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_G_02-Text-1: There's got to be more information around here somewhere.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aLanding-Text-2: There's heavy weather, freezing temperatures, and god knows what else over there on the ice.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_8-Text-1: There's likely a terminal around here somewhere, see if you can find any more data.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkWary2-Text-0: There's never just one of them, in my experience.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_1-Text-2: There's no knowing the potential of the biotech from this creature.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT3_1-Text-7: There's no knowing what hell those researchers put them through to trigger such mutations.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT4_1-Text-7: There's no knowing what hell those researchers put them through to trigger such mutations.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsBriefing-Text-1: There's no terrain data, or any data at all really.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent3-Text-3: There's not much else I can do for you from here.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionBriefing-Text-5: There's nothing here that mentions the interference is dangerous to prospectors.
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_EDEN_AUDIOLOG_4-Text-2: There's only so much I could do after you blew my cover you asshole!
D_Dialogue.ResearchLanding2b-Text-0: There's reports of new plantlife down here, bioforms no-one's seen before.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefing3-Text-0: There's reports of unusual phenomena in the area.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationStormWait-Text-0: There's reports some animals only hunt during storms.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchFindItem2-Text-1: There's rumors that exotics can affect living organisms, but this ...
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent2-Text-0: There's the pod and there's a... what the hell is that... This damn place.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryFindItem1-Text-1: There's two more crash sites out there.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_OPT1_05-Text-1: Therefore you can't feel much of anything anymore.
D_Dialogue.Survey2aRadarCollected-Text-0: These GPR stations link up to record subterranean geographic data.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3BeaconCollected-Text-0: These beacons register and report baseline geographic data.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT1_2-Text-1: These could be your missing test subjects.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent13-Text-3: These don't get sent out very often, go ahead and set it up.
D_Dialogue.StockpileLanding3-Text-1: These guys want a new space station - but their crews have been getting eaten by bears, and pasted by storms and who knows what else.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_3-Text-0: These ones do look slightly different to each other.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Intro-Text-10: These satellites take a long time to charge up, you'll probably see it from the ground.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_C_04-Text-0: These tasks can't be too hard if they've asked someone like you to do it.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_1-Text-1: These things are often too volatile to mess around with in orbit.
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindSameItem1-Text-1: These things are popping up all over the place.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_CREATURES-Text-1: These things certainly seem to fit the criteria for causing mass panic.
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionWarning3-Text-0: These things have a way of attracting the local wildlife, stay alert.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_1-Text-3: These things must be pretty fast to cover that much ground.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_2-Text-1: These things must be pretty fast to cover that much ground.
D_Dialogue.BW4_015_ITEMRETRIEVED2-Text-1: These things were designed to be deployed in orbit.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OPT3_01-Text-1: These two appear to be a mated pair, something you'll likely never experience stuck all the way out here.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_4-Text-2: They always do. I'd prepare if I were you.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_End-Text-2: They always do. I'd prepare if I were you.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_4-Text-2: They always do. I'd prepare if I were you.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_3-Text-2: They are rather alarming in the open.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_1-Text-2: They aren't very happy with us for leaving those miners to their fate.
D_Dialogue.ExtractionComplete2a-Text-1: They asked for exotics, and you got 'em.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefing5-Text-0: They been losing people on the surface.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefing4-Text-1: They been losing teams, equipment and resources.
D_Dialogue.Scanning2bBriefing-Text-0: They been noticing your work, and wanna take advantage of new territory.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingGroupFifteen1-Text-1: They call it research, I'd say it's more like surveillance.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsIntro-Text-1: They call this area the Null Sector and, well. No one has ever walked out alive.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_1-Text-1: They decided that they like what they see, and want to enhance an existing lab planetside.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryFindItem4b1-Text-0: They didn't say exactly what to look for, but they didn't have to.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent3-Text-1: They don't exactly have the best track record when it comes to the safety of their contractors.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetLog-Text-3: They don't feel the same but they , they don't see
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemark1-Text-0: They don't usually hang around here, must be something about you.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_4-Text-1: They don't usually run from a fight.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_4-Text-0: They eat rock and metal? How mundane.
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOKEEP_HURT2-Text-0: They escaped, I need help please!
D_Dialogue.SurveyLandingStorm-Text-1: They figure if they can predict it better, they'll have an advantage over everyone else.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bDeviceExplanation-Text-2: They figured you'll need drilling equipment.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationBriefingSpare2-Text-0: They got a four-legged problem, and need someone with experience to sort it out.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationBriefingSpare4-Text-0: They got an animal control issue down there.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefingGeneric1-Text-0: They got an interest in the region - reports of unusual specimens emerging, hmm.
D_Dialogue.ResearchLanding3-Text-0: They got intel of unusual biota in the region, and even weirder stuff.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionLandingMultiLocation1-Text-0: They got major stakes in this region, and need places for their people.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefingGeneric2-Text-1: They got no idea what it is and need someone to find out.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionBriefing2a-Text-0: They got plans for this planet, and that means boots on the ground.
D_Dialogue.SurveyGenericBriefing1-Text-0: They got some big decisions to make, and need data from the surface.
D_Dialogue.ResearchLanding4b-Text-2: They got their hands on satellite data showing new geoforms emerging.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionBriefing2b-Text-1: They gotta have the basics, before they can drop their people in.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent6-Text-2: They have requested help in locating and escorting their pet Blueback that was abandoned during extraction.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingAny6-Text-0: They heard you'll take any job that pays well.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent19-Text-8: They knew these creatures were sentient, had families and homes, art, culture.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3Landing-Text-1: They like to get in first.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkWary3-Text-0: They like to lurk about in packs, keep your eyes peeled.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLostTeamItemBriefing-Text-0: They lost a team recently, and need someone to find out what happened to 'em.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLostTeamBodiesBriefing-Text-0: They lost a team recently, including some Sao Paolo rich kid.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLandingExtra-Text-1: They lost something important, and now they want it back.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_2-Text-1: They may also be rich with danger. As Handler would say, keep your wits about you.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_Briefing-Text-2: They mentioned Group 15, so we'd better check it out ourselves.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_5-Text-1: They mentioned data sticks and hard drives that they couldn't get into, look for those first.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD_D4-Text-1: They must be messing with you.
D_Dialogue.FillerRemarkDeadProspector2-Text-0: They must have been abandoned when this zone was shut down.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_3-Text-1: They must have been kicked out, so to speak.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_2-Text-1: They must wreak havoc on the environment and native ecosystem...
D_Dialogue.Recon1Briefing-Text-2: They must've been thinking of some 'other' planet.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefing1-Text-0: They need an assist on the surface.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingAny4-Text-0: They need boots on the ground to do the work that no-one else will.
D_Dialogue.SurveyGenericLanding2-Text-0: They need data - doesn't weigh a thing, but getting it can be ... killer.
D_Dialogue.Scanning2aLanding-Text-1: They need detailed terrain data from this region, if they're gonna open it up to prospecting.
D_Dialogue.SurveyBriefing2a-Text-0: They need geo-data from this region, and fast.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationBriefingSpare1-Text-0: They need help with a wildlife problem.
D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding2a-Text-3: They need line of sight - so if terrain's too low, you'll need to build them platforms so they can connect.
D_Dialogue.Survey2aRadarCollected-Text-3: They need line of sight to connect, so you gotta raise 'em up.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3BeaconCollected-Text-3: They need line of sight, so you gotta raise 'em up.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3Briefing-Text-4: They need someone experienced to find a way into the region.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefing2b-Text-1: They need someone to go in and bring samples back.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionBriefingMultiLocation1-Text-: They need someone to set up forward bases in the area, before they send their people in.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBriefing4a-Text-4: They need ya to play fetch.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedIntro1-Text-9: They need you to find the location of another base, must be nearby here somewhere.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLandingSpare3-Text-0: They need you to find this thing and any of its friends, then put it in the ground, because they're stuck until you do.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLandingSpare1-Text-0: They need you to find this thing, and fast, before it does any more damage.
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyLanding-Text-2: They need you to go set up three survey stations, something about tectonic movement, I don't know.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingAny1-Text-0: They need you to head down there and activate some kind of newfangled device they've cooked up
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aDeviceOff-Text-2: They said it could be a few minutes.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_1-Text-0: They say the best murders are meticulously planned.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderIntro1-Text-8: They seem to have a renewed interest in the area, for better or worse.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_OUTRO-Text-1: They send their commiserations, and half of your usual fee.
D_Dialogue.GenericLanding5-Text-2: They sent the objectives through already.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent4-Text-1: They shouldn't be a problem for a prospector of your calibre.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLandingGeneric1-Text-0: They spotted a downed Sinotai transport.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryExoticsFound-Text-1: They sure hit a good vein.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefing4b-Text-2: They think it's exotic related, and want samples before anyone else gets them.
D_Dialogue.ExtractionBriefing2a-Text-0: They think they've got a lead on some exotics.
D_Dialogue.ResearchBriefing3-Text-2: They wanna be the first to know what's actually going on, because ... money.
D_Dialogue.StockPileBriefing1-Text-0: They wanna bring in a heap of new people.
D_Dialogue.Scanning2aLanding-Text-2: They wanna fill the place with dropships, if you know what I mean.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBodiesLandingBodies-Text-2: They wanna make amends, give her a proper funeral.
D_Dialogue.BW4_001_BRIEFING-Text-5: They want 'em back before anyone else gets them.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aBriefing-Text-3: They want Arctic territory opened up.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aBriefing-Text-1: They want Lagos pushing into new zones, like yesterday.
D_Dialogue.ResearchLanding2b-Text-1: They want a headstart over everyone else, figuring out what the hell's going on, and where it's going.
D_Dialogue.SurveyBriefingStorm-Text-1: They want better prediction data, but first they need someone to get it.
D_Dialogue.Scanning4aBriefing-Text-1: They want data on drop zones, so they're looking for someone to take terrain scans in the area.
D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding4a-Text-2: They want data, and dropped a bunch of geodetic equipment at points marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.SurveyGenericLanding1-Text-0: They want data, and you can be sure exotics are involed.
D_Dialogue.SurveyBriefing3-Text-1: They want more data ... a lot more, before they make some big decisions.
D_Dialogue.Scanning3Landing-Text-2: They want radar scans of certain areas - first one's marked on your map.
D_Dialogue.Scanning4bLanding-Text-1: They want scans of the area, so they can start bringing in prospector crews.
D_Dialogue.Scanning2bLanding-Text-1: They want scans of the region, terrain data so they can open up new drop zones and get prospectors into the area.
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyBriefing-Text-3: They want someone to drop down, set up a survey system, and beam the data back up here.
D_Dialogue.SurveyBriefing4a-Text-1: They want someone to take readings, before they risk any more resources.
D_Dialogue.Scanning4bBriefing-Text-1: They want terrain data, if you can get scans of the area.
D_Dialogue.Scanning3Briefing-Text-0: They want terrain scans from some of the new territory coming online, so they can chart new drop zones.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetLog-Text-4: They want to leave how could we leave?
D_Dialogue.ConstructionBriefingMultiLocation2-Text-: They want to up their presence in the region, but don't have the infrastructure.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryCraftItem4b-Text-1: They want you to assemble it.
D_Dialogue.CombineGeneric1-Text-0: They want you to assemble those pieces.
D_Dialogue.BW5_001_BRIEFING-Text-3: They want you to find a way into the region, then take some terrain scans, so they can start tagging drop zones.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBodiesLandingItems-Text-1: They want you to find them, figure out what went wrong, and of course, get the exotics.
D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding3b-Text-2: They want you to get water samples, for starters, and see what else you can find.
D_Dialogue.RecoverySEBriefing-Text-2: They want you to head down, find the drops, then bring 'em to the zone they were supposed to be testing in.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedBriefing-Text-4: They want you to head out and round 'em up.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEvent3-Text-4: They want you to leave a sort of... breadcrumb trail. Using Trail Beacons.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bBriefing-Text-4: They want you to track it down and find out what happened, because they had enough scandals lately.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationBriefing-Text-2: They want you to track the thing down, and eliminate it before it hurts anyone else.
D_Dialogue.RecoverySEConfession-Text-4: They want you to use the device to open up the ACS drop pod, retrieve the contents, and bring it back for them.

D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation2KillCreature-Text-0: They weren't kiddin' when they said this place is dangerous.

D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_C_01-Text-2: They'll be able to advise you on what to do next with this research.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aBriefing-Text-4: They'll be droppin' some ice-cuttin' gear down to ya, but exotics screw with signals up there, so expect a mess and zero intel.

D_Dialogue.ExtractionExoticsAcquired2a-Text-1: They'll want a little more than that though.

D_Dialogue.SpecialGenericLanding1-Text-0: They're asking a lot of ya.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionLanding4b-Text-1: They're asking for fully functional forward outposts, so get your tech sorted.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationInfestationLanding-Text-0: They're being overrun by critters near here.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLanding4b-Text-3: They're being real quiet about what it is.
D_Dialogue.StockpileLanding0-Text-0: They're boosting their orbital infrastructure in a big way.

D_Dialogue.StockpileLanding2-Text-0: They're buildin' new facilities in orbit, and need help on the ground.

D_Dialogue.OpenWorldEvent2-Text-2: They're calling it the Orbital Exchange System. O. E. S.

D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent11-Text-2: They're calling it the Orbital Exchange System. O. E. S.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionLandingMultiLocation2-Text-0: They're expanding their presence down here, and they wanna do it fast.

D_Dialogue.ConstructionBriefing2b-Text-0: They're getting ready to send advance teams down, but they need places to stay or it's gonna be a real short trip.

D_Dialogue.BW4_024_BACKTODROPSHIP-Text-5: They're gonna want more from you.

D_Dialogue.Scanning2aBriefing-Text-0: They're keen to open up new regions for prospecting.
D_Dialogue.FM2RecoveryBriefing-Text-2: They're keeping quiet about exactly what happened, but something went wrong with their set-up.

D_Dialogue.SurveyGenericBriefing2-Text-0: They're looking for data, survey info on a specific area.

D_Dialogue.ConstructionLanding2b-Text-0: They're preparing for some major moves, and need places for their people.

D_Dialogue.SurveyLanding3-Text-3: They've dropped units at points marked on your map.
