D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_End-Text-2: This is the biggest cache of useful data we've found so far.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.3-Text-0: This is the designated location where Daisy would have been safe, provided your mission had been successfully executed.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent6-Text-0: This is the scanner. It needs to be powered.
D_Dialogue.Survey2aLocationReached3-Text-0: This is the spot, and the GPR's nearby.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionCaveBlocked-Text-0: This is the spot. Lagos wants this cleared.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent7-Text-1: This is the third version they've worked on, and it seems it's only good for basic errands.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent3-Text-1: This is the third version they've worked on, and it seems only good for basic errands.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-2: This is valuable information for The Company, establishing an upload link now.
D_Dialogue.SurveyFindFish-Text-0: This is where the advance team reported new marine life.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionArrive2b-Text-0: This is where they want it
D_Dialogue.ConstructionArriveGeneric1-Text-0: This is where they want it.
D_Dialogue.ConstructionArriveGeneric3-Text-0: This is where they want it.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureIntro-Text-2: This is your chance to earn your place within the Group. Failure will not be rewarded.
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOPKEEP_APE_B_2-Text-2: This is your problem now, I QUIT, NOREX! Effective IMMEDIATELY.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_Intro-Text-4: This location may be part of a much larger research network, if we can find a way in I'm certain we'll find the answers we're looking for.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent2-Text-0: This looks about right, let's get set up.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEvent6-Text-1: This looks like the way into the next area, god only knows what's lurking out there.
D_Dialogue.SpecialGenericBriefing3-Text-0: This mission's ... a little different, but if you're up for it, the money's good.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEvent5-Text-0: This must be it, not like there's anyone else building stuff out here.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchBriefing-Text-4: This one ain't gonna be easy, though.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D2_4-Text-1: This one human I worked with would just not. stop. SINGING.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_04-Text-0: This one looks about ready to give up. Hmm. Hold on a second while I check something.
D_Dialogue.SinotaiBriefingDonut2-Text-0: This one's for Sinotai - they want it done quick and clean.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Theo_6-Text-0: This place gets to you after a while, but we manage.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadIntro-Text-1: This place has been only accessible to approved scientists and faction contractors ... till now.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_1-Text-0: This place is facinating. I'm really hopeful that this will provide more insight into what the Group were doing here.
D_Dialogue.TempRemark2-Text-0: This place is known for ruthless weather. Keep an eye out.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionScanOasis-Text-1: This place would be beautiful. If it wasn't so deadly.
D_Dialogue.ResearchEndMission-Text-0: This planet never ceases to amaze me.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bReachBlocker2-Text-1: This planet's a pain the ass.
D_Dialogue.RiverlandsRemark1-Text-0: This section here is called the Riverlands.
D_Dialogue.GH_INTRO_BRIEFING-Text-2: This station will enable you to contact Norex for exclusive contracts via our proprietary AI assistant, AGENT.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionSevere8-Text-0: This storm was not on the forecast..
D_Dialogue.StormReactionSevere7-Text-0: This storm was not on the radar..
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_1-Text-1: This thing could make your career, or end mine.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionModerate2-Text-0: This thing is predicted to get even worse.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bDeviceAssembled-Text-0: This thing should be able to clear any debris you find in that cave.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aDeviceExplanation-Text-0: This thing's a kind of heat ray.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent4-Text-1: This was supposed to be an urgent op? We're hot on the heels of nothin'
D_Dialogue.MissionComplete14-Text-0: This wasn't an easy one, but you did it.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationBriefing5-Text-2: This whole terrazone's open to you.
D_Dialogue.InfestationPoint3-Text-0: This zone's hot - so a little advice: if it moves, kill it.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEnding-Text-0: This'll do ya for today, if I were you I'd take the money and run.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_5-Text-3: This'll look great on my record... Uh.. I mean your record.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_4-Text-2: Those TPS chaps really can be... Frustrating.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent16-Text-2: Those coordinates...  location is likely a cave.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_5-Text-2: Those documents had some rather nasty implications.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_5-Text-1: Those exotics burning a hole in your proverbial pockets?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A2_05-Text-2: Those machines had some rather nasty implications.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_1-Text-1: Those poor miners might be watching their home burn by now.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroLocation2PlaceBeacon-Text-0: Those things certainly weren't here last time
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_Briefing-Text-3: Though I should warn you, there will likely be TPS interference along the way.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D2_01-Text-3: Though based on the fact this job's for the black market, I doubt he'll be happy.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_6-Text-1: Though on Icarus, I suppose humans are in the same category.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D2_1-Text-5: Though you are well versed in the method of procurement.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_1-Text-1: Though, I can only imagine how much their premium must have cost.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D_04-Text-3: Though, I doubt the Group will leave that backdoor open ever again.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT3_1-Text-9: Though, covering up what happened here surely cancels any good deed out.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT4_1-Text-9: Though, covering up what happened here surely cancels any good deed out.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D_01-Text-2: Though, they didn't make it very far before another Contractor caught up with them...
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_1_2-Text-2: Though, they didn't make it very far before another Contractor caught up with them...
D_Dialogue.BW4_023_BOSSDEATH3-Text-0: Thought that mighta been the one that ended you.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E_03-Text-0: Time to do it all again.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent1-Text-0: Time to get moving, don't forget your equipment.
D_Dialogue.BW5_005_DESTROYBLOCKER-Text-2: Time to get the hell outta the underground.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent5Line2-Text-0: Time to get this one back before Icarus decides to take a bite outta them, or you.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_1-Text-1: Time to go back to your roots as an old-fashioned delivery boy.
D_Dialogue.BW4_008_ITEMRETRIEVED1-Text-4: Time to go find the next one.
D_Dialogue.Recon1Finish-Text-0: Time to head back to orbit?
D_Dialogue.BW4_022_ITEMRETRIEVED3-Text-3: Time to head back to the dropship.
D_Dialogue.BW5_RETURNTODROPSHIP-Text-1: Time to head back to the dropship.
D_Dialogue.ReturnToDropship5-Text-0: Time to head back to the dropship.
D_Dialogue.ExtractionBriefing2a-Text-2: Time to see what you can dig up.
D_Dialogue.MissionComplete7-Text-0: Time to wind up, you done everything they asked.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_1-Text-4: To preserve their reputation they'd burn all the cash on Earth. I'm sure they know more than they let on. Most organisations do.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aBriefing-Text-2: Told Lagos Unit to offer you this one direct.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent8-Text-10: Tomato quality and composition will be used to assess arable land potential. Please begin.
D_Dialogue.SurveyLandingStorm-Text-5: Too late to back out now.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bLocationReached3-Text-0: Trajectory of the fragments suggest more of the pod came down near here.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3Landing-Text-7: Tricky part is, doesn't look like there's any natural pathways.
D_Dialogue.SinotaiMissionEnd1-Text-1: Trust goes a long way with them.
D_Dialogue.TimerRunningOut20minsC-Text-0: Trust me, you don't wanna miss that dropship.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationPlaceCorpseWait-Text-0: Try laying some bait to lure it out.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_F_03-Text-1: Try not to die in the process.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_2-Text-1: Try not to die. Or don't.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryFindItem1-Text-1: Try not to handle it too much.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_1-Text-5: Try not to injure yourself in the process.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_2-Text-1: Try not to perish in the process.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_1-Text-5: Try to avoid direct contact if you can. Or don't, I wouldn't mind watching you squirm a bit.
D_Dialogue.ColdRemark5-Text-0: Try to find somewhere to warm up a bit.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E2_05-Text-1: Try to survive if you must.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3Briefing-Text-1: UDA are pushing Lagos hard to develop new parts of the terrazone for prospecting.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroOly-Text-2: UDA has opened up the entire area for you to explore.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent2-Text-1: UDA hasn't been very forthcoming with information, but I've heard rumors.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationBriefing4a-Text-0: UDA just approved you for full access to this area.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationBriefing3-Text-0: UDA just granted you full access to this area.
D_Dialogue.BW4_002_EXITEDROPHIP-Text-2: UDA needs you to get 'em before anyone else gets too ambitious.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationLanding6-Text-0: UDA reckons you're safe to work this whole region unguided.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationBriefing2b-Text-0: UDA regulations say you've now got full access to this entire zone.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationLanding2-Text-0: UDA says this entire area is open to you.
D_Dialogue.Recon1Briefing-Text-1: UDA says we gotta drop you in a safe, well-mapped zone your first time down.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationBriefing2a-Text-0: UDA says you meet criteria for unrestricted access to this area.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D2_7-Text-14: UDA seems to have better luck with SMPL3...
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionLanding-Text-0: UDA wants this done fast. It's on the work order and everything.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionComplete-Text-1: UDA will be running crews through here in no time.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bBriefing-Text-1: UDA's given Lagos the go-ahead to expand operations.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aBriefing-Text-0: UDA's under serious pressure to up their exotics shipments.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent9-Text-5: Ugh due to Corp HQ mandates I have to mention...
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent9-Text-5: Ugh due to Corp HQ mandates I have to mention...
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_2-Text-1: Ugh, don't mind him, Theo's ex-military.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_1-Text-6: Ugh. Not this again. Look, we get it. Everyone's a unique little flower full of potential blah blah blah.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent3-Text-0: Ugh. Well, he never was the brightest. At least it looks like he recorded their trail before... this happened. Follow it.
D_Dialogue.GenericReaction5-Text-0: Uh, I'm not sure if that's exactly working as intended..
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadIntro-Text-6: Uh, ahem, sorry. It'll be in an O.E.S pod nearby, go grab the thing.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent9-Text-1: Uh, obviously best not to mention this to anyone. Ever.
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionRepair1-Text-0: Uh, prospector? I think you'll need to repair the equipment.
D_Dialogue.TempRemark3-Text-0: Uh, prospector? Looks like you're overheating.
D_Dialogue.TimerRunningOut20minsD-Text-0: Uh, prospector? You might want to start heading back to your ship.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D2_7-Text-11: Uh, sure. Contractor, retreat for now. We'll do a survey of the creature's path.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent9-Text-10: Uh, take what you want from here, looks like the owner's not coming back any time soon.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_1-Text-9: Uh- It's military speak. You wouldn't understand.
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionRemark1-Text-0: Uh.. have you done this before?
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionRemark2-Text-0: Uh.. you have used one of these before, right?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_1-Text-8: Uh... In this metaphor... Are we all flowers? Are you saying we should all... die?
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_EDEN_AUDIOLOG_2-Text-2: Um, just to keep you updated we're underway with the full investigation soon, just waiting on the last teammate to show up before we hit the road.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionCollectExplosives-Text-3: Um.. Recovery team found prospector 496 in three separate biomes.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionArriveLocation2-Text-0: Um... Up there. You'll need to build something for that.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D2_04-Text-4: Unable to sleep? Unable to dream? How awful would that be?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_3-Text-0: Unfortunately it would appear that the reports were correct.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_1-Text-3: Unfortunately, once they're on the surface teams seem to adopt an "anything goes" approach.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_10-Text-4: Unfortunately, that's more than can be said for some who seek their fortune out here...
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore2-Text-4: Unfortunately... That caused some chaos.I mentioned the riots, yeah?
D_Dialogue.UniaoBriefingDonut3-Text-0: Uniao act like they're invincible, but they need a hand on the surface.
D_Dialogue.UniaoLandingDonut2-Text-0: Uniao don't care who you are, so long as you deliver.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingPool1-Text-0: Uniao have some prototype tech they need you to test out.
D_Dialogue.UniaoBriefingDonut1-Text-0: Uniao might be a pack of wolves, but they're wolves with cash.
D_Dialogue.UniaoLandingDonut1-Text-0: Uniao only care about one thing, power - but at least they're consistent.
D_Dialogue.UniaoMissionEnd3-Text-0: Uniao's gonna like this, a lot.
D_Dialogue.UniaoMissionEnd2-Text-0: Uniao's got ambitions, so you'll be looking real good to them right now
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyBriefing-Text-1: Uniao's looking for detailed geo-data from the surface.
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyLanding-Text-1: Uniao's planning to change that - they want geological data, and lots of it.
D_Dialogue.UniaoBriefingDonut2-Text-0: Uniao've got a job for ya, if you don't mind who you're working for.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent18-Text-7: Unintelligent? Are you kidding me? Just look at this place, look at it.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bFactionDonut1-Text-4: Unless ... that's what Group 15 ... was looking for?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_1-Text-4: Unless there's more of them than we've seen.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_2-Text-2: Unless there's more of them than we've seen.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroCollectEquipmentB-Text-0: Unless you have a real eye for geo-data... You're really gonna need those beacons.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_Intro-Text-4: Unlike you Theodore, I take radiation extremely seriously. Don't you like having functioning organs?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT2_1-Text-6: Unluckily for you, I'm not going to share them.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionLongWay-Text-2: Up for a scenic hike? a dangerous one?
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionCollectedEquipment-Text-1: Up for repairing bleeding edge tech, with nothing but ya wits and what you can forage?
D_Dialogue.SurveyUplinkActivated2-Text-0: Uplink active - we're reading the stream nice and bright.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aBriefing-Text-6: Upside is, it pays real good, but it ain't a walk in the park.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchIntro-Text-3: Use of force is approved.... expected even.
D_Dialogue.BrandRemarkLM1-Text-1: Used to be the best company in America, back when the US was a thing.
D_Dialogue.MissionComplete8-Text-0: Very good - I'd say were finished here.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_7-Text-0: Very well, I'm dissapointed. But we've run out of time and budget.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-1: Vic - We just got a message from her.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_7-Text-0: Vic, does it ever get easier? The violence?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_4-Text-8: Vic- wait. Was that a joke? I didn't know you had it in you.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_4-Text-2: Victor is our intel guy, he's been an asset to the team.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_End-Text-4: Victor is still missing... I don't want to believe Theo... but... Where the hell is he?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-4: Victor! Please, I can't! I just can't...
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_5-Text-1: Victor? Victor! Come in? Where the hell is he? Victor!
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_3-Text-0: Violet Corps left you some toys to play with.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_7-Text-6: WE ARE TPS, THE UDA WILL FALL
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_7-Text-3: WE REPEAT. ALL PERSONNEL MUST EVACUATE FROM THIS SECTOR IMMEDIATELY
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-12: Wait wait wait. Slow down. We need to think this through. Iris, could we track the terraforming enzymes?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_5-Text-2: Wait, are the rest of the team still down there too?
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOPKEEP_APE_B_2-Text-1: Wait, it was HOW big?! Oh god, nope, I am not being paid enough to deal with this.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLostTeamItemBriefing-Text-1: Want you to track 'em down and recover what you can.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent9-Text-3: Warning. Orbital laser charging sequence has begun.
D_Dialogue.AnimalWarning3-Text-0: Watch out for angry wildlife, friend.
D_Dialogue.CreatureRemarkDen5-Text-0: Watch out, there may be more hiding in there.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionModerate7-Text-0: Watch out, these storms can get pretty nasty.
D_Dialogue.StormReactionAverage3-Text-0: Watch out, these things are known for lightning strikes.
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionBroken1-Text-0: Watch out, your tech seems to be malfunctioning.
D_Dialogue.OpenWorldIntroStyx-Text-1: Watch ya step, the name's no joke. It's sent many a prospector to meet their maker.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_End-Text-5: We agreed that in order to... preserve her memory... We're going to keep the finer details of today from the UDA, or anyone else that comes asking.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent2-Text-1: We always figured there'd be a small impact on wildlife we introduced here, hell we resequenced their genes...
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_STRANDED_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-2: We came to Icarus together after things hit the fan back on Blue.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Briefing-Text-1: We can only hope you get there before they start the terraforming process.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionMissionComplete-Text-2: We can tell Group 15 it wasn't hard to turn their prototype into a bomb.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationDenLocationRevealed2-Text-1: We can triangulate the general zone of its den or lair or whatever you wanna call it.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_Intro-Text-6: We can't believe- How could sh....
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_Briefing-Text-5: We could really use your help.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_Intro-Text-12: We could stop the whole process.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-13: We could track them, but it'll take some work.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_1-Text-2: We don't exactly have the best reputation for safety.
D_Dialogue.BW4_002_EXITEDROPHIP-Text-1: We don't have much terrain data. The crash sites are marked on your map though.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_3-Text-7: We don't want it going on-record or anything.
D_Dialogue.ScanWeatherComplete1-Text-1: We got a LOT of data outta that.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_1-Text-15: We got a problem. There is a huge creature that will surely get in the way if we don't take it out first.
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyUplinkComplete-Text-2: We got a whole lotta data outta that, and Uniao's gonna pay solid.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent2-Text-1: We have a signal from the next nearest team member for you.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_Briefing-Text-3: We have a... Situation. See you soon.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_2-Text-3: We have no idea what it looks like.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_11-Text-3: We have no other choice! She's going to destroy the whole bloody planet with us still on it! There's no ****ing way.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_5-Text-2: We have reason to suggest that the research team may have made it out alive, they're a liability.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent1-Text-0: We have the last known location of one of the team members marked on your map, please proceed to this location immediately.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent10End-Text-4: We look forward to working with you again, soon.
D_Dialogue.QuipFiller5-Text-0: We may actually have a chance of making it out of here alive.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_2-Text-4: We may as well just roll over and let TPS have the place at this rate.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C_5-Text-1: We may even be able to follow the creatures' trail from here.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_7-Text-4: We may only be defending ourselves out here... but seeing a fellow prospector laying dead never gets easier.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_1-Text-3: We might have to make some difficult choices, should the worst happen.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_1-Text-6: We might not get an opportunity like this again.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent9-Text-5: We miss you, please come home. I need my big sister. It's not the same without you.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent21End-Text-6: We need her help to move on this, I wonder what other shady dealings Group 15 have been hiding.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionLongWay-Text-1: We need one on the other side to clear the blockage.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent7-Text-1: We need time to collect and collate the scan data. You will need to protect the device.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D_01-Text-0: We need to get a good look at what they've been up to in there.
D_Dialogue.NPC_ZOOPKEEP_APE_B_1-Text-2: We need to get this job back on track. Here, take these supplies.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_11-Text-2: We need to know what they got away with.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFive_5-Text-3: We need to stop this. Please hurry!
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchBriefing-Text-1: We need to strike before they have a chance to escape. Prepare for an arduous pursuit.
D_Dialogue.StyxBExpeditionLeavingScanningAreaA-Text: We need you close to the scanner, prospector.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_2-Text-7: We should be able to send you schematics of a make-shift Beacon through your radio link.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationDenLocationRevealed3-Text-1: We should be able to track it back to its home area now.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D_04B-Text-4: We should catch up with Handler
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D2_7-Text-4: We should catch up with Handler.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_7-Text-0: We should check in with your boss to see what to do about this mess.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_34-Text-0: We stick together, we get this done-just stay on your toes.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_End-Text-9: We still have a job to do. For now, that's my focus. What you do now is up to you. Either way, take care.
D_Dialogue.DeliveryMissionSuccessful-Text-5: We trust your discretion, and that Group 15 will be able to call on you again.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_INTRO-Text-4: We understand there has been an incident, and would appreciate your cooperation in bringing the last surviving member of the forward science team back to safety.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent10End-Text-3: We value loyalty and commitment above all else. The Group always comes first.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_4-Text-4: We want you to test how it interacts with various elements.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent19-Text-3: We were rushed into starting the process, regardless of what it meant for native life.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent7-Text-1: We will send in a cleanup detachment for body disposal shortly.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_1-Text-2: We would have seen you coming down if you were close to Eden, So you're probably in TPS Territory.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_End-Text-6: We wouldn't want it to reflect badly on her, her family will be devastated enough as it is. Not to mention Sol... We both agreed that it's better if he doesn't know.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_CRISIS_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-1: We'd have been done for if you hadn't shown up.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_3-Text-1: We'll get stuck in here and see if we can find any more data that might help.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_22-Text-0: We'll get through this, just stick to the plan.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_7.1-Text-0: We'll need to disable the security system at an isolated level.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_7.2-Text-0: We'll need to disable the security system at an isolated level. Iris, can you hop on comms?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_1-Text-5: We're always looking for the next big thing. Sometimes literally.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_Intro-Text-1: We're bringing you down directly to Eden.
D_Dialogue.GH_INTRO_BRIEFING-Text-5: We're currently using a loophole to operate remotely on Icarus, so we can't aid you further than a few encrypted calls per contract. Time is money and all that.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_4-Text-6: We're en route to Eden, can we expect anything up ahead?
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEvent4-Text-2: We're gonna need to let the brains figure this one out and head back to safety for now.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_1-Text-0: We're heading back over to the lab now.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_2-Text-1: We're looking for any noticable behavior or variations between them.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionFindOasis-Text-0: We're looking for something nice for once! Kind of.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_16-Text-0: We're not even sure what half of this stuff does.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_2-Text-4: We're not getting the feed from your helmet cam either.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_3-Text-4: We're not the only ones who will know your location. All of Elysium will.
D_Dialogue.ResearchEndMission-Text-1: We're only just beginning to understand it.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Iris_10-Text-0: We're pushing the limits here-don't know how much longer this can hold.
D_Dialogue.SurveyRadarReady6-Text-0: We're reading the station, ready to go.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_2-Text-0: We've been given the last two locations they were working in to search.
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyLanding-Text-0: We've been on Icarus a few years now, but the place is still a black box.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent9-Text-1: We've decided that destruction of this site and surrounding area is in the best interests of the Group.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsBriefing-Text-0: We've got a brand-new part of Icarus for you to explore, friend.
D_Dialogue.ResearchEndMission-Text-3: We've got a long way to go.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestBriefing-Text-0: We've got a pretty gnarly missing person's case here for ya.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationDenLocationRevealed1-Text-1: We've got enough data to find this thing's lair.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLanding4b-Text-2: We've got intel on the last place anyone saw it.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_27-Text-0: We've got one shot at this-let's not screw it up.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderBriefing-Text-0: We've had an urgent one come through for ya
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_Intro-Text-2: We've had problems with prospectors being swarmed on landing.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E2_01-Text-0: We've had some reports of local wildlife going off the rails, so to speak.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_Briefing-Text-1: We've intercepted a message from TPS regarding a location that may be of interest to our investigation.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationMarker1-Text-2: We've marked another attack site on your map.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationMarker2-Text-3: We've marked one more attack report on your map.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Theo_19-Text-0: We've seen it all, haven't we? Just another gorgeous day full of rainbows and puppies on-planet.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_10-Text-5: We've... Already lost too many just getting Eden up and running.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBriefingGeneric2-Text-0: Weather down there's crashed another supply pod,
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aEnterArctic-Text-2: Weather never recovered - its just one big, rollin' storm.
D_Dialogue.WeatherEvent5-Text-0: Weather's about to get pretty crazy.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aEnterRegion-Text-1: Weird ass alien meadows that'd probably eat your face off, but whatever.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_8-Text-1: Welcome to Eden, home of the Eris Inquisition.
D_Dialogue.Recon1Landing-Text-0: Welcome to Icarus, friend. Looks like your first time down here. Call me Sol.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent7-Text-0: Well I'll be, the Group doesn't disappoint.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_OPT1_05-Text-0: Well Morris, I'd say I hope you're happy but you are in fact, dead.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_4-Text-3: Well actually if I were you I'd start a new life in Majorca, but...
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_End-Text-3: Well actually if I were you I'd start a new life in Majorca, but...
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_4-Text-3: Well actually if I were you I'd start a new life in Majorca, but...
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_E_2-Text-0: Well are you going to turn that thing on or what?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT2_2-Text-0: Well are you going to turn that thing on or what?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_13-Text-0: Well at least the control panel for the laser's bolted down.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionMissionComplete-Text-1: Well damn. Icarus keeps throwing surprises.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_3-Text-1: Well done, that was... quite something.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT2_4-Text-0: Well done, you just let loose a creature with an unknown potential mutation into the wild.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent8-Text-0: Well done, you may now place the beacon. It shouldn't take long to get an accurate location.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D2_3-Text-0: Well done, you placed a thing on the ground.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore4-Text-0: Well done. Just remember. All hell's gonna break loose as soon as you place that thing.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_2-Text-0: Well go on then, go forth and slay the day away.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_3-Text-1: Well meatbag, this may be the last time you get to hear my soothing voice.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetIntro-Text-0: Well now, you managed to get through the Ashlands. Nice work.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore2-Text-5: Well the UDA responded by shutting down the group entirely. They kicked off a massive inquest.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent4-Text-5: Well there you go, not much of a replacement then? Bucket of bolts.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_3_2_NEW-Text-0: Well well well, are you going to betray the company?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_1-Text-0: Well well well, if it isn't the consequences of your actions.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_4-Text-0: Well well well, it would appear that this was just the tip of the ape-berg.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_4-Text-0: Well well well, it would appear that this was just the tip of the ape-berg.
D_Dialogue.RelocatedEvent2-Text-0: Well well, looks like you got company partner.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_B_04-Text-0: Well would you look at that, I suggest you run, you idiot.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_G_02-Text-0: Well you better head inside and see what all the fuss is about.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_2-Text-0: Well, I can understand why these test subjects would want to leave.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_1-Text-0: Well, I didn't know you had it in you.
D_Dialogue.DH_ELy_M3_KillCreatures-Text-2: Well, I guess we know why they didn't bother evacuating 'em.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_2-Text-2: Well, I had a template selected when I first joined, I assume that if I don't return to orbit in time the UDA will just... send that one.
D_Dialogue.Ely_OpeningMission_2-Text-1: Well, I've got good news and bad news.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3_NEW_5-Text-0: Well, THAT wasn't in the report.
D_Dialogue.Recon1Landing-Text-4: Well, UDA wants you to show you understand the basics, before they send you anywhere really dangerous.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_2-Text-0: Well, are you going to start moving or just stand there drooling on the spot?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A2_02-Text-0: Well, are you going to start moving or just stand there drooling on the spot?
D_Dialogue.MissionFailed1-Text-0: Well, can't complete the mission without it, looks like we are headin' back up.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent3-Text-1: Well, hey, it's time to figure that out for yourself.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_4-Text-9: Well, if you're done with your treasure hunt I suppose we can call it a day.
D_Dialogue.ExtractionReachCaveZone2a-Text-0: Well, it's supposed to be round here somewhere.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_C_01-Text-5: Well, let me take a look.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_4-Text-0: Well, look at that. You're not entirely useless after all.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D2_6-Text-0: Well, look at that. You're not entirely useless after all.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_3-Text-0: Well, look at you go. A dead drop has been established.
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_M2_CaveBlocker-Text-0: Well, my job here is done. Good luck kid.
D_Dialogue.MissionComplete15-Text-0: Well, put a bow on it.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_1-Text-1: Well, report might be the wrong term. It's uh, 98% screaming and 2% geodata.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent7-Text-0: Well, so much for rescuing the team.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationReachLair3-Text-0: Well, something sure lives in there.
D_Dialogue.StyxDExpeditionLanding-Text-0: Well, somethings screwing with the orbital scan. Again. We'll need to do this the hard way.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderEvent4-Text-3: Well, suppose it doesn't change the job. Better clean this place out.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent12End-Text-0: Well, that about covers it. Your next few missions will be delivered from the disembodied robot voice until you get back to UDA level.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent12-Text-0: Well, that about covers it. Your next few missions will be delivered from the disembodied robot voice until you get back to UDA level.
D_Dialogue.MissionFailed3-Text-0: Well, that didn't go well. Guess we gotta start over.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent5-Text-0: Well, that must be one of our new friends.
D_Dialogue.BW5_BACKATDROPSHIP-Text-0: Well, that was one wild trip.
D_Dialogue.QuipFiller1-Text-0: Well, that's life on Icarus for ya. One step forward, one dropship back.
D_Dialogue.ScanWeatherComplete2-Text-0: Well, that's the worst of it.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_1-Text-3: Well, they sent us here to investigate. That's a fair amount of money to waste on a fake expedition.
D_Dialogue.Survey2aLocationReached1-Text-0: Well, this is where they want the GPR.
D_Dialogue.DH_BLACKMARKET_AGENT_01-Text-0: Well, well well. Have we met? Maybe. Maybe not.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionMissionComplete-Text-0: Well, would you look at that.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT1_3-Text-2: Well, you got the biosignature down. We can move on.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_OPT1_03-Text-1: Well, you know what to do. A dead man doesn't need whatever's in his pockets.
D_Dialogue.BW3Objective02-Text-0: Well, you made it to the Arctic.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_1-Text-7: Well. When flowers start killing other flowers... I say salt the ****ing fields.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderIntro1-Text-5: Well. You hear that? Some brave soul decided to make off with Group 15 tech.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_INTRO-Text-9: Well... You'll have AGENT. Though.. these days I'm not sure if that counts as help.
D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionBreifing-Text-1: Well....  data on my personal map marks it as "Dusty Barrens"
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C2_2-Text-0: Well? What are you waiting for?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_2-Text-0: Well? What are you waiting for?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_END_1-Text-10: Were you a poacher in a past life?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_2-Text-1: Were you able to get a message off to your family?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_8-Text-5: Were you able to get those bullets working?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_2-Text-1: What a beautiful day for murder.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_2.2-Text-1: What a beautiful day for murder.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D_2-Text-0: What a huge deposit, I hope it's worth the lives you didn't bother saving.
D_Dialogue.ASHLANDS_CRISIS_CHURCH_OUTRO-Text-0: What a relief, thanks a lot mate. Absolute legend.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_F2-Text-1: What a shame that would be.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_G_03-Text-0: What a shame, it only wanted to hug you. With its teeth.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.1-Text-0: What a shame. I will inform the critically damaged contractor their beloved mount has perished.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E_01-Text-1: What a shocking twist, I am soooooo surprised.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_E_1-Text-1: What a shocking twist, I am soooooo surprised.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadIntro-Text-6: What a time to be alive!
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_A_3-Text-2: What a waste of grey matter.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore1-Text-12: What am I doing working for them again?
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_OPT1_02-Text-1: What could possibly be so important that he'd refuse to leave without it?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_8-Text-7: What else were they doing here? It's our job to find out.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bBossSpawn-Text-0: What in SEVEN FLAVORS OF F**K is THAT?!
D_Dialogue.BW5_010_BOSSSPAWN-Text-0: What in SEVEN FLAVORS OF FUCK is THAT?!
D_Dialogue.BW5_011_BOSSSPAWNPG-Text-0: What in SEVEN FLAVORS OF HELL is THAT?!
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_End-Text-2: What is it- No that... that can't be.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_3-Text-0: What is that? Could this be a piece of the aforementioned 'apparatus' from the logs you found?
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.3-Text-1: What is the purpose of your presence in this location?
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent8.5-Text-1: What is the purpose of your presence in this location?
D_Dialogue.RecoveryActivateItem4b_1-Text-5: What it does, I got no idea.
D_Dialogue.ConfusedReaction5-Text-0: What on Icarus are you doing?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_6-Text-5: What on earth are you talking about-
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent10-Text-0: What on earth do you think you're doing, Prospector? You are completely off course.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent6-Text-0: What on earth is that? Don't just stand there, get rid of it.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_1-Text-1: What other reason could there possibly be for blocking off an entire area of Icarus, right under the UDA's nose?
D_Dialogue.ConfusedReaction1-Text-0: What the devil is that thing?
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent17-Text-2: What the hell are these markings? What the hell have you been messing around with down here?
D_Dialogue.PROM_FRACTURE_EVENT17c-Text-0: What the hell are these markings? What the hell have you been messing with down here?!
D_Dialogue.ConfusedReaction2-Text-0: What the hell did you do?
D_Dialogue.GenericReaction3-Text-0: What the hell have they been messing with down here?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_4-Text-3: What the hell is it now- uh...AGENT? What am I looking at on my screen?
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEvent4-Text-1: What the hell is that sticking outta them?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_02-Text-0: What the hell took a bite out of them? Actually, don't answer that.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_A_02-Text-0: What the hell were they doing here?
D_Dialogue.DH_ELy_M3_KillCreatures-Text-0: What the hell were those things? Were they-
D_Dialogue.PromTempestEvent3-Text-1: What was that? Prospector... There may be a threat nearby.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEvent2-Text-2: What we do know is that it's likely to be just as inhospitable as the Ashlands, if not worse.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent1-Text-1: What we do know is, the terraforming did. not. work.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadIntro-Text-2: What we do know is, the terraforming did. not. work.
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D2_07-Text-0: What would you do with a brain if you had one? It's right in front of you, meatbag.
D_Dialogue.Recon_Points-Text-2: What you do with that knowledge, well, that's up to you.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent19-Text-1: What you're seeing here is no lie. The Group knew that these creatures lived peacefully on Icarus.
D_Dialogue.BW4_008_ITEMRETRIEVED1-Text-3: What's in there, you want it to STAY in there.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_4-Text-0: What's that smell? Ah yes, the stench of death. It clings to every human I've ever worked with.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_E_1-Text-0: What's this? You want to keep the equipment for your own personal gain?
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E_01-Text-0: What's this? You want to slaughter them all to cover up the research on behalf of The Company?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_D2_02-Text-1: What, did you think I was really just going to do it all for you?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A_01-Text-2: What, did you think you would just waltz on in? What an idiot...
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_C2_04-Text-1: What? Are you going to just stand there and gawk at it?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_OZ1_05-Text-1: What? Are you really going to turn up your nose at the chance to help them?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT1_4-Text-0: What? Did you think you were just going to be handed everything you need?
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_ADD2_E2-Text-0: What? Did you want me to hold your hand while you work?
D_Dialogue.AshlandsEvent4-Text-0: What? I've seen some pretty weird looking stuff in my time on-planet but I've never seen something like that before.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_1-Text-3: What?! Theo! Is someone taking bets on squad survival?!?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C3_4-Text-5: What?! You can't let that thing get away! Sh-
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bLanding-Text-0: Whatever happened to that dropship, Lagos needs to know fast.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4bNextLocation2-Text-0: Whatever happened to the dropship, they've got another possible crash site.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3-Text-15: Whatever is causing this destruction probably won't just move on because you asked nicely.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_8-Text-1: Whatever is causing this destruction probably won't just move on because you asked nicely.
D_Dialogue.ResearchLanding2b-Text-2: Whatever it is, they need samples.
D_Dialogue.BW4_012_BOSSSPAWN2-Text-0: Whatever that satellite's doing, the wildlife really don't like it.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryActivateItem4b_3-Text-0: Whatever the hell that was, it killed our comms.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLandingGeneric1-Text-4: Whatever they do when Sinotai finds out, well, that's their problem.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2bWormsDead-Text-0: Whatever those were, Group 15's gonna be interested as hell.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLandingGeneric2-Text-1: Whatever went down wasn't supposed to be there.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefing6-Text-0: Whatever you heard, there's more to the story.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationLanding2-Text-1: Whatever you wanna do, it's fine with them.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationLandingSpare2-Text-0: Whatever's been hunting their people, it's still out there.
D_Dialogue.ResearchLandingGeneric1-Text-2: Whatever's growing in the target zone, it's got 'em excited.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_FOUND_LOGS-Text-2: When I have a complete log ready I'll inform you.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_9-Text-3: When I heard that she was still alive, goodness, it was such a huge shock.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_7-Text-1: When I was last here I left the hunting and such to the rest of the team. I'm not very good with blood.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_7-Text-0: When in doubt, blunt force trauma to the back of the head.
D_Dialogue.GenericBriefingAssembly2-Text-0: When it comes to exotics, the Assembly have a one track mind.
D_Dialogue.ExpeditionProtectBeacon3-Text-0: When it's done sync'ing, you're good.
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aEnterArctic-Text-0: When terraforming went south, the temperature up here didn't just drop, it went into freefall.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_Lore3-Text-1: When the Investigation started Earth-side, Elysium was constantly mentioned in Group 15 docs.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_8-Text-3: When the UDA asked me to pu-. Well. When Sol asked me to put together a team...
D_Dialogue.BW4_001_BRIEFING-Text-1: When the terraforming went south, UDA mothballed their bio-satellites and walked away.
D_Dialogue.FM1ResearchFindItem3-Text-1: When the terraforming went south, the temperature up here crashed through the floor.
D_Dialogue.LagosUnitMissionEnd2-Text-0: When you help the Lagos Unit, you're helping the people who own this planet.
D_Dialogue.ACSLandingDonut2-Text-0: When you're working for the ACS you always know where you stand - you're a tool.
D_Dialogue.Recon_Low_Oxygen-Text-1: When your oxygen gets low, you'll need to find oxite.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_4-Text-3: Whenever he decides to actually pick up his comms unit...
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Victor_23-Text-0: Where could they be coming from?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_6-Text-0: Where does that go- you know what, I don't want to know.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_INTRO-Text-1: Where is the f***ing paperwork, it's around here somewhere... ah right.
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindSameItem3-Text-1: Where the hell are these coming from?
D_Dialogue.SurveyGenericBriefing2-Text-2: Which gives you at least two good reasons to take this one.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryBriefing4a-Text-2: Which happens, but this, this is a problem.
D_Dialogue.MissionComplete3-Text-2: Which is more than a lot of folk can say.
D_Dialogue.Scanning4aLanding-Text-2: Which is where you come in.
D_Dialogue.RecoveryLandingGeneric2-Text-2: Which makes it valuable to almost everyone.
D_Dialogue.Scanning4aLanding-Text-1: Which means prospectors, who need drop zones, which requires terrain data.
D_Dialogue.Scanning1Landing-Text-2: Which means they need terrain data, and a heap of it, fast.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aEnterRegion-Text-4: Which means you need to find a path to the interior.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_SMPL3_OUTRO-Text-3: While he seemed to think he was contagious, the initial analysis of the previous bodies shows that this exotic infection is transmitted via the surroundings of the Null Sector itself.
D_Dialogue.IceSheetEnding-Text-0: While they figure out how to get into the next section, I'd suggest you focus on recovering.
D_Dialogue.PromDispatchEvent9-Text-2: While we have no further use for this site. You may find useful items hidden around the criminal's encampment.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent20-Text-5: While you were pulling your hair out trying to keep this shit quiet, I took the liberty of uploading all the logs we've gathered over the last few weeks.
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_NPC_04-Text-0: Who are you, don't come closer. Don't come closer!
D_Dialogue.NULSEC_FINAL_NPC_04-Text-2: Who are you, who am I? Don't, don't come closer...
D_Dialogue.Expedition2aBriefing-Text-4: Whole new zone - untouched, uncharted, and seriously unsafe.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedEvent9-Text-7: Why do they keep sending these to me? Don't they know being stuck alone here is torture enough?
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Mo_3-Text-0: Why does it always fall on me to fix these things?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_7-Text-7: Why does this crap always fall on me.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_FRAGMENTS-Text-1: Why don't you try make something useful out of those fragments?
D_Dialogue.GenericReaction2-Text-0: Why the hell- uh, never mind.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_1-Text-2: Why you or anyone would voluntarily go near those things, I'll never know.
D_Dialogue.AnimalWarning2-Text-1: Wildlife doesn't like this kinda thing.
D_Dialogue.ExterminationBriefing3-Text-0: Wildlife's been causing problems for their people down there.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_1-Text-3: Will this be the day I am finally rid of you? Only time will tell.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationBriefing-Text-3: Wish I could tell you more, but data's light on the ground right now.
D_Dialogue.UnlockNewRecipe-Text-2: With new discoveries come new designs, recipes and ideas.
D_Dialogue.Recon_Points-Text-1: With new skills, come new possibilities.
D_Dialogue.FM4SurveyLanding-Text-4: With that much data, you'll need a central uplink to beam it up here.
D_Dialogue.Expedition3BeaconCollected-Text-1: Without them, navigation systems are almost useless.
D_Dialogue.Survey2aRadarCollected-Text-1: Without them, we're searchin' for exotics blind.

D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A2_03-Text-0: Woooow. Well done, you found them.
D_Dialogue.StyxIntroBriefing-Text-0: Word has it that the Largos Chair has declared this area safe for prospecting.
D_Dialogue.AssemblyLandingDonut3-Text-0: Working with the Assembly's a smart bet - and they're moving faster than anyone out here.
D_Dialogue.FactionRemarkGroupFifteen2-Text-0: Would it really kill Group 15 to give us a heads up about this stuff?
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_End-Text-12: Would somebody please explain what the hell is going on!
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_2-Text-0: Would you like me to play you some music while you work?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_6-Text-4: Wouldn't want you to become completely useless.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3-Text-3: Wow Prospector, what a great job you're doing Prospector, I love you Prospector.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_6-Text-3: Wow Prospector, what a great job you're doing Prospector, I love you Prospector.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_3-Text-0: Wow, Well done, you found it. Careful getting in there! Now, grab any documents and equipment that you can find and return them to orbit.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_3-Text-0: Wow, what a lot of damage, imagine if this could have been stopped.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Theo_10-Text-0: Yeah I'll take the next mission, but only if we get proper intel this time.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionFour_4-Text-3: Yeah that's one word for them.
D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Theo_8-Text-0: Yeah, I've been through worse, I'm not taking anything for granted.
D_Dialogue.DH_ELY_EDEN_AUDIOLOG_1-Text-2: Yeah, I've got most of the team assembled, the UDA insisted on throwing some meathead into the mix though.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_End-Text-19: Yeah, Prospector, I've got another job I need to do. Come back to Eden when you're ready for more work.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_1-Text-4: Yeah, no offense and all but you gotta make your money somewhere, it sure as hell ain't comin' from the UDA these days.
D_Dialogue.FactionRemarkAssembly2-Text-0: Yeah.. the Assembly probably should'a put this in the briefing.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_2-Text-5: Yes I'm sure, because we won't be dying here.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_A_5-Text-0: Yes yes, well done and all that. What do you want, a medal?
D_Dialogue.GH_IM_NEW_A2_05-Text-0: Yes yes, well done and all that. What do you want, a medal?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_END_4-Text-2: Yes! Yes, oh thank god yes.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_4-Text-13: Yes, yes, but saving lives won't make you rich will it Contractor?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT1_1-Text-1: Yet, The Company refers to them as a liability.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationBossDead-Text-0: You almost made that look easy.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent21End-Text-0: You alright, friend? Wow. What a ride.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent6-Text-3: You are advised that once the aforementioned creature has been escorted back to the contractor's encampment, you may make use of any of the supplies left behind.
D_Dialogue.AshlandsStageArea-Text-1: You are approaching a known entrance to the Null Sector.
D_Dialogue.PromOffenderIntro1-Text-2: You are the nearest contractor to the site. Further instructions will be relayed to you shortly via precursory methodology.
D_Dialogue.StyxEExpeditionCollectedEquipment-Text-2: You better be, it's the only way we move foward.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT3_1-Text-3: You better believe I'll be keeping a score.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT4_1-Text-3: You better believe I'll be keeping a score...
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent5-Text-1: You can either take it out, or sneak past it.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent2-Text-1: You can either take it out, or sneak past it.
D_Dialogue.PromFractureEvent12-Text-6: You can find the evidence for yourself not too far from here. I'll leave directions with this log.
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent11-Text-2: You can get it delivered just by pressing a few buttons. What a time to be alive.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent11-Text-8: You can get it delivered just by pressing a few buttons. What a time to be alive.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_F_4-Text-7: You can go ahead and track it, or if you have some time
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_INTRO-Text-8: You can handle this by yourself right?
D_Dialogue.Recon1FinishSubLevel10-Text-0: You can head back, but until UDA's satisfied you know what you're doin, they're just gonna send you back down.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent9-Text-7: You can interact with the radio again to get your next assignment whenever you feel like it.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_1-Text-4: You can start by collecting samples to send back up to Norex's labs.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_B_1-Text-3: You can start by proceeding to a collection of caves nearby.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_7-Text-4: You can stay here where you are and help replenish the resources lost in the attack...
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_E_1-Text-3: You can't just do this anywhere you know.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT2_1-Text-4: You can't just do this anywhere you know.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E_02-Text-0: You can't just do this anywhere.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C2_1-Text-6: You can't just set that sort of thing up anywhere, you'll need a spot that's likely to fly under the radar.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_E_2-Text-1: You can't possibly be considering caution at this stage.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_OPT2_2-Text-1: You can't possibly be considering caution at this stage.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_INFANT_FIND-Text-1: You can't ship it off looking like that! Poor thing

D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_OPT2_8-Text-1: You certainly wouldn't hold up very well.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_5-Text-0: You could be doing literally anything else, you know.
D_Dialogue.BW4_015_ITEMRETRIEVED2-Text-2: You crack that at ground level, and it'd eat everything from here to the horizon.

D_Dialogue.MissionComplete3-Text-1: You did it, and lived to tell the tale.
D_Dialogue.FM3ExterminationBossDead1-Text-0: You did it, they're all down.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_END_5-Text-0: You did it? I mean, of course you did. You're a pro.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_8-Text-3: You did well with your first official Inquisition task.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_D_1-Text-4: You didn't expect to just call them up did you?

D_Dialogue.LagosUnitMissionEnd1-Text-0: You don't get far round here without the Lagos Unit's help.
D_Dialogue.SurveyFishHarvest-Text-1: You don't have much time before that things rots.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionSix_5-Text-1: You don't need to do this, there's still time, you need to get off-planet!
D_Dialogue.ResearchFindItem5-Text-0: You don't see that every day ... Icarus never ceases to surprise.

D_Dialogue.RecoveryFindItem4b3-Text-3: You feel like there's something they're not telling us?

D_Dialogue.RecoveryBriefingExtra-Text-2: You get it back, there's a decent payout.

D_Dialogue.DH_Bark_Theo_16-Text-0: You get used to the grind, but it's still a hard way to live.
D_Dialogue.ReturnToDropship4-Text-0: You got a little time left, so head back to the dropship when you're ready.
D_Dialogue.Expedition4aRecoveredAllItems-Text-0: You got all the pieces of that rig.
D_Dialogue.BW4_022_ITEMRETRIEVED3-Text-1: You got enough bio-enzymes there to reshape a decent chunk of this planet.

D_Dialogue.InfestationPoint2-Text-0: You got friends incoming - so make it count.

D_Dialogue.BW4_004_ACTIVATESATTELITE1-Text-2: You gotta arm it to get the warhead out.

D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionTwo_2-Text-1: You hear whatever the powers want you to hear.

D_Dialogue.StyxIntroMissionComplete-Text-1: You know, something about this place just gives me the creeps
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_C_6-Text-0: You look tired... Just one more, contractor.

D_Dialogue.BW5_007_ENTERRADARZONE-Text-1: You made it to the scanning zone.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_6-Text-0: You made it! This is Eden. Home sweet home.

D_Dialogue.StyxCExpeditionBreifing-Text-5: You may be the first someone to survive it.

D_Dialogue.SMPL3_GENERIC_4-Text-0: You may proceed to the marked location.
D_Dialogue.DeviceInteractionProtect3-Text-0: You may want to head back to the device.

D_Dialogue.Expedition3DeployedWrong-Text-1: You need to build up more.

D_Dialogue.StormReactionSevere3-Text-0: You need to get to shelter, immediately.

D_Dialogue.SurveyBriefingStorm-Text-2: You ready for some storm chasin'?

D_Dialogue.PromNomadIntro-Text-4: You see, you'll be able to get back to the station whenever you'd like.

D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_D_2-Text-1: You seem to know your way around explosives.

D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_2-Text-0: You're really good at this, in a really bad way.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_D2_1-Text-3: You're tasked with repairing the outpost and making sure it's up to scratch for the survivors to return to.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_C2_1-Text-1: You're tasked with travelling to the marked coordinates and observing their behaviour.
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_OPT1_1-Text-4: You've been given a search radius to start with.
D_Dialogue.GenericLandingFriendly1-Text-0: You've been on a fair few drops now, friend.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_C_4-Text-1: You've exceeded my extremely, extremely low expectations.
D_Dialogue.GH_APE_B_6-Text-2: You've got a choice. Our Engineering team would like you to continue where the previous team left off.
D_Dialogue.ExplorationLanding5-Text-1: You've got full access to this area, until they change their mind.
D_Dialogue.PromTempestIntro1-Text-2: You've got some hellish weather on the horizon.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionOne_9-Text-6: You've gotta be tough as nails to make a living out here.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent12-Text-1: You've gotta build the Infrasonic Relay Device for that. Then we can get back to working together again.
D_Dialogue.Scanning4bBriefing-Text-0: You've helped open Icarus up, but there's still some major blanks on the map.
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_E_3-Text-0: You've worked for the UDA for quite some time, haven't you?
D_Dialogue.GH_RCKGLM_F_6-Text-0: You've worked for the UDA for quite some time, haven't you?
D_Dialogue.GH_ICEMAM_B_7-Text-11: You- WHAT- uh- That's HANDLER to you.
D_Dialogue.SpecialGenericLanding1-Text-2: Your HUD should have all the info you need.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_E2_02-Text-0: Your first instruction is to set up a hunting base, though, aren't all bases made for hunting?
D_Dialogue.PromNomadEvent8-Text-6: Your first mission is to cultivate and harvest one tomato.
D_Dialogue.V2PromNomadEvent4-Text-6: Your first mission is to cultivate and harvest one tomato.
D_Dialogue.PromShadowedIntro1-Text-6: Your guide should provide mission details. We look forward to working with you further.
D_Dialogue.Ely_MissionThree_Intro-Text-4: Your job is to get in, and extract as much information as possible.
D_Dialogue.GH_AGENT_NEW_APE_D2_04-Text-1: Your morals just became even more questionable.
D_Dialogue.GH_RG_A_END-Text-1: Your next contract can be found on the NOVA Station.

D_DynamicQuests.Build-Description: Build a Watchtower and place a beacon to mark the location on the map for future UDA use.
D_DynamicQuests.Scan-Description: Collect a Radar and Perform a simple scan for the UDA.
D_DynamicQuests.Tools-Description: Craft some tools to help out a new prospector in need, to be delivered by the UDA.
D_DynamicQuests.Cache-Description: Find a Cache within an area left behind by other prospectors.
D_DynamicQuests.Tame-Description: Find and Tame a nearby wild creature to see if it can be domesticated for prospector use.
D_DynamicQuests.Mine-Description: Find and mine some ore for delivery to the UDA.
D_DynamicQuests.Collect-Description: Find the bodies of a prospector team killed while on Icarus, and deliver their IDs to the UDA.
D_DynamicQuests.Grow-Description: Grow some crops to deliver to the UDA.
D_DynamicQuests.Boss-Description: Hunt down a creature driven mad by the terraforming process.
D_DynamicQuests.Hunt-Description: Hunt some nearby creatures in the current area to help make the area safe for other prospectors.
D_DynamicQuests.Drone-Description: Locate a Downed Drone and Protect it while it uploads its Data. Time Sensitive.
D_DynamicQuests.Lost-Description: Locate an Abandoned Base and search it for the UDA

D_Hints.10-Text: Fill oxygen tanks with an oxite dissolver.
D_Hints.12-Text: Gather rare herbs, then use the mortar and pestle to grind medicinal pastes
D_Hints.1-Text: Hold 'ALT' and drag off a stack to take single items
D_Hints.2-Text: Hold 'SHIFT' and drag to halve the stack into another slot
D_Hints.18-Text: Icarus is an Earth-sized moon of the gas giant Minos.
D_Hints.7-Text: Move the camera in 3rd person by holding ALT.
D_Hints.11-Text: Sickles increase the amount of fiber harvested
D_Hints.9-Text: Skinning benches deliver more resources from animal carcasses.
D_Hints.17-Text: Terraforming on Icarus collapsed due to the effects of exotic matter.
D_Hints.14-Text: The United Development Agency was created to oversee terraforming on Icarus.
D_Hints.8-Text: Workbenches and other items may be damaged by storms if not sheltered.
D_Hints.3-Text: Your Utility slot is for carrying large items like animal carcasses and extractors.

D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Inaris_Delta-Descripti: A sturdy pickaxe that gets the job done
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Pickaxe_Shengong_Delta-FlavorT: "A pick axe ain't never run outta power." - Sol Berlinski
D_Itemable.Item_Platinum_Axe-FlavorText: "Give me six hours to chop down a tree, I'll spend the first four sharpening the axe" - A. Lincoln
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Consumption-FlavorText: "Like terraforming for your body." - Anonymous Group 15 researcher
D_Itemable.Item_Platinum_Hammer-FlavorText: "On Icarus, you're either the hammer, or the anvil" - Javier Survez
D_Itemable.Item_Meat_Pie-FlavorText: "Stress cannot exist in the presence of a pie." - David Mamet
D_Itemable.Item_Basic_Ceiling_Light-FlavorText: "We forgive children who are afraid of the dark. The tragedy is adults afraid of the light." - Plato
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_SnowLeopard-FlavorText: "We nod, grimace, and resume our paths to separate destinies and graves." - Peter Matthiessen, The Snow Leopard
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_SnowLeopard_Alpha-FlavorTex: "We nod, grimace, and resume our paths to separate destinies and graves." - Peter Matthiessen, The Snow Leopard
D_Itemable.Item_Titanium_Bolt-FlavorText: "When you've got two tons of polar bear lumbering towards you across the ice, you suddenly realise a bullet's not going to cut it. But a titanium bolt through the eye, that's another story." - Sol Berlinski
D_Itemable.Item_Bed_Bedroll-FlavorText: 'A bed is where the soul returns after a night's travelling' ~ Russian folk saying
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_DesertDeer-FlavorText: 'A hunter who is going to shoot an antelope does not waste his bullets on the dog.' - Israelmore Ayivor
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Charlie-FlavorT: 'A knife does not recognise its owner.' ~ Proverb
D_Itemable.Item_Metal_Knife-FlavorText: 'A mind all logic is like a knife all blade. It makes the hand bleed that uses it.' -- Rabindranath Tagore
D_Itemable.Item_Metal_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText: 'A mind all logic is like a knife all blade. It makes the hand bleed that uses it.' -- Rabindranath Tagore
D_Itemable.Item_Aluminium-FlavorText: 'I don't have aluminium foil on my windows any more.' - Rick James
D_Itemable.Item_Metal_Spear-FlavorText: 'I throw a spear into the darkness. That is intuition. Then I must send an army into the darkness to find the spear. That is intellect.' -- Ingmar Bergman
D_Itemable.Item_Metal_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText: 'I throw a spear into the darkness. That is intuition. Then I must send an army into the darkness to find the spear. That is intellect.' -- Ingmar Bergman
D_Itemable.Item_Pastry-FlavorText: 'Icarus was only truly colonized when we began making pastry on that planet' - Jacques Merrida
D_Itemable.Item_Poison_Paste-FlavorText: 'Life is a slow working poison' - Jean Hurvit
D_Itemable.Item_Gunpowder-FlavorText: 'Not the best we could do, but not the worst either' - Sol Berlinski
D_Itemable.Item_Fire_Arrow-FlavorText: 'One of the good things about being this far from Earth, there's no-one to tell you not to play with fire.' - Sol Berlinski
D_Itemable.Item_Wood_Flare-FlavorText: 'One thing about wearing a helmet, you don't notice your shack smells like Satan's armpit.' ~ Sol Berlinski. (Activate with secondary attack.)
D_Itemable.Item_Electric_Fireplace_Ext-FlavorText: 'Sometimes it felt like I had joined a rustic interior decoration cult' - M. Le Baroni
D_Itemable.Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Ext-FlavorText: 'Sometimes it felt like I had joined a rustic interior decoration cult' - M. Le Baroni
D_Itemable.Item_Gas_Fireplace_Ext-FlavorText: 'Sometimes it felt like I had joined a rustic interior decoration cult' - M. Le Baroni
D_Itemable.Item_Metal_Axe-FlavorText: 'Technological progress is like an axe in the hands of a pathological criminal.' -- Albert Einstein
D_Itemable.Item_Crossbow-FlavorText: 'The first time I held a crossbow, I was confused. How can you feel powerful and so medieval at the same time?' -- Anton Chang
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Knife_Shengong_Beta-FlavorText: 'The knife of the family does not cut.' ~ Proverb

D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Arctic_Moa-FlavorText: Adapted from it's temperate counterpart this variation thrived in the arctic regions of Icarus.
D_Itemable.Item_Lily-FlavorText: Adapting to the exotics-infused soil of Icarus, this lily has acquired unusual and useful new chemical properties.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Beta-FlavorT: Additive manufacturing became the production process of choice following much needed advances in micro-recycling, which allowed almost any metallic compound to be processed, purified and reused as print material.
D_Itemable.Item_Composter_Electric-Description: Advanced biofuel unit for accelerated production.
D_Itemable.Item_Seismic_Probe-Description: After a brief scan this will point towards the source of unnatural vibrations.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_PolarBear-FlavorText: After the Climate Emergency on Earth, the polar bear was approaching extinction. On Icarus, its variant has found a home on the planet's newly-formed artic zones.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Super_Ration-FlavorText: Agrizero's 'Eat and forget' campaign never truly hit home, suggesting the food was either immemorable or best wiped from one's memory. Regardless, the product provides a huge amount of nutrition in a small space.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Oxygen_Gel-Description: Agrizero's patented gel supplement lowers the heart rate, reducing oxygen consumption.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Biolab_Inhaler_AlphaWolf-Flavo: Ah, the wonders of modern medicine.

D_Itemable.Item_Building_UpgradeTool-FlavorText: Allows you to replace an existing structural piece for an advanced version, if you have that item in your inventory. Hold 'R" when holding the tool.
D_Itemable.Item_IceMammoth_Trap-FlavorText: Almost like a Venus Fly Trap - but with Icicles
D_Itemable.Item_Banana_Tart-FlavorText: Almost makes you forget where you are - almost.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Elephant-FlavorText: Almost vanished on Earth, the Indian elephant was brought to Icarus to improve its chances of survival.
D_Itemable.Item_Clay-FlavorText: Also a popular medium for artists.
D_Itemable.Item_Kiwi_Fruit-FlavorText: Also known as a Chinese Gooseberry
D_Itemable.Item_Scoria-FlavorText: Also known in some areas as 'lava stone'.
D_Itemable.Item_LegendaryWeapon_Ape_Club-FlavorText: An Ape Club? Real original, Norex
D_Itemable.Item_Slug_Axe-Description: An Axe crafted from the spoils of victory against a Hammerhead.
D_Itemable.Item_Ammo_EDS-Description: An Enzyme Delivery System - a hard outer case with Enzymes inside. Use with your favourite projectile-firing weapon - pistol, shotgun or rifle.
D_Itemable.Item_StoneBrick_Fireplace_Ext-Descriptio: An Extension for the Stone Brick Fireplace.
D_Itemable.Item_Flare_Gun-Description: An Instrument which can be used to project your position into the sky.

D_Itemable.Item_Bone_Spear-FlavorText: As most new arrivals on Icarus realise at some stage, there is a certain elegance to hunting an animal for its bones, in order to craft a more effective weapon to hunt further animals.

D_Itemable.Item_Cement_Mixer-FlavorText: Concrete is composed of two essential elements: aggregate and a cement binder, with ratios depending on the specific design mix. Specialized concrete engineers are rare on Icarus, though.
D_Itemable.Item_Condensed_Enzymes-Description: Condensed Enzymes Extracted from an Enzyme Geyser
D_Itemable.Item_Radar_Electric-FlavorText: Connect this baby up to a generator and you are good to go.
D_Itemable.Item_Flow_Meter-Description: Connect this to any resource network for a breakdown of flow rates and devices.
D_Itemable.Item_GH_Radio-Description: Connects to a nearby NOVA Station for accessing Great Hunt contracts.
D_Itemable.Item_Egg_Salad-Description: Considered a delicacy back on earth.
D_Itemable.Item_Mission_Radio-Description: Contacts a nearby C0NT4CT Device to kick off Operations on the go. Will not work if there is no C0NT4CT device placed on the map.
D_Itemable.Item_Bunker_Whiteboard-Description: Contains a lot of formulas and something related to exotics.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Eden_Whiteboard-Description: Contains a lot of notes related to the evolution and experimentation on Subspecies 1341.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Corkboard_Large-Description: Contains notes and detailed diagrams of various things.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Corkboard_Small-Description: Contains notes and detailed diagrams of various things.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Eden_Corkboard-Description: Contains notes and detailed diagrams of various things.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Clipboard-Description: Contains notes on Experiments and Observations.
D_Itemable.Item_Laser_Attachment_Electric-Descripti: Converts Laser Collision Damage into Electric.
D_Itemable.Item_Laser_Attachment_Fire-Description: Converts Laser Collision Damage into Fire.

D_Itemable.Item_Laser_Attachment_Frost-Description: Converts Laser Collision Damage into Frost.
D_Itemable.Item_Corn-FlavorText: Cook or cultivate this ancient cereal, humanity's most widely produced grain.
D_Itemable.Item_White_Meat_Smoked-FlavorText: Cooked in soy, chewy but not too chewy.
D_Itemable.Item_Cooked_Meat-FlavorText: Cooked meat is easier to digest and provides more nutrition than raw flesh.
D_Itemable.Item_Cooked_Truffle-Description: Cooked to enhance its earthy, luxurious flavour.
D_Itemable.Item_Fireplace-Description: Cooks food swiftly and safely. Basically a large enclosed firepit, for a more homely feel.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Swamp_Slug_Enzyme-Descripti: Corpse of a giant slug, modified by enzyme research.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Swamp_Slug-Description: Corpse of a giant slug, poisonous slime still drips off its lifeless body.
D_Itemable.Mission_Broken_Solar_Panel-Description: Could be repaired with a bit of patience

D_Itemable.Item_Titanium_Hammer-FlavorText: Counter the forces of nature with a little violence of your own.

D_Itemable.Item_Metal_Alloy_Bolt-Description: Crafted by combining metals together for a reliably strong bolt.

D_Itemable.Item_Gunpowder-Description: Creating and solving problems for over one thousand years.
D_Itemable.Item_Onion_Rings-Description: Crispy fried rings that make for a comforting snack.

D_Itemable.Item_Natural_Oil_Refiner-FlavorText: Crude in, refined out, simple, if you ignore everything in between.

D_Itemable.Item_Workshop_Cat_C-DisplayName: Cryogenically Frozen Tortoise Shell Ragdoll Cat

D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Bolt_Larkwell_Electroshock-Fla: Designed specifically for your trusty crossbow.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Bolt_Larkwell_Explosive-Flavor: Designed specifically for your trusty crossbow.

D_Itemable.Item_Glass-Description: Despite its imperfections, a workable sheet of glass.
D_Itemable.Item_Rifle_BoltAction-FlavorText: Despite limited metallurgic and gunsmithing resources, First Cohort prospectors have managed to design a better-than-serviceable, true-aiming hunting rifle.
D_Itemable.Item_GH_IM_B_Note-Description: Detailed Research Documents about experimental of enzymes on creatures.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Sandworm_Poster-Description: Detailed description of the sandworm lifecycle.
D_Itemable.Item_Bone_Knife-FlavorText: Did any UDA xenobiologist ever foresee that the bones of animals they adapted for life on Icarus would one day be used to fashion rudimentary hunting weapons?
D_Itemable.Item_Bone_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText: Did any UDA xenobiologist ever foresee that the bones of animals they adapted for life on Icarus would one day be used to fashion rudimentary hunting weapons?
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Tundra_Monkey-FlavorText: Did this thing throw a stick?
D_Itemable.Item_Dirt_Mound-FlavorText: Dig (RMB) with a shovel to create. Higher tier shovels create better dirt mounds.
D_Itemable.Item_Electric_Dehumidier-Description: Diminishes such health risks as cave sickness, while also seeming to dispel cave worms.
D_Itemable.Item_Electric_Dehumidier_V2-Description: Diminishes such health risks as cave sickness, while also seeming to dispel cave worms.
D_Itemable.Item_Supporters_Logo-FlavorText: Disclaimer: Does not work as actual wings.
D_Itemable.Item_Carbon_Chest_Alpha-FlavorText: Disclaimer: Processed in a factory that also handles radioactive material.
D_Itemable.Item_FireWhacker-FlavorText: Discovered in prehistory, the fire whacker represents an effective, if unsophisticated tactic: Attack the flames until they surrender.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Axe_Inaris_Alpha-FlavorText: Discovering how to mine meteors really changed the game for Inaris
D_Itemable.Item_Dynamic_Mission_Beacon-Description: Displays a map marker when deployed.
D_Itemable.Item_Portable_Beacon-Description: Displays a map marker when deployed. Prospectors can adjust the map markers icon and colour by interacting with it.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Poster_Fishing-Description: Displays some of the Fish of Icarus
D_Itemable.Item_Cold_Steel_Ingot-FlavorText: Do not allow direct contact with skin.
D_Itemable.Item_Water_Trough_T4-FlavorText: Do the animals drink better than prospectors?
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Beta-Descriptio: Doesn't need to last a lifetime, to save one.
D_Itemable.Item_Rustic_CoffeeTable-FlavorText: Don't put a ring on it!
D_Itemable.Item_Wood_Door-FlavorText: Doors can be attached to doorways, once built.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Fall_Damage-Description: Drastic movement causes a piezoelectric sensor to deliver an electric charge to a small fragment of exotics, briefly reducing mass and diminishing fall damage.
D_Itemable.Item_Saddle_QuickTamer-Description: Drastically increases the taming speed of nearby creatures.
D_Itemable.Item_Faction_Mission_Drill-FlavorText: Driven by bio-diesel, this micro-derrick design was adapted from asteroid mining equipment used in the early 22nd century.
D_Itemable.Item_Chair_Wood-FlavorText: Driven by the demands and scarcity of life on the surface, a recognizable 'Icarus vernacular' has swiftly emerged, spanning many forms of design, with furniture being no exception.
D_Itemable.Item_Wood_Floor-FlavorText: Durable if rudimentary flooring, prone to damage by Icarus's heavier weather. Notably prone to fire in lightning storms. Wooden structures can be repaired with a repair hammer.
D_Itemable.Item_Cooked_Truffle-FlavorText: Earthy notes that whisper of rare indulgence on this side of the system.
D_Itemable.Item_ResearchEquipment_LabDesk-FlavorTex: Easier to craft on Icarus these days.
D_Itemable.Item_Refined_Copper-FlavorText: Easily worked, readily alloyed, a highly useful material for everything from weaponry to basic electronics.
D_Itemable.Item_FieldGuide_Electricity-Description: Electricity is used for advanced machinery.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Carry_Weight-Description: Electro-active device that 'hijacks' metallic envirosuit fibers to create a 'virtual exoskeleton' that enhances carry capacity.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Carry_Weight-FlavorText: Electro-active shape-memory fibers are highly flexible under normal conditions, but become rigid when exposed to an electric charge.
D_Itemable.Item_Tech_1-Description: Element from an experimental Larkwell Martinez device.
D_Itemable.Item_Tech_2-Description: Element from an experimental Larkwell Martinez device.
D_Itemable.Item_Tech_3-Description: Element from an experimental Larkwell Martinez device.
D_Itemable.Item_Recovery_Beacon_Tracker-Description: Emergency Coordination for High-value Objects. Will detect and scan for emergency beacons in the nearby area.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_PolarBear-Description: Emperor of the ice, highly aggressive.
D_Itemable.Item_Composite_Arms-FlavorText: Employing ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastics, composite armor trades weight for extraordinary protection against physical damage and exposure.
D_Itemable.Item_Composite_Chest-FlavorText: Employing ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastics, composite armor trades weight for extraordinary protection against physical damage and exposure.
D_Itemable.Item_Composite_Feet-FlavorText: Employing ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastics, composite armor trades weight for extraordinary protection against physical damage and exposure.

D_Itemable.Item_Composite_Legs-FlavorText: Employing ultra-high molecular weight thermoplastics, composite armor trades weight for extraordinary protection against physical damage and exposure.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Alpha-Description: Enables prospectors near you to carry more weight. Buff does not apply to the wearer.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Beta-Description: Enables prospectors near you to heal from afflictions faster. Buff does not apply to the wearer.
D_Itemable.Item_Deep_Freeze-FlavorText: Energy efficiency is important on EVERY planet.
D_Itemable.Item_Synthetics-Description: Engineered flexible materials for use in fabrics and insulation.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Chamois_Var-FlavorText: Engineered from the Capra family of goats on Earth. Known to be less graceful than their Earth counterparts.
D_Itemable.Item_Envirosuit_Shengong-Description: Enhanced heat resistance with extended resource and module capacity.
D_Itemable.Item_Platinum_Ingot-FlavorText: Enough platinum to found a small kingdom, were you on Earth.
D_Itemable.Item_Pumpkin-FlavorText: Ensuring that Halloween becomes a multi-planet holiday. Best cooked.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Compass-FlavorText: Equip in a module slot to activate your Envirosuit's Compass Module.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Player_Tracker-FlavorText: Equip in a module slot to view your team members on the map.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_WorldBoss-FlavorText: Equip in a module slot to view your world bosses on the map.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Waypoint-FlavorText: Equip in an module slot to enable waypoint marking.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Player_Status-FlavorText: Equip in an module slot to monitor team status info.
D_Itemable.Item_Bunker_Prop-Description: Equipment that was once used for something important.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Creature_Tracker-Description: Equipping this item to an Auxiliary slot will allow you to see all alive creatures
D_Itemable.Item_Bull_Head-FlavorText: Even in death it is majestic.

D_Itemable.Item_Spoiled_Plants-FlavorText: I wouldn't eat that if I were you

D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Deer_Var-FlavorText: Icarus is a microcosm of evolutionary extremes. Such pressures cause somewhat rapid and acute adaptation. The Equix for example, has twice the musculature at roughly twice the density compared to Earth cervidae.
D_Itemable.Item_Watermelon-FlavorText: Icarus produces approximately 0.003% of humanity's watermelons.
D_Itemable.Item_Concrete_Furnace_V2-FlavorText: Icarus's oxygen levels may slow combustion, but ceramic insulation produces temperatures sufficient for smelting more advanced alloys.
D_Itemable.Item_Kit_Concrete_Furnace-FlavorText: Icarus's oxygen levels may slow combustion, but ceramic insulation produces temperatures sufficient for smelting more advanced alloys.
D_Itemable.Item_Stone_Knife-FlavorText: Icarus's unusually active tectonics provide a ready source of sedimentary rocks, making for easily knapped, sharp, but weak blades.
D_Itemable.Item_Stone_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText: Icarus's unusually active tectonics provide a ready source of sedimentary rocks, making for easily knapped, sharp, but weak blades.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Sickle_Larkwell-FlavorText: If it ain't broken, why fix it?
D_Itemable.Item_Thermos_Coffee-FlavorText: If it didn't shield you from the leaden weight of fatigue, it wouldn't be coffee.
D_Itemable.Item_Target_Dummy-FlavorText: If only real bears would stay this still.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_RockGolem_Juvie-FlavorText: If this is just a young one...
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_RockGolem_Juvie_Arctic-Flav: If this is just a young one...
D_Itemable.Item_Vegetable_Pie-FlavorText: If this pie had a slogan, it might be 'Stay delicious'.
D_Itemable.Item_Toilet-FlavorText: If you are looking for the classic experience.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Repair_Item-FlavorText: If you break it, buy this.
