D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Alpha-Flavor: If you hit, it's skill, if you miss, it's the rapidly crafted, low quality projectiles.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Boardgame-FlavorText: Immerse yourself in a game for a few hours and forget about everything trying to kill you outside.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Bookstack-FlavorText: Immerse yourself in a game for a few hours and forget about everything trying to kill you outside.

D_Itemable.Item_Building_UpgradeTool-Description: Improve your structures without tearing them down.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Fire_Resistance-Description: Improves fire resistance by harnessing exotics' quasi-negative mass to create a nonlinear energy sink.
D_Itemable.Item_Cooked_Potato-Description: Improves stamina and keeps you fuller for longer.
D_Itemable.Item_Potato_Bread-Description: Improves stamina and keeps you fuller for longer.

D_Itemable.Item_Thermos_Cocoa-FlavorText: In the absence of sugar, Icarus's cocoa drinks return to a classical, savory 'Spanish' style.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Mammoth_Boss-FlavorText: In the aftermath of failed terraforming, this mammoth variant (Mammuthia Icaria) was released illicitly by a disillusioned geneticist. It found an unexpected home in the newly arctified snowfields of Icarus.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Mammoth-FlavorText: In the aftermath of failed terraforming, this mammoth variant was released illicitly by a disillusioned geneticist. It found an unexpected home in the newly arctified snowfields of Icarus.

D_Itemable.Item_Gold_Ore-FlavorText: In the future, Icarus's natural wealth offers many intriguing possibilities.
D_Itemable.Item_Bone_Arrow-FlavorText: In the mid-22nd century, the fletchers art is being rediscovered on Icarus.
D_Itemable.Item_Envirosuit-FlavorText: In theory, a Xigo general issue 'Self-contained Surface Survival Suit System' (S5) offers full body environmental containment and air processing. How many wore this before you is unclear. While no longer entirely air-tight, the suit should still provide sufficient protection to the average user.

How many wore this before you is unclear. While no longer entirely air-tight, the suit should still provide sufficient protection to the average user.

D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Jaguar-FlavorText: Introduced to manage the population of smaller mammals, the jaguar variant adopted swiftly to the arid regions of the new Icarus.

D_Itemable.Item_Mission_Stasis_Bag_Full_Iris-Descri: Iris is frozen in a medically induced stasis ready to be transported to safety.
D_Itemable.Item_Refined_Metal-FlavorText: Iron may corode, but its ease of production makes it an ideal material on Icarus.
D_Itemable.Item_Metal_Ore-FlavorText: Iron ore is plentiful in the planetary crust, as on Earth. Requires the high temperatures of a furnace to refine into pure ingots.
D_Itemable.Item_Rustic_CouchMedium-FlavorText: It could also just be a really big armchair.
D_Itemable.Item_Alpha_Sandworm_Statue_Bronze-Flavor: It doesn't look too tough, at this size...
D_Itemable.Item_Workshop_Dog_D1-FlavorText: It is Laika - Back from space - what a good dog.
D_Itemable.Item_Workshop_Dog_D2-FlavorText: It is Laika - Back from space - what a good dog.

D_Itemable.Item_Bunker_Sign-FlavorText: It triggers reminders of road signs on Earth.
D_Itemable.Item_Pump_Jack-FlavorText: It works as long as nothing goes wrong, which is asking a lot on Icarus.

D_Itemable.Item_Antipoison-FlavorText: It's speculated that exotics may suffuse much of the plant life in the terrazone, imparting bioactive properties, though exactly what these are, whether they're safe, and exactly how it works ... at this stage, who knows?

D_Itemable.Item_Bone-FlavorText: One of the oldest crafting materials known to humanity, available on Icarus thanks to the last-minute genetic redesigns of Earth-native animals, which now thrive in the terrazone.
D_Itemable.Item_Fried_Soy_Beans-FlavorText: One of the original crops intended to sustain humanity on its first new extra-solar world.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Roat-FlavorText: One of the rare endemic lifeforms able to survive in the failed terraforming zone, the roat endured the savage shift in Icarus's climate, due to its uniquely flexible respiratory system.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Roat_Lava-FlavorText: One of the rare endemic lifeforms able to survive in the failed terraforming zone, the roat endured the savage shift in Icarus's climate, due to its uniquely flexible respiratory system.

D_Itemable.Item_Campfire-FlavorText: One of the simplest sources of heat available on Icarus, the campfire burns sticks and wood to cook basic foods. Toxins in the planet's atmosphere do not interfere with combustion.
D_Itemable.Item_Animal_Bed_Heated-FlavorText: Only the best of the best for your precious pet.
D_Itemable.Item_Wood_Window-Description: Open to let Icarus in, close to keep it out.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Flask-FlavorText: Or if you need to break bad...
D_Itemable.Item_Rustic_CouchLarge-FlavorText: Or to keep all for yourself.
D_Itemable.Item_Envirosuit_Tier7-FlavorText: Originally a website for price comparisons, the Xigo conglomerate grew to embrace distribution and, not long after, production. This was a seemingly indiscriminate expansion, focused not on one industry, but all of them - taking in so many fields that business analysts have largely rejected the idea of Xigo as a single entity.
D_Itemable.Item_Envirosuit_Deluxe-FlavorText: Originally issued by the UDA, these suits have subsequently become valuable collectors' items. No longer available for purchase.
D_Itemable.Item_Recurve_Bow-FlavorText: Originating in ancient Scythia, the recurve bow stores energy more efficiently than a conventional bow, allowing for smaller, more compact weapons with an appreciable improvement in range and stopping power.
D_Itemable.Item_Kit_Floor_Torch-FlavorText: Oxygen levels may be a little lower, but fire provides light well enough.
D_Itemable.Item_Paints-Description: Paints lovingly crafted for Portrait Painting
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Yeti-Description: Pale hide and insulated limbs show how it survived the cold - until now.

D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Beta-FlavorText: Shengong Inc. was founded by Sinotai in 2082 CE.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Bow_Shengong_Alpha-FlavorText: Shengong designs are not designed to last, but rather, for ease of repair, being defined by the high degree of interchangeability of parts between their products.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Charlie-FlavorT: Shengong is a subsidary of Asia's space administration, Sinotai. Its operation may be highly beauracratic, but its products are legendary for their efficiency.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Arrow_Shengong-FlavorText: Shengong is the sister company of C.H.A.C., specializing in off-world equipment and weaponry.

D_Itemable.Item_Anvil_Bench_T4-FlavorText: The UDA states that it has been at least seven days since the last accident using this piece of equipment...
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Ape_Juvenile_Wounded-Descri: The Wounded Body of what looks like a Giant Ape.
D_Itemable.Item_Envirosuit_Tier2-FlavorText: The Xigo S5-II is a full-spectrum environmental protection jumpsuit, helmet and life-support system, offering an augment slot and extended oxygen capacity.
D_Itemable.Item_Envirosuit_Tier3-FlavorText: The Xigo S5-X is a surprisingly high-spec unit for the price. A complete survival system, it features basic rebreather technology and ultra-high-density polyethylene construction, reducing weight and increasing strength.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Spear_Shengong_Alpha-Descripti: The Xingxing may not excel in any area, but represents unalloyed adequacy.
D_Itemable.Item_Copper_Ore-FlavorText: The abundance of raw, high-quality metals on Icarus would have made it a goldmine, were it not so far removed from Earth.
D_Itemable.Item_Bean-FlavorText: The argument over whether soy produces 'milk' or 'juice' rages into the 22nd century.
D_Itemable.Mission_Laser_Part_2-Description: The arm for a high-powered heating device
D_Itemable.Item_Masonry_Bench-FlavorText: The art of stonework is untouched by the distance between worlds.
D_Itemable.Item_Strawberry-FlavorText: The average berry contains around 200 tiny seeds
D_Itemable.Mission_Laser_Part_1-Description: The base for a high-powered heating device
D_Itemable.Item_Advanced_Kitchen_Storage-Descriptio: The best cabinets this planet can offer.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_DeepOre_Scanner-FlavorText: The best that money can buy.
D_Itemable.Item_Player_Gravestone-Description: The body is all that remains.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_SwampBird-Description: The body of a large flightless bird. Its bone-like face makes a natural death mask.
D_Itemable.Item_Biofuel_Can_Meta-FlavorText: The caps a bit loose, still sealed, but that's fine right?
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Orka_Arctic-Description: The carcass of a creature with far too many teeth.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Irradiated_Mutation-Descrip: The carcass of a mutated prospector.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Giant_Roach-Description: The clicker's rigid limbs and fractured shell lie scattered where it fell.
D_Itemable.Item_Rabbit_Statue_Stone-FlavorText: The closest thing to a pet, for now.
D_Itemable.Item_Paste_Health_Restore-FlavorText: The combination of Icarus's unique conditions and genetic adjustments to plant life has seen the addition of 'useful' methyl chains to many previously innocuous plant-based preparations.
D_Itemable.Item_Steel_Bloom-FlavorText: The conditions on Icarus give its would-be metallurgists very little control over the finer details of steel smelting. A basic bloomery process prevails.
D_Itemable.Item_Lithium_Ore-Description: The core component for the creation of high tier energy storage devices.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Mange_Wolf-Description: The corpse of a ferocious animal.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_BlueBack_Lava-Description: The corpse of a sometimes gentle giant.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_BlueBack_Lava_Juvenile-Desc: The corpse of a sometimes gentle giant.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Daisy-Description: The decaying remains of the Blueback known as Daisy
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Chew-Description: The draven's form is broken on the ground, legs folded in unnatural stillness
D_Itemable.Item_LightningRod_Basic-FlavorText: The effect of Minos's gravitational tides on the atmosphere creates extraordinarily powerful electrical storms, making these devices indispensible.
D_Itemable.Item_LightningRod_Platinum-FlavorText: The effect of Minos's gravitational tides on the atmosphere creates extraordinarily powerful electrical storms, making these devices indispensible.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_WoolyZebra-FlavorText: The exact purpose of zebra stripes remains a mystery.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_WoolyZebra_Juvenile-FlavorT: The exact purpose of zebra stripes remains a mystery.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Zebra-FlavorText: The exact purpose of zebra stripes remains a mystery.
D_Itemable.Item_Refined_Gold-FlavorText: The existence of exotics on Icarus has demoted gold to the status of a useful, shiny metal.
D_Itemable.Item_Bone_Sickle-FlavorText: The falk or grasshook is a harvesting tool of old, a symbol of labor, and weapon of disgruntled serfdom.
D_Itemable.Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Cap_Half-Descript: The final half-sized step in a fireplace.
D_Itemable.Item_Fireplace_Chimney_Cap-Description: The final step in a fireplace.
D_Itemable.Item_LegendaryWeapon_GolemGauntlet-Flavo: The first step in Norex's efforts towards an Exoskeleton.
D_Itemable.Item_Stone_Axe-FlavorText: The first step on a path that leads back to the 22nd century.
D_Itemable.Item_Truffle_Vodka-FlavorText: The forest and the fire, bottled together.
D_Itemable.Item_Mushroom-FlavorText: The full implications of introducing fungi to a new world are yet to be seen.
D_Itemable.Item_Stone-FlavorText: The geomorphology of Icarus has some similarities to Earth, but in many regards remains a mystery.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Stomper-Description: The ground no longer trembles beneath the stomper's immense legs.
D_Itemable.Item_Bandage_Basic-FlavorText: The healing won't start until the bleeding stops.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Crossbow_Inaris_B-Description: The heavy draw on this weapon causes a slower reload, but adds far more damage.
D_Itemable.Item_Rustic_Wardrobe-FlavorText: The history of the wardrobe goes all the way back to the Romans.
D_Itemable.Item_IceBox-FlavorText: The insulated icebox arrests food decay, as well as slowing the melting of ice itself. Has 10 storage slots.
D_Itemable.Item_Antibiotic_Tonic-FlavorText: The interaction between bioactive substances and microbial life here on Icarus is still poorly understood, especially when one factors in the effects of exotic matter to both.
D_Itemable.Item_Berry-FlavorText: The intrepid prospector may also ferment wine, trusting that the quality of the resulting beverage is less important than the sheer fact of its existence.
D_Itemable.Item_Ruby_Ore-Description: The key ingredient for storing and amplifying light used laser based equipment.
D_Itemable.Item_Fatty_Tbone-Description: The largest of steaks can typically only be found in the largest of creatures
D_Itemable.Mission_Laser_Part_3-Description: The laser for a high-powered heating device
D_Itemable.Item_GH_APE_O1-Description: The last thing Morris ever wrote.

D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Arrow_Set_Printed_Charlie-Flav: The legality of these projectiles is currently unclear.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_SwampBird_Juvenile-Descript: The lifeless body of a flightless bird, yours to harvest.
D_Itemable.Item_Paste_Health_Regen-FlavorText: The lily's high concentration of bioactive ingredients is thought to inhibit the reuptake of certain cytochromes, briefly flooding your body with oxidating enzymes.
D_Itemable.Item_Flare_Arrow-FlavorText: The lost among us lean heavily on this launchable marker.
D_Itemable.Item_Ren-Description: The main currency used by the UDA. Prospectors take on contracts to Earn this so they can purchase and upgrade gear. Use an Orbital Exchange Interface to send to orbit.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Irradiated_Abomination-Desc: The mangled remains of what appears to have once been a prospector...
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Irradiated_Prospector-Descr: The mangled remains of what appears to have once been a prospector...
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Tusker-Description: The massive bulk of this tusker has finally collapsed, its armor-like hide still warm.
D_Itemable.Item_Iron_Wood_Arrow-FlavorText: The miasma coating this tool emits an almost unbearable stench.

D_Itemable.Item_Steel_Hammer-Description: The most efficient tool for repairing damaged structures.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Desert_Striker-FlavorText: The most frightening predator found on Icarus, known for its intelligence. Stalkers are known to follow prospectors for hours, even days.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Snow_Striker-FlavorText: The most frightening predator found on Icarus, known for its intelligence. Stalkers are known to follow prospectors for hours, even days.

D_Itemable.Item_Animal_Fat-Description: The next best thing to butter.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Beta-FlavorText: The non-lethal, but highly effective toxin skirts a number of international - and interplanetary - chemical weapons agreements.
D_Itemable.Item_Ape_Attractor-FlavorText: The opposite of a Creature Deterrent.
D_Itemable.Item_Survey_Radar-FlavorText: The original UDA terraformers used seismic surveys, but these provoked local fauna. Ground-penetrating radar has proven less antagonizing, though still not without risk.
D_Itemable.Item_Kit_Basic_Oxite_Dissolver-FlavorTex: The oxidizer is a slow, unpowered device that uses mechanical pressure to crush oxite, then store the resulting oxygen. Once the balloon begins to fill, consume oxygen from it directly.
D_Itemable.Item_Carbon_Head_Beta-FlavorText: The perfect companion for any aspiring miner or lumberjack.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Knife_Inaris_Alpha-Description: The perfect knife for hunting and skinning
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Knife_Inaris_Delta-Description: The perfect knife to hone your skills with
D_Itemable.Item_Rustic_LivingChair-FlavorText: The perfect thing after a hard day of prospecting.
D_Itemable.Item_Lithium_Axe-FlavorText: The periodic table never looked this sharp.
D_Itemable.Item_Lithium_Bow-FlavorText: The periodic table never looked this sharp.

D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Keyboard-Description: The primary mechanism for controlling a computer.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Pronghorn-FlavorText: The pronghorn variant thrives on the sparse, desert terrain in which this region of Icarus now abounds.
D_Itemable.Item_Cooked_Pumpkin-FlavorText: The pumpkins natural beta-carotene improves endurance.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Rabbit-FlavorText: The rabbit variant has found a new niche on this malformed environment.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Rabbit_Variant-FlavorText: The rabbit variant has found a new niche on this malformed environment.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Rabbit_Variant_Snow-FlavorT: The rabbit variant has found a new niche on this malformed environment.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Raccoon-FlavorText: The raccoon strain has found a new niche on this malformed environment.
D_Itemable.Item_Carpentry_Bench-FlavorText: The rapid growth of trees on Icarus makes for noticeably less durable wooden creations.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Reaver-Description: The reaver's predatory form is twisted and torn, its threat finally ended.
D_Itemable.Item_Shotgun-Description: The reliable and timeless pump-action, savage at short range.
D_Itemable.Item_Dissected_Roach-Description: The remains of a dissected creature.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Sandwyrm_Queen-Description: The remains of a fearsome beast, now dead at your feet.
D_Itemable.Item_Flesh_Sac_Head-Description: The remains of a floating gas creature.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_GeothermalSpider-Descriptio: The remains of a furry legged menace.
D_Itemable.Item_Ram_Head-Description: The remains of a majestic Ram.
D_Itemable.Item_Bull_Head-Description: The remains of a mighty bull.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Piglet-Description: The remains of an animals, whose life was cut too short.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_WildBoar-Description: The remains of one of nature's most feral creations.
D_Itemable.Item_Mission_Thruster_Part-Description: The remains of what was a Ship Thruster.
D_Itemable.Item_Mission_Prototype_Laser-Description: The result of a makeshift repair.
D_Itemable.Item_ExperimentalGoop-Description: The result of a simple experiment.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Horse-FlavorText: The result of mixing DNA from Wild Boar and Horses on earth, with a dash of exotics thrown into the mix.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_JuvieHorse-FlavorText: The result of mixing DNA from Wild Boar and Horses on earth, with a dash of exotics thrown into the mix.
D_Itemable.Item_Mission_DNA_MixedBufferSolution-Des: The result of mixing a sample with Tris-EDTA Buffer.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Flightless_Tank-Description: The sandhorn's plated head and curved horn are half-buried in dust.
D_Itemable.Item_Biomass-FlavorText: The scientists at the Bio-Lab would be interested in this...
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Cougar_Alpha-Description: The second most dangerous thing in the desert.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Lion_F-Description: The second most dangerous thing in the desert.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Jaguar-Description: The second most dangerous thing in the forest
D_Itemable.Item_Rock_Golem_Grenade_Caltrops-Descrip: The sharp remains of a Quarrite Grenade. Will slow and cause damage when stepped on.
D_Itemable.Item_Masonry_Bench_T3-FlavorText: The skill and precision of a mason can never be replaced by machines...
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Hammerhead_Slug-Description: The slimy remains of a giant Hammerhead Slug
D_Itemable.Item_Stone_Pickaxe-FlavorText: The soft sedimentary rock scattered across Icarus's surface is easily shaped into useful tools. They may not be durable, but can be repaired easily enough.
D_Itemable.Item_Player_Gravestone-FlavorText: The soul leaves the flesh and nothing is left except the mortal husk.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Broodling-Description: The spawn of a much larger creature.
D_Itemable.Item_Animal_Bed_Leopard-FlavorText: The spots make them run faster in their dreams.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Storca-Description: The storca's thick hide and heavy frame suggest a creature built to endure.
D_Itemable.Item_Concrete_Frame-Description: The strongest, most stable foundation for any structure.
D_Itemable.Item_Module_Fire_Resistance-FlavorText: The sudden abundance of exotic matter produced an immense range of technological innovation in an exceedingly short time, resulting in an era for which the world 'renaissance' is barely adequate.
D_Itemable.Item_FieldGuide_Oxygen-FlavorText: The suit protects prospectors from cyanide in the atmosphere.
D_Itemable.Item_Sulfur-FlavorText: The tenth most common element in the universe, sulfur is essential for life, but also death, through its many different modes of incineration.
D_Itemable.Item_Mission_STYX_D_Research2_Scanner-Fl: The things we do for Ren.
D_Itemable.Item_Steel_Hammer-FlavorText: The tidal forces of Minos produce exceptionally violent weather on Icarus, its largest moon, which in turn damages even the most robust construction. A steel hammer can even the odds ... a little.
D_Itemable.Item_Paste_Stamina_Consumption-FlavorTex: The time-jarring effects of exotics find their influence in many subtle, poorly understood ways on Icarus.
D_Itemable.Item_Kit_Mortar_And_Pestle-FlavorText: The tool of chefs, herbalists, apothecaries and alchemists.
D_Itemable.Item_Carbon_Feet_Beta-FlavorText: The toughest boots on the orbital market.
D_Itemable.Item_Waterskin-FlavorText: The waterskin's rough construction allows for rapid crafting, perfect for basic survival needs.
D_Itemable.Item_Steel_Spear-FlavorText: The word 'spear' has descended to us through the ages largely unchanged.
D_Itemable.Item_Steel_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText: The word 'spear' has descended to us through the ages largely unchanged.
D_Itemable.Item_Mammoth_Tusk-FlavorText: Theories suggest that when exotic material present in plant life is ingested, it affects cellular reproduction in animals. The exact mechanism is unclear, with speculation that some varieties of exotics possess negative mass, producing relativistic micro-effects. Analysis of this specimen will reveal more.

D_Itemable.Item_Ice_Beam-FlavorText: There are sixteen different types of ice that have been recorded on Earth.

D_Itemable.Item_Metal_Alloy_Arrow-FlavorText: Two metals are better than one.
D_Itemable.Item_Metal_Alloy_Bolt-FlavorText: Two metals are better than one.

D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Mange_Wolf-FlavorText: What kind of nightmare did these escape from.
D_Itemable.Item_Rooster_Head-Description: What remains of a feathered friend.
D_Itemable.Item_Arctic_Bat_Head-Description: What remains of a mutated bat-like creature.
D_Itemable.Item_Cave_Bat_Head-Description: What remains of a mutated bat-like creature.
D_Itemable.Item_Geothermal_Bat_Head-Description: What remains of a mutated bat-like creature.
D_Itemable.Item_Sandscuttle_Head-Description: What remains of a roach-like creature.
D_Itemable.Item_Stone_Cairn-FlavorText: What significance does this place hold?
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_BlueBack-Description: What the Blueback lacks in speed, it makes up for in bulk.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_BlueBack_Juvenile-Descripti: What the Blueback lacks in speed, it makes up for in bulk.
D_Itemable.Item_LegendaryWeapon_Sniper-FlavorText: What the UDA should have Armed Prospectors with.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Knife-FlavorText: Whatever you kill with this blade doesn't need to know how little you paid.
D_Itemable.Item_Enzyme_Cannon_Arm-Description: When Connected to Power and Given Condensed Enzymes will Charge Up. After Charging can be Triggered to Force Regrow trees in a surrounding area.
D_Itemable.Item_Enzyme_Cannon_Hub-Description: When Connected to Power and Given Condensed Enzymes will Charge Up. After Charging can be Triggered to Force Regrow trees in a surrounding area.
D_Itemable.Item_Steel_Pickaxe-FlavorText: When first landing on Icarus prospectors quickly discovered the need for stronger metals to deal with the local ore.
D_Itemable.Item_Sandworm_Scale-FlavorText: When held in the hand, fresh from the worm's body, the scale gently vibrated. Slowly, this motion drained away, leaving only a flake of light, hugely strong armor.
D_Itemable.Item_Health_Elixir-FlavorText: When it comes to survival, prospectors on Icarus try everything.
D_Itemable.Item_Health_Enhancement_Tonic-FlavorText: When it comes to survival, prospectors on Icarus try everything.
D_Itemable.Item_Health_Remedy-FlavorText: When it comes to survival, prospectors on Icarus try everything.
D_Itemable.Item_Lava_Hunter_Mine-Description: When placed will break open Lava Hunter Eggs and Release Bombers.
D_Itemable.Item_Landing_Pad_Player-Description: When placed, new dropships will land in this location. You can call your dropship to this location, if unoccupied. Requires Electricity to use.
D_Itemable.Item_Water_Trough_T4-Description: When powered incoming water is filtered fresh for your animals to drink.
D_Itemable.Item_Enzyme_Elixir-Description: When used Aggressive Enzyme-Enhanced Creatures will be drawn to you.
D_Itemable.Item_Watering_Can-Description: When used will water any crop plots or dirt mounds in a small area in front of you.
D_Itemable.Item_Cone-FlavorText: Where we're going we don't need road cones.
D_Itemable.Item_HighTech_3-FlavorText: Wherever this came from, and whoever made it, you are certain you've never seen anything like it before.
D_Itemable.Item_WildSeed_Lily-FlavorText: Wherever this is planted, a lily will appear.
D_Itemable.Item_Electric_Dehumidier-FlavorText: Whether cave worms are offended by the sudden aridity it produces, or the high pitched whine, research is yet to confirm.
D_Itemable.Item_Electric_Dehumidier_V2-FlavorText: Whether cave worms are offended by the sudden aridity it produces, or the high pitched whine, research is yet to confirm.
D_Itemable.Item_WildTea-FlavorText: Whether invited or not, gorse followed humanity to Icarus.
D_Itemable.Item_Suture_Kit-FlavorText: Whether lightly or deeply wounded, 'Permit the pain to pass over you, and through you.' - Bao Li Wei
D_Itemable.Item_Stick-FlavorText: Whether making weapons or tools, a crafting bench or fuel, basic creation begins with the humble stick.
D_Itemable.Item_Titanium_Arrow-FlavorText: Whether on Icarus or Earth, hunters continue to value skills for stealth, control and intimacy of the kill.
D_Itemable.Item_Thatch_Ramp-FlavorText: Whether you employ this for a roof, or simply for ease of access, the thatch ramp is simple to make and easy to carry, but provides only limited environmental protection.
D_Itemable.Item_Tree_Sap-FlavorText: Whether you subscribe to the cohesion-tension or multiforce theories of sap transport, osmotic pressure gradients or axial potentials, it makes no difference to how useful it is.
D_Itemable.Item_Sandworm_Trophy_Head-FlavorText: Which room will you put this in?
D_Itemable.Item_Solar_Backpack-Description: While in sunny environments can charge any battery powered items contained within the inventory.
D_Itemable.Item_Cooking_Station-FlavorText: While it may not deliver high cuisine, the Cooking Station rewards the attentions of an attentive chef with a swifter, more sustaining food supply.
D_Itemable.Item_Cooking_Station_V2-FlavorText: While it may not deliver high cuisine, the Cooking Station rewards the attentions of an attentive chef with a swifter, more sustaining food supply.
D_Itemable.Item_Paste_Stamina_Buff-FlavorText: While lacking some of the pharmaceutical refinements, this paste produces similar physiological affects to the 'wakers' once offered to long haul space pilots.
D_Itemable.Item_Antibiotic_Pill-FlavorText: While not quite invincible, your susceptibility to microbial takeover will temporarily reach an all-time low.
D_Itemable.Item_Elephant_Tusk-Description: While not the biggest tusk one could find on Icarus, it's still a valuable source of bone.
D_Itemable.Item_Oxygen_Tank-FlavorText: While plants and animals were genetically adjusted to deal with the impurities in Icarus's air, humans need to bring their own.
D_Itemable.Item_Mushroom_Soup-FlavorText: While some critics regard this meal as pointless if made without butter, purists do not last long on Icarus.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Axe_Shengong_Alpha-FlavorText: While the Heike delivers a lot more wood with every strike, this lightweight power comes at the cost of swifter wear and tear.
D_Itemable.Item_TechRecombined-FlavorText: While the precise operation of this Larkwell Martinez prototype is confidential, general specifications suggest it uses the mass-distorting effects of exotic matter to generate a diametric field intended to dampen local gravitic influence.
D_Itemable.Item_Sandworm_Arrow-FlavorText: While the sandworm's existence inside the terrazone is a mystery, its scales make extraordinarily practical blades.
D_Itemable.Item_Caveworm_Arrow-FlavorText: While the worms' existence inside the terrazone is a mystery, their scales make extraordinarily practical blades
D_Itemable.Item_Labcoats-FlavorText: White Coats make anyone look professional.
D_Itemable.Item_Prop_Medical_Trolly-FlavorText: Who builds a trolley with locked wheels?
D_Itemable.Item_GH_RG_MiningCamp_4-FlavorText: Who forgets to put a password on their laptop?
D_Itemable.Item_Laptop-FlavorText: Who forgets to put a password on their laptop?

D_Itemable.Item_Chicken_Coop_Red-FlavorText: Why do chickens have a better house than you?
D_Itemable.Item_Eden_NPC_Norex-FlavorText: Why was it programmed with attitude.

D_Itemable.Item_Gas_Fireplace_Ext-Description: Wide metal tubing helps the smoke escape the hearth.
D_Itemable.Workshop_Purification_Tablet-Description:
Will convert any Water into Treated Water. Removes any flavour effects. 

To use, Craft the 'Cool Water' recipe on your character with this tablet and a non-pure water source in your inventory.
D_Itemable.Item_Bramble-FlavorText: Will hurt you if you get too close
D_Itemable.Item_Raw_Fish-Description: Will nourish, but better if cooked.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Shield_9Diamonds-Description: Will reflect some damage back to your attacker when wielded exclusively.
D_Itemable.Item_Purification_Pill-Description:
Will remove the risk of Dysentery from Tainted / Rain water. Removes any flavour effects.

To use, Craft the 'Cool Water' recipe on your character with this tablet and a non-pure water source in your inventory.
D_Itemable.Item_Animal_Gruel_Fish-Description: Will satisfy an animals hunger, but not their taste buds.
D_Itemable.Item_Animal_Gruel_Fruit-Description: Will satisfy an animals hunger, but not their taste buds.
D_Itemable.Item_Animal_Gruel_Meat-Description: Will satisfy an animals hunger, but not their taste buds.
D_Itemable.Item_Animal_Gruel_Vegetable-Description: Will satisfy an animals hunger, but not their taste buds.
D_Itemable.Item_Gruel-Description: Will satisfy your hunger, but not your taste buds.
D_Itemable.Item_Recurve_Bow-Description: With higher energy, recurve bows increase range and power.
D_Itemable.Item_Advanced_Armor_Bench-FlavorText: With the ability to weave platinum into fiber and cure leather on a drying rack prospectors can craft tougher outfits for the harsh environment of Icarus.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Arrow_Printed_Alpha-FlavorText: With the advent of widespread, domestic metallic 3D printing, modern archery entered a golden age of specialist bickering about arow design and composition.
D_Itemable.Item_Shield_Bone-FlavorText: With this in hand, you're ready for anything.
D_Itemable.Item_Shield_Carbon-FlavorText: With this in hand, you're ready for anything.
D_Itemable.Item_Shield_Composites-FlavorText: With this in hand, you're ready for anything.

D_Itemable.Item_Shield_Titanium-FlavorText: With this in hand, you're ready for anything.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Bear-FlavorText: Within the zone of failed terraforming, little can challenge the grizzly variant as an apex predator. Outside the zone, however, is another matter.
D_Itemable.Item_Carcass_Bear_Contaminated-FlavorTex: Within the zone of failed terraforming, little can challenge the grizzly variant as an apex predator. Outside the zone, however, is another matter.
D_Itemable.Item_Wood_Build_HalfNormal-FlavorText: Wood structures withstand light storms without damage. Can be repaired with a repair hammer.
D_Itemable.Item_Wood_Wall-FlavorText: Wood structures withstand light storms without damage. Can be repaired with a repair hammer.
D_Itemable.Item_Carpentry_Bench-Description: Workbench and tools for advanced wooden crafting.
D_Itemable.Item_Homestead_Swing_Chair-FlavorText: Would look good on a balcony.
D_Itemable.Item_Rustic_Dresser-FlavorText: Would probably be worth a pretty penny back home.
D_Itemable.Item_Mission_Burner-FlavorText: Wouldn't find a chemistry lab without one of these.
D_Itemable.Item_WaterBomb-FlavorText: Woven from fiber, the water bomb allows fire suppression from a safe distance.
D_Itemable.Item_Animal_Bed_SnowLeopardSkin-FlavorTe: Wow. You killed a rare animal to make a bed for your pet.
D_Itemable.Item_Medical_Scanner-FlavorText: XIGO's latest innovation for the furtherment of medical technolgies.
D_Itemable.Item_Longbow-FlavorText: Xeno-biologists hurriedly altered the genes of the tree from which this weapon is made, so that it might thrive on Icarus, never imagining that one day, a bow would be fashioned from it.
D_Itemable.Item_Meta_Axe-FlavorText: Xigo specialises in high-end look at a low-end price.
D_Itemable.Item_Medicine_Bag-FlavorText: You are a real doctor now.
D_Itemable.Item_Bunker_Bunk_bed-FlavorText: You can feel like a kid again.
D_Itemable.Item_Big_Breakfast-FlavorText: You can never go wrong with a big breakfast...
D_Itemable.Scrawled_message_note-Description: You can only just make out what this says.

D_ModifierStates.Fruit_Snack_Pack-ModifierDescription: A collect of fruit which provides a variety of buffs.
D_ModifierStates.Blunt_Trauma-ModifierDescription: A concussive blow that reduces melee damage
D_ModifierStates.GasFlyer_Poison-ModifierDescription: A debilitating concussion that slows movement speed and stamina regeneration, and increases stamina usage and melee damage received
D_ModifierStates.Chocolate_Cake_Piece-ModifierDescription: A decadent cake, good for health and regen.
D_ModifierStates.Concussion-ModifierDescription: A head injury, reduces crafting speed. Counter with blood thinner, or heal over time.
D_ModifierStates.Coconut_Cake_Piece-ModifierDescription: A light cake good for crafting and using tools.
D_ModifierStates.Komodo_Bite-ModifierDescription: A nasty bite from a Komodo Dragon, drastically reduces the duration of food buffs and increases poison debuff duration. Heal with antibiotics.
D_ModifierStates.Hemorrage-ModifierDescription: A nasty gash, taking damage, worse while moving. Heal with Suture kit.
D_ModifierStates.MinorHemorrhage-ModifierDescription: A nasty gash, taking damage, worse while moving. Heal with Suture kit.
D_ModifierStates.Landshark_Melee-ModifierDescription: A nasty hit, taking damage, worse while moving. Heal with blood thinner.
D_ModifierStates.RoachTentacleDebuff-ModifierDescription: A paralyzing affliction, caused by contact with a Clicker's tentacles
D_ModifierStates.Miasma-ModifierDescription: A poisoned wound, lowers physical damage resistance and deals periodic poison damage.
D_ModifierStates.Deep_Freeze_Spoil_Rate-ModifierDescripti: A powered Deep Freeze halts spoiling of items.
D_ModifierStates.Refrigerator_Spoil_Rate-ModifierDescript: A powered Refrigerator reduces spoil rate.
D_ModifierStates.RadiationBurn-ModifierDescription: A radiation burn that will slowly increase radiation exposure until healed.
D_ModifierStates.Carrot_Cake_Piece-ModifierDescription: A rich cake, good for ranged combat.
D_ModifierStates.Eden_Atmosphere-ModifierDescription: A safe environment where you can relax without fear of attack.
D_ModifierStates.DeepWound-ModifierDescription: A severe wound from a recent attack. Remains, even after death. Heal with a Suture Kit.
D_ModifierStates.Damage_Sprained_Ankle-ModifierDescriptio: A sprained ankle from a fall. You will move slower.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff-ModifierDescription: A weird wound, resistant to normal treatment, best to treat the symptoms best you can.
D_ModifierStates.Summon_Wolf-ModifierDescription: A wolf will be summoned to attack the target.
D_ModifierStates.Freeze-ModifierDescription: A wound that has frozen the skin closed. Movement speed and melee damage is reduced, deals periodic frost damage.
D_ModifierStates.Burn-ModifierDescription: A wound that is on fire. Reducing health regen and maximum health. Deals periodic fire damage.
D_ModifierStates.Cooked_PricklyPear-ModifierDescription: Adds a Chance to Return Melee Damage to Attacker. Decreases Food Consumption.
D_ModifierStates.Dirt_Mound_Platinum_Shovel-ModifierDescr: Advanced dirt pile made with a Platinum Shovel.
D_ModifierStates.Seed_Fatigue-ModifierDescription: After harvesting this plant it has reduced in growth speed and yield. Remove this plant and plant a new seed to remove this debuff. The effectiveness of this modifier will increase each time this plant is harvested.
D_ModifierStates.Enzyme_Elixir-ModifierDescription: Aggressive Enzyme-Enhanced Creatures are drawn to you.
D_ModifierStates.ElectricAmmoInfusion-ModifierDescription: Ammo on the current Weapon is Electrically Charged and Will apply more Damage
D_ModifierStates.Slowed_LarkwellTazerArrow-ModifierDescri: An electrified wound, that stops you in your tracks, reduces movement speed, projectile and melee damage while taking a small amount of electric damage.
D_ModifierStates.Festering_Wound-ModifierDescription: An extemely infected wound from an attack. Counter with anti-parasitics. Not removed on death.
D_ModifierStates.Infected_Wound-ModifierDescription: An infected wound caused by a recent attack. Counter with antibiotics. Not removed on death.
D_ModifierStates.New_Mother-ModifierDescription: Animal has recently had a child.
D_ModifierStates.Heatstroke-ModifierDescription: At risk of heat exhaustion, counter with cooling bandages.
D_ModifierStates.AuraEffect_AdditionalPhysicalDamageMitig: Aura Effect: Reduced Physical Damage Taken
D_ModifierStates.Bee_Swarm-ModifierDescription: Bees are swarming all around you. Slows movement and attack speed. Also causes small periodic damage.
D_ModifierStates.SulfurPool-ModifierDescription: Being damaged and heated by a nearby Sulfur pool reacting to a violent storm.
D_ModifierStates.DamageOverTime_Radiation-ModifierDescrip: Being damaged by nearby uncontained unstable material. Use a Containment System to protect yourself.
D_ModifierStates.SpikedBrambles-ModifierDescription: Being slowed and damaged from Spiked Brambles
D_ModifierStates.SwampWater-ModifierDescription: Being slowed by the swamp water.
D_ModifierStates.RadiationWarming-ModifierDescription: Being warmed by nearby uncontained unstable material. Use a Stabilization Catalyst to prevent this.
D_ModifierStates.Fruit_Muffin-ModifierDescription: Big boost to stamina and experience gained, reduces water consumption
D_ModifierStates.Shepherds_Pie-ModifierDescription: Big health boost, lifts stamina, boosts health regeneration and reduces food consumption.
D_ModifierStates.Savory_Roll-ModifierDescription: Big health boost, lifts stamina, reduces food consumption, boosts stamina regeneration and health regeneration.
D_ModifierStates.Meat_Pie-ModifierDescription: Big health boost, reduces exposure damage.
D_ModifierStates.Affliction_Overheating_Tame-ModifierDesc: Body temperature is rising. Thirst has increased. Needs to cool down.

D_ModifierStates.Teenage_Worm_Poison_Desert-ModifierDescr: Slows and drains health from poisoned targets, increases stamina cost of actions and raises your internal temperature
D_ModifierStates.Teenage_Worm_Poison_Arctic-ModifierDescr: Slows and drains health from poisoned targets, reduces projectile damage resistance and lowers your internal temperature
D_ModifierStates.SlugLauncher_Corrosive-ModifierDescripti: Slows slightly and damages over time.

D_ModifierStates.Aura_Fire_Warming-ModifierDescription: Standing near a warm fire reduces consumption rates, and quickens regeneration.
D_ModifierStates.Aura_Cooler_Cooling-ModifierDescription: Standing near an active air conditioner reduces consumption rates, and quickens regeneration.

D_ModifierStates.Pyrophobia-ModifierDescription: Take more damage from Fire damage.

D_ModifierStates.Stunned-ModifierDescription: Temporarily prevents any form of attack or movement
D_ModifierStates.FocusedItemCharging-ModifierDescription: The Currently Focused Item is Slowly Recharging
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T2_Poison-ModifierDescripti: The Exotic Affliction courses through your body, slowly drains health and slows the prospector. Remove with anti-poison.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T3_DeepWound-ModifierDescri: The Exotic Affliction has caused a deep wound. Reduces health regeneration and maximum health. Cure with a Suture Kit.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T4_RapidBleed-ModifierDescr: The Exotic Affliction has caused a rapid bleed, dealing significant damage and reducing health regeneration.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T4_RapidBurn-ModifierDescri: The Exotic Affliction has caused a rapid burn, dealing significant damage and increasing internal temperature.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T4_RapidFreeze-ModifierDesc: The Exotic Affliction has caused a rapid freeze, dealing significant damage and reducing internal temperature.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T2_Wound-ModifierDescriptio: The Exotic Affliction has caused a wound. Reduces health regeneration. Cure with a Bandage.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T2_Antiparasitic-ModifierDe: The Exotic Affliction has caused parasites to sap your speed, causes reduced sprint and attack speed. Cure with Anti-Parasitics.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T1_Food-ModifierDescription: The Exotic Affliction has caused you to consume more food. Can escalate to a concussion, parasites or a wound.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T1_Oxygen-ModifierDescripti: The Exotic Affliction has caused you to consume more oxygen. Can escalate to a concussion, bacteria or poison.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T1_Water-ModifierDescriptio: The Exotic Affliction has caused you to consume more water. Can escalate to bacteria, parasites or a wound.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T3_Hyperthermia-ModifierDes: The Exotic Affliction has increased your core temperature. Reduces your carrying capacity and increases water consumption. Cure with a Cooling Bandage.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T3_Hypothermia-ModifierDesc: The Exotic Affliction has lowered your core body temperature. Reduces your movement speed, increases your food consumption. Heal with Heat Bandages.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T2_Bloodthinner-ModifierDes: The Exotic Affliction is affecting you head, increasing stamina consumption and reducing melee damage. Cure with Bloodthinners.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T2_Antibiotic-ModifierDescr: The Exotic Affliction is infected, causing reduced health regeneration and reduced stamina. Cure with Antibiotics.
D_ModifierStates.ExoticDebuff_T3_ReapplyDebuffs-ModifierD: The Exotic Reaction is causing a full body reaction. Increases Oxygen consumption. Can cause other Exotic Afflictions. Reduce duration with affliction pastes.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Swamp_AcidFog-ModifierDescripti: The acid fog storm is increasing your oxygen consumption. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you and your equipment.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Swamp_AcidRain-ModifierDescript: The acid rain storm is increasing your oxygen consumption and cooling you. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you and any nearby metal buildings.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Volcanic_AcidRain-ModifierDescr: The acid rain storm is increasing your oxygen consumption and cooling you. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you and any nearby metal buildings.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Volcanic_SulfurReaction-Modifie: The acid rain storm is increasing your oxygen consumption and cooling you. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you and any nearby metal buildings.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Volcanic_Ash-ModifierDescriptio: The ash storm is increasing your water and oxygen consumption, and reducing your processing speed. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Food_Poisoning-ModifierDescription: The bacterial effects of spoiled food. Slowly drains health. Counter with antibiotics, or wait it out.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Volcanic_ColdFront-ModifierDesc: The cold front is cooling you, increasing your oxygen consumption. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.IceBox_Spoil_Rate-ModifierDescription: The contents of the icebox are being kept cool. Reduces spoil rate.
D_ModifierStates.FallDamage_Negate-ModifierDescription: The effect of gravity is temporarily lessened, due to exposure to exotics.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Volcanic_Embers-ModifierDescrip: The ember storm is increasing your water consumption and warming you. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Dry_Atmosphere-ModifierDescription: The extreme aridity of the atmosphere results in massively increased water consumption due to a lack of moisture. Deep Freeze will not produce Ice. Temperature will fluctuate throughout the day.
D_ModifierStates.Very_Cold_Atmosphere-ModifierDescription: The extreme chill of the atmosphere results in reduced food spoil time and slower movement.
D_ModifierStates.Cold_Atmosphere-ModifierDescription: The extreme chill of the atmosphere results in reduced food spoil time.
D_ModifierStates.Geothermal_Atmosphere-ModifierDescriptio: The ground is unstable, with frequent tremors and shifting terrain caused by constant geological movement.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Arctic_Hail-ModifierDescription: The hail storm is increasing your food consumption. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Conifer_Hail-ModifierDescriptio: The hail storm is increasing your oxygen consumption. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Desert_Heatwave-ModifierDescrip: The heatwave is increasing your water consumption and significantly warming you. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Volcanic_Heatwave-ModifierDescr: The heatwave is increasing your water consumption and significantly warming you. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Swamp_ToxicGas-ModifierDescript: The putrid gas storm is increasing your oxygen consumption and increasing spoilage rate. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Conifer_Rain-ModifierDescriptio: The rain storm is increasing your oxygen consumption and cooling you. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Desert_Sand-ModifierDescription: The sand storm is increasing your water consumption. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and significantly damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Arctic_Snow-ModifierDescription: The snow storm is increasing your food consumption and significantly cooling you. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Volcanic_VolcWinter-ModifierDes: The volcanic winter is cooling you, increasing your food and oxygen consumption, and reducing your processing speed. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Arctic_WhiteOut-ModifierDescrip: The whiteout storm is increasing your food consumption and significantly cooling you. Reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Arctic_Wind-ModifierDescription: The wind storm is increasing your food consumption. Significantly reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Conifer_Wind-ModifierDescriptio: The wind storm is increasing your oxygen consumption. Significantly reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Swamp_Wind-ModifierDescription: The wind storm is increasing your oxygen consumption. Significantly reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Exposure_Desert_Wind-ModifierDescription: The wind storm is increasing your water consumption. Significantly reduces your mobility, increases your stamina usage and damages you.
D_ModifierStates.Animal_Fertilize-ModifierDescription: This animal is attempting to fertilize other animals of the same species in range.
D_ModifierStates.ReadyToMilk-ModifierDescription: This animal is ready to Milk.
D_ModifierStates.Animal_Fertilized-ModifierDescription: This animal is with child or looking after an egg. The process takes longer if the animal is Hungry and Thirsty. A Child will be Born soon.
D_ModifierStates.Rotting_Carcass-ModifierDescription: This carcass has been left out in the sun a little too long
D_ModifierStates.IceMutation-ModifierDescription: This creature has been mutated by an unsanctioned experiment.
D_ModifierStates.Heat_Exhaustion-ModifierDescription: This heat is overwhelming you, counter with cooling bandages.
D_ModifierStates.Frenzied-ModifierDescription: Unable to tell between friend and foe, highly aggressive

D_ModifierStates.Banana_Porridge-ModifierDescription: Warms you up and a small Bonus to Tamed Creature Experience.
D_ModifierStates.Tame_Recently_Pet-ModifierDescription: Was recently petted. Increased experience gain and coziness.
D_ModifierStates.Drink_Energised-ModifierDescription: Water filled with electrolytes decreases thirst and increases stamina recovery

D_ModifierStates.WaterConnectionSpeedUp_2x-ModifierDescri: Water is greatly speeding crafting up

D_ModifierStates.Filtered_Water-ModifierDescription: Water that has been filtered through charcoal.

D_ModifierStates.Purified_Water-ModifierDescription: Water that has undergone a purification process.

D_ModifierStates.AI_Perception_Storm_Debuff-ModifierDescr: Weather is making it hard to see
D_ModifierStates.Carrying_Miasmic_Items-ModifierDescripti: While carrying diseased or infected items periodically take poison damage.
D_ModifierStates.Marked_Target-ModifierDescription: Will take additional damage from the next hit.
D_ModifierStates.Consuming_Tonic-ModifierDescription: You are currently consuming a tonic.
D_ModifierStates.Affliction_Dehydrated-ModifierDescriptio: You are dehydrated. Stamina regeneration is reduced.
D_ModifierStates.Enfeebled-ModifierDescription: You are feeling very weak. You desperately need to eat.
D_ModifierStates.Pinned-ModifierDescription: You are immobilized and cannot move.
D_ModifierStates.Affliction_Disoriented-ModifierDescripti: You are running out of oxygen ...
D_ModifierStates.Tearing_Fish-ModifierDescription: You are tearing a fish apart with your bare hands.
D_ModifierStates.Affliction_Thirsty-ModifierDescription: You are thirsty and should find water.
D_ModifierStates.Wet-ModifierDescription: You are wet and your temperature has been decreased. You take increased Electric and Frost damage.
D_ModifierStates.Wet_Expire-ModifierDescription: You are wet. You have reduced chance to be set on fire. You take increased Electric and Frost damage.
D_ModifierStates.LightStorm_MediumExposure-ModifierDescri: You move noticeably slower due to storm exposure.
D_ModifierStates.LightStorm_HeavyExposure-ModifierDescrip: You move significantly slower due to storm exposure.
D_ModifierStates.HeavyStorm_LightExposure-ModifierDescrip: You move slightly slower due to storm exposure.
D_ModifierStates.LightStorm_LightExposure-ModifierDescrip: You move slightly slower due to storm exposure.
D_ModifierStates.Lava-ModifierDescription: You should probably get out of there
D_ModifierStates.Wound-ModifierDescription: You're bleeding and no longer regenerating health. Use a basic bandage to stem the bleeding.
D_ModifierStates.AuraEffect_FrostAura-ModifierDescription: You're cold and at risk of frostbite. Speed and stamina regen are reduced. Counter with heat bandages.
D_ModifierStates.Frostnip-ModifierDescription: You're cold and at risk of frostbite. Speed and stamina regen are reduced. Counter with heat bandages.
D_ModifierStates.GrantedAura_Frostnip-ModifierDescription: You're cold and at risk of frostbite. Speed and stamina regen are reduced. Counter with heat bandages.
D_ModifierStates.Dehumidifier-ModifierDescription: You're feeling comfortable and cozy. Dried air gives you resistance to the effects of being underground.
D_ModifierStates.Cool_Comfort-ModifierDescription: You're feeling cool and cozy, increasing regeneration and increasing experience gained.
D_ModifierStates.Warm_Comfort-ModifierDescription: You're feeling warm and cozy, increasing regeneration and increasing experience gained.
D_ModifierStates.Frostbite-ModifierDescription: You're freezing and suffering frostbite. Speed and stamina regen are heavily reduced. Counter with heat bandages.
D_ModifierStates.Frostnip_Escalated-ModifierDescription: You're freezing and suffering frostbite. Speed and stamina regen are heavily reduced. Counter with heat bandages.
D_ModifierStates.Well_Rested-ModifierDescription: You're well rested, and several physical attributes are improved for a period.
D_ModifierStates.Well_Rested_Mount-ModifierDescription: You're well rested, and several physical attributes are improved for a period.
D_ModifierStates.Damage_Broken_Leg-ModifierDescription: You've sustained a broken leg due to fall damage. You will move slowly. Use a Splint to Heal.
D_ModifierStates.Damage_Broken_Leg_Minor-ModifierDescript: You've sustained a broken leg. You will move slowly. Use a Splint to Heal.
D_ModifierStates.Affliction_Overheating-ModifierDescripti: Your body temperature is rising. Thirst has increased. You need to cool down.
D_ModifierStates.Affliction_Cold-ModifierDescription: Your core temperature is dropping. Hunger has increased. You need to warm up or find shelter.
D_ModifierStates.Affliction_Hypothermia-ModifierDescripti: Your core temperature is very low. Hunger is greatly increased, and you're taking damage. Find a way to warm up fast.
D_ModifierStates.IceMammoth_Trap-ModifierDescription: Your core temperature is very low. Hunger is greatly increased, and you're taking damage. Find a way to warm up fast.
D_ModifierStates.Affliction_Heat_Overload-ModifierDescrip: Your internal temperature is too high. Your thirst rate has increased further, and you are taking damage. Find a way to cool down immediately.
D_ModifierStates.Spore_Poison-ModifierDescription: Your movement is slowed by the toxic spore.
D_ModifierStates.TempBoostFromAlcohol-ModifierDescription: Your temperature is increased for a period.

D_OptionalResourceFlows.BeehiveExtractor-DisplayedMessage: An active power connection will split Honeycomb into Beeswax and Honey
D_OptionalResourceFlows.ReinforcedGlass-DisplayedMessage: An active water connection will produce Reinforced Glass Building pieces
D_OptionalResourceFlows.PerRecipe-DisplayedMessage: Connection is only required for recipes that require this resource type
D_OptionalResourceFlows.Boost-DisplayedMessage: Connection will provide a boost to production rate / operating speed of the device

D_ProspectList.STYX_E_Research-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: Dry Ridge // BACKGROUND: The Operator intends to rapidly expand exotics operations, and has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to the development of this region. // MISSION:Operator is tasked to find damaged biological containment units, further information provided on planet. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the Contractor. Expect elevated wildlife threats.
D_ProspectList.STYX_E_Survey-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Dry Ridge // BACKGROUND: The Operator intends to rapidly expand exotics operations, and has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to the development of this region. // MISSION: Take radar scans at essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the Contractor. Expect elevated wildlife threats.
D_ProspectList.Tier5_Omni_Recovery-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: All // BACKGROUND: <REDACTED>. // MISSION: Contractors will be briefed on planet. //TERMS: Classified.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Arctic_Recovery_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: One of the Operator's field teams disappeared in the region, and failed to uplift their supply drops. The Operator places an extremely high value on the devices contained in these supply pods. // MISSION: Retrieve technological items from each supply drop, and return them to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractor knowledge of devices' identity and function is deemed unnecessary.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Canyon_Recovery_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: During a covert field test, a Larkwell drone carrying an experimental device was destroyed by severe weather. The Operator urgently requires this equipment returned. Preliminary scans suggest much of the drone's remains impacted in remote and hard-to-reach areas. // MISSION: Locate all elements of the lost device, and return them to Operator technicians in orbit. //TERMS: The Operator will provide substantial remuneration to successful contractors, but no on-the-ground support.  Expect access challenges. Equip for hot, dry conditions and sandstorms.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Canyon_Stockpile2-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: The Operator is extending an orbital station in preparation for new personnel. Requires preserved catering supplies urgently. // MISSION: Reach the loading zone, establish processing systems, and supply the requested resources. //TERMS: A cargo pod will be dispatched to your location.
D_ProspectList.Tier1_Forest_Defence-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Conifer // BACKGROUND: The operator has lost a valuable asset on the surface and cannot abandon it for fear it may be discovered by other teams. // MISSION: Locate and repair the damaged dropship and ensure its safe return to orbit. //TERMS: Flat fee. All safety and survival concerns are the responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.Tier1_Farming-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: General access for all Contractors meeting drop criteria. // MISSION: Contractor to setup an efficient farm utilizing hydroponics, fertilizer and greenhouse to deliver produce to cargo ship //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit and some equipment to get the farm underway. They will be otherwise unassisted.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Canyon_Stockpile-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Multiple // BACKGROUND: The Operator is expanding its orbital infrastructure and requires Contractors to supply materials to cargo pods landing in the region. // MISSION: Reach loading zones, establish processing systems, and load requested resources into pods. //TERMS: Three cargo pods will be dispatched to three locations.
D_ProspectList.Tier3_RiverLands_Construction-FlavourTex: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Riverlands // BACKGROUND: Field tests of advanced prospecting equipment and associated technology by the Operator have had human resource consequences. They urgently require centrally-located medical facilities for field personnel. // MISSION: Construct a basic, self-sustaining medical facility supplied from on-the-ground resources. //TERMS: All construction materials are deemed the responsibility of the Contractor. Specifications supplied.
D_ProspectList.STYX_B_Extermination-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Snowy Plateau // BACKGROUND: The ACS has an interest in setting up a permanent base in this area. // MISSION: Dispatch any hostile wildlife in the region to guarantee the safety of the new base. //TERMS: Flat fee. All safety and survival concerns are the responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.STYX_B_Stockpile-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: ACS // BIOME: Verdant Terraces // BACKGROUND: The ACS has been contacted by a wealthy individual with a special request. // MISSION: Stock a supply ship in preparation for the clients visit to the surface. //TERMS: Prospectors that meet client requirements will be well rewarded.
D_ProspectList.PRO_D_Recovery-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Ashlands // BACKGROUND: A team of prospectors were attempting to recover a vehicle left over from a terraforming construction site, and got the vehicle stranded broken down when they stumbled into the Ashlands. You need to render them urgent medical aid. // MISSION: Rescue stranded prospectors.
D_ProspectList.PRO_D_Rescue-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Ashlands // BACKGROUND: One of the team members previously incapacitated has recovered enough to tell the fate of two team members who left in search of help. They lost radio contact when the team became ill. You need to locate and recover them. // MISSION: Rescue stranded prospectors.
D_ProspectList.PRO_D_Resupply-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Ashlands // BACKGROUND: The Recovery Team, now healed need assistance to help get the old mining truck moving. Render assistance as required. // MISSION: Delivery Supplies to the Recovery Crew.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Canyon_Construction_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: Operator is increasing their presence on Icarus and requires basic hunting infrastructure for service personnel. // MISSION: Construct a basic hunting base to Operator specifications. //TERMS: Flat fee. All resources and construction materials responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Desert_Construction_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: Operator is increasing their research investment on Icarus, and requires advanced infrastructure for personnel in the region. // MISSION: Construct an fully-powered base to Operator specifications. //TERMS: Flat fee. All resources and construction materials responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.Tier1_Forest_Extermination_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: As the Operator increases its investment in Icarus, advance teams are reporting encounters with extremely hostile wildlife. Human resources losses have been non-negligible. Behaviour patterns suggest hyper-aggressive animals. // MISSION: Track down and eliminate the creatures with extreme prejudice. //TERMS: This is not a scientific mission. Anything less than termination will be regarded as a forfeiture of contract.
D_ProspectList.Tier1_Forest_Construction-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: Operator is hosting a VIP investment on Icarus, and requires advanced infrastructure for their guests in the region. // MISSION: Construct a fully equipped base to Operator specifications. //TERMS: Flat fee. All resources and construction materials responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.PRO_E_Research-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Ice Sheet // BACKGROUND: A single drifter has been spotted in the Ice Sheet region. // MISSION: Construct monitoring pylon, await further instructions. //TERMS: Relative safety is assumed. Environment and wildlife dangers not factored.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Glacier_Extraction_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Southern Glacier // BACKGROUND: The Assembly is accelerating its program on Icarus, and claims to have reliable methods for locating exotics deposits. They wish to test their prediction models through exploration, with data indicating a cave system in the region is a likely (+85%) site. // MISSION: Confirm the location of the exotics vein, harvest its contents, and return them to orbit. //TERMS: Manual extraction, rather than full-scale automation, is acceptable, as no equipment will be supplied.
D_ProspectList.PRO_C_Construction-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: African Assembly // BIOME: Swamp // BACKGROUND: The Operator is interested in potential habitation. // MISSION: Construct a living dwelling high in the treetops //TERMS: Flat fee. This section of the Terrazone is exempt from Contractor Insurance claims, proceed with caution.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Arctic_Extermination_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: First Cohort teams have experienced a concerning spike in fatalities, with  reports of encounters with over-sized, highly aggressive animals. UDA's Icarus research unit, Group 15, believes exotics may affect the growth and behavior of Earthlife - notably in mountain regions, where high geological activity increases exposure to these materials. Larger animals are believed to be more strongly affected. // MISSION: Group 15 require a biological sample for study, from the largest Earthlife on Icarus - a mammoth's tusk. //TERMS: The Arctic is under-surveyed, so teams will be dropped into mapped areas, then trek into the region to locate a target. This contract is rated moderate to high risk with strong storms, blizzards and very limited support planetside.
D_ProspectList.PRO_Story_6-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: Basalt Expansion // BACKGROUND: The Operator has set a bounty on the terrorist disrupting their operations. // MISSION: Capture or eliminate the criminal using any force neccessary. //TERMS: Flat fee. This contract is considered Top Secret and may only be discussed with your exclusive Group 15 handler. Any deviation from this will result in immediate explusion from Icarus operations.
D_ProspectList.PRO_Story_2-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: Grassy Plains // BACKGROUND: The Operator has sent out a call to all local contractors to conduct a search for a suspected criminal. // MISSION: Search the area for any trace of the suspect and send all evidence back to the Operator via O.E.S. //TERMS: Flat fee. This section of the Terrazone is exempt from Contractor Insurance claims, proceed with caution.
D_ProspectList.PRO_Story_5-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: Marshlands // BACKGROUND: The Operator has received intel on the wanted criminal's most recent location. // MISSION: Infiltrate the criminal's safehouse and send all evidence back to the Operator via O.E.S. Permission to eliminate the target has been granted by Group 15 authorities. //TERMS: Flat fee. This contract is considered Classified and may only be discussed with your exclusive Group 15 handler. Any deviation from this will result in immediate explusion from future missions with the Operator.
D_ProspectList.STYX_D_Research_2-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: Ring Lake // BACKGROUND: Unique ore deposit discovered on Ring Lake. // MISSION: Extract and research unusual ore. Monitor effects on environment. Extract. //TERMS: Initial scans detect unstable material. Proceed with caution.
D_ProspectList.Tier3_RiverLands_Delivery-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: Riverlands // BACKGROUND: In contravention of general UDA regulations, Uniao has continued to experiment with terraforming technology on Icarus. The Operator believes there may be a lost supply pod in the region, containing prototype Inaris bio-flechettes. Intelligence suggests the contents are EXTREMELY volatile. // MISSION: Retrieve the bio-flechette and return it to orbit before Uniao intercedes. //TERMS: The flechette's temperature must remain stable at all times.
D_ProspectList.Tier3_RiverLands_Research_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: Riverlands // BACKGROUND: The Operator is extremely interested in non-Earth-origin biota appearing in the terrazone. This is occuring with greater frequency, and the Operator places a high value on data that may shed light on this phenomenon. // MISSION: Procure samples rumored to be emerging in this zone, and return them to orbit. //TERMS: While the Operator prefers to undertake this work themselves, recent personnel loses have forced them to outsource.
D_ProspectList.PRO_Story_4-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: Rolling Tundra // BACKGROUND: The Operator has received a missing persons report from one of their strike teams on-planet. // MISSION: Travel to the last known location of the team and ensure their safe return to orbit. //TERMS: Flat fee. This contract is considered Classified and may only be discussed with Group 15 handlers. Any deviation from this will result in immediate explusion from future missions with the Operator.
D_ProspectList.PRO_Story_3-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15 // BIOME: The Pillars // BACKGROUND: The Operator has received new information regarding the suspected criminal. // MISSION: Follow the latest trail of the suspect and send all evidence back to the Operator via O.E.S. //TERMS: Flat fee. This section of the Terrazone is exempt from Contractor Insurance claims, proceed with caution.
D_ProspectList.Tier3_RiverLands_Extraction-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Group 15// BIOME: Riverlands // BACKGROUND: After extensive geo-surveys, the Operator's research teams now believe this region is rich in metal deposits. They are one of only a handful of groups with a UDA-vetted export license for raw matter. // MISSION: Using prototype equipment, locate and extract raw materials from this region. These must then be delivered to the Operator's representatives in orbit. //TERMS: All safety concerns are the responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.ELY_SQ_Ambush-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: Make contact with the Black Market// MISSION: Orders will be delivered on planet. //TERMS: All actual and conceptual risks and responsibilities are accepted by the Contractor alone.

D_ProspectList.Tier2_Canyon_Expedition_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Group // BIOME: Riverlands/Canyons // BACKGROUND: Recent attempts to open a route to the Canyons region have failed, but reports of a subterranean cave network seem promising. Previous exploration teams have not returned, yet provided intel on the network's approximate location. // MISSION: Find a way into the Canyons though the cave network, to open the Canyons for prospecting. //TERMS: The Operator will supply drilling equipment to clear underground impediments, but all fuelling and other infrastructure is the sole responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Glacier_Recovery_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Group // BIOME: Southern Glacier // BACKGROUND: When terraforming failed, the UDA tried to put the political and environmental catastrophe behind them, mothballing the Inaris-designed atmospheric processing satellites. A decade on, these orbital bio-factories are de-orbiting. The UDA wants no more scandals. // MISSION: Recover the enzyme 'warheads' from three crashed Inaris satellites, before anyone else can. //TERMS: Geo-data in this region is unavailable, so your team will be inserted at a known drop point. At least two of the satellites impacted in the arctic. Expect a demanding journey, heavy weather, sub-zero temperatures, and fierce wildlife.
D_ProspectList.STYX_A_Extermination-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: All // BACKGROUND: Icarus's native scorpion is an enduring threat to operations in all regions. However, it may have value as a resource for new recipes in development. // MISSION: Track the creature to its origin, and destroy it. Contribute to research on its materials before returning to orbit. //TERMS: Risk assessment for this contract is judged as extreme. Experienced Contractors only.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Arctic_Scan_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: The Operator has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to development of this planet. // MISSION: Take radar scans at three essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Arctic_Expedition_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: The remote arctic remains one of the last uncharted realms of the terrazone. Exotics demand is accelerating, and the UDA is demanding access for development. Current data suggests major avalanche obstacles. // MISSION: Use advanced mining equipment to clear a path to the artic and open the region for prospecting. //TERMS: The Operator will supply ice cutting equipment, but all power and operational requirements are the responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Canyon_Scan_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: The Operator has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to development of this planet. // MISSION: Take radar scans at three essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Desert_Extermination_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: Icarus's native sandworm is an enduring threat to UDA operations in this region of the terrazone. It cannot be permitted to impede development any further. // MISSION: Track the creature to its origin, and destroy it. //TERMS: Risk assessment for this contract is judged extreme. Experienced Contractors only.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Desert_Scan_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: The Operator has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. D_ProspectList.Tier4_Desert_Expedition_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: When the Lagos Unit approved a drop into uncharted territory for Group 15, the drop failed. The craft was lost. Data on the dropship's fate is urgently required before the region can be opened to general prospecting. // MISSION: Track the dropship's remains, and discover what happened to the mission. //TERMS: Modelling indicates unknown threats.
D_ProspectList.Tier1_Forest_Scan_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: The Operator intends to rapidly expand exotics operations, and has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to development of this planet. // MISSION: Take radar scans at three essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the Contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.
D_ProspectList.Tier3_RiverLands_Scan_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Riverlands // BACKGROUND: The Operator has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. This exploration and mapping mission is critical to development of this planet. // MISSION: Take radar scans at three essential locations, ensuring accurate data is returned to the Operator. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with radar equipment. All other risk and resourcing is the responsibility of the contractor. Expect elevated wildlife and weather threats.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Glacier_Expedition_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Southern Glacier // BACKGROUND: In the aftermath of terraforming, Icarus weather systems descended into chaos. Worst hit was the now-arctic regions, where environmental shifts have triggered endless storm patterns, rendering the zone almost inaccessible. The Operator, however, believes they can disrupt the storm using an experimental Group 15-designed sonic device. // MISSION: Retrieve the device, deploy at the trigger zone and end the storm to - maybe - unlock this region. //TERMS: The Contractor acknowledges and undertakes all risks associated with travel into an unexplored zone.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Glacier_Scan_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Southern Glacier // BACKGROUND: The Operator intends to rapidly expand exotics operations, and has put out an urgent tender for survey data, specifically around new drop sites. D_ProspectList.Tier3_RiverLands_Expedition_0-FlavourTex: //OPERATOR: Lagos Unit // BIOME: Various // BACKGROUND: The Riverlands biome offers rich new prospecting grounds, but has remained largely unexplored due to its remote and inaccessible location. // MISSION: Find a way into the Riverlands, and erect a locational beacon so UDA can begin scaling up development of this region. //TERMS: The Contractor acknowledges and undertakes all risks associated with travel into an unexplored zone. Large scale construction may be required to surmount geographic obstacles.
