D_ProspectList.Tier5_Omni_Olympus-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: All // BACKGROUND: Operator is focussing on terrain data acquisition // MISSION: Contractors are required to power and activate a central scanning device. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit. They will be otherwise unassisted.
D_ProspectList.Tier5_Omni_Research_2-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: Operator is focussing on animal research to gather information about potential exotic mutation // MISSION: Contractors are required to retrieve a sample from specific preserved creatures. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit. They will be otherwise unassisted.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Glacier_Research_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: Operator satellite data shows unusual bio-growth patterns emerging in several regions of the Terrazone. Bot image analysis indicates previously unknown plant life, and Sinotai's bio-research division requires samples for further study. // MISSION: Locate and retrieve bio-samples from three marked locations, and return them safely to orbit. //TERMS: All physical, mental and existential risks and responsibilities are accepted by the contractor alone.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Arctic_Stockpile-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Arctic // BACKGROUND: The Operator is extending an orbital station in preparation for new personnel. Requires raw materials urgently. // MISSION: Reach loading zones, establish processing systems, and supply pods with requested resources. //TERMS: Cargo pods will be dispatched to two locations.
D_ProspectList.PRO_D_Research-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Ashlands // BACKGROUND: Additional testing has been approved in the isolated Ashlands region. // MISSION: Create chemical compound as guided, deploy and observe. //TERMS: Compound not confirmed safe for exposure. Contractor safety not guaranteed.
D_ProspectList.Tier2_Canyon_Survey_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Canyons // BACKGROUND: Operator is researching exotics formation and requires detailed geological survey data from the Canyons region. // MISSION: Establish geo-stations at two survey locations. Construction to elevate survey stations to line-of-sight altitude may be required. //TERMS: Operator will provide survey equipment, but the Contractor is responsible for ensuring its safety.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Desert_Research_2-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: Operator is increasing their planetary research using all available technology // MISSION: Contractors are required to fill and activate a sample analyzer in order to research new recipes derived from native resources. //TERMS: Contractors will be provided with a functioning envirosuit. They will be otherwise unassisted.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Desert_Recovery-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: Sinotai has been conducting a closely guarded experiment regarding potential exotic mutation that may be deemed unethical if made public. // MISSION: Locate biological containment units and then destroy the evidence. //TERMS: Flat fee. All safety and survival concerns are the responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Desert_Recovery_2-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: Sinotai has been conducting experimentation and domestication of local wildlife. // MISSION: Locate the lost animals and return them into Sinotai custody. //TERMS: Flat fee. All safety and survival concerns are the responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Desert_Extermination_2-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: Sinotai's previous experiment was not completely erased, traces of bio-research still persist on the surface. // MISSION: Locate the remaining creatures and eliminate them. //TERMS: Flat fee. All safety and survival concerns are the responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.Tier4_Desert_Research_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Desert // BACKGROUND: The geology of Icarus appears to move more swiftly than Earth's. Operator requires samples of unusual geo-forms appearing in this region, following terraforming's failure. // MISSION: Locate and collect geological samples and return them to orbit safely. //TERMS: Flat fee. All safety and survival concerns are the responsibility of the Contractor.
D_ProspectList.OLY_SQ_Farmer-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: Help the Cultivation Specialist Set Up Camp. // MISSION: Orders will be delivered on planet. //TERMS: All actual and conceptual risks and responsibilities are accepted by the Contractor alone.
D_ProspectList.STYX_SQ_Farmer-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: Help the Cultivation Specialist Set Up Camp. // MISSION: Orders will be delivered on planet. //TERMS: All actual and conceptual risks and responsibilities are accepted by the Contractor alone.
D_ProspectList.Tier1_Forest_Research_0-FlavourText: //OPERATOR: Sinotai // BIOME: Forest // BACKGROUND: Reports of non-terrestrial plant life in the terrazone has sparked a bio-rush. D_ProspectList.Outpost_012-FlavourText: Aquatica Isle may look like a tropical sanctuary, but its quiet beaches and cascading waterfalls mask a wilderness that doesn't give up its secrets easily. Beneath the lush canopy lies a tangle of hazards and hidden threats, daring only the boldest prospectors to claim it.
D_ProspectList.Outpost008_Arctic-FlavourText: Arcticus is a realm of endless white, where biting winds whip across ice fields and snow-covered peaks hide secrets beneath the frozen surface. Every step is a challenge, and only those prepared for isolation and danger will uncover what lies beneath the frost.

D_ProspectList.Outpost007_Desert-FlavourText: Cactus is a scorching desert that spreads as far as the eye can see, with jagged canyons, sunbaked plateaus, and sparse water sources. Survival here demands cunning and resilience, making every discovery a hard-won triumph in the unforgiving heat.
D_ProspectList.ELY_SQ_Fish-Description: Capture fish for EDEN and Participate in the Contest
D_ProspectList.OpenWorld_Styx-FlavourText: Centered around a braided river, Styx is a previously off-limits area of Icarus, with reports of unnatural growth rates and mutations in the planet's wildlife. Balance risk with reward across arid, freezing, and deceivingly pleasant climates. Be one of the first to overcome the dangers.
D_ProspectList.GH_RG_O1-Description: DEVELOP AND TEST NEW WEAPONS AGAINST THE THREAT

D_ProspectList.Outpost002_Forest-FlavourText: Endless green stretches as far as the eye can see, with ancient trees, moss-covered rocks, and hidden streams shaping a living, breathing wilderness. The forest invites explorers to carve out their place among its secrets, offering both shelter and challenge in equal measure.
D_ProspectList.Outpost006_Forest-FlavourText: Everbark is a seemingly endless forest that stretches in every direction, its thick canopy hiding twisting trails, shadowed glades, and secrets waiting to be uncovered. Every step could lead to discovery-or danger-as the wild heart of the forest tests those bold enough to venture within.

D_ProspectList.Outpost009_IceVolcano-FlavourText: Frostfall is a dramatic collision of fire and ice, where lava rivers pour into frozen lakes and steam rises against howling blizzards. At its heart looms an active volcano, its vast network of caves alive with danger and rich resources, offering both peril and promise to those bold enough to explore.

D_TimelineRanks.Level1Unlock-TooltipText: Learn to survive in the wilderness of Icarus. Explore more docile parts of the planet, but the danger is still real.
D_TimelineRanks.ReducedPlanetaryRestrictions-TooltipText: New regions of Icarus are available, but failed terraforming has left some regions far more dangerous than others. Expect greater challenges to your survival.
D_TimelineRanks.RemovedAllPlanetaryRestrictions-TooltipT: The entire terrazone of Icarus is opened to you. Extreme storms can threaten the strongest bases, and savage predators roam freely.
D_TimelineRanks.FactionContracts-TooltipText: With experience under your belt, take on challenging contracts from competing factions with high rewards.
D_TimelineRanks.HarsherEnvironments-TooltipText: You can now sign up for contracts that expose you to severe weather conditions, putting your shelter and safety at risk.
D_TimelineRanks.RemoteProspects-TooltipText: You have proven your ability to survive on Icarus, and may now take contracts in areas where orbital coverage is limited. Very little is known about the terraforming in these zones. Do not expect drop pod respawns, and attempting these prospects alone is not recommended.
D_TimelineRanks.ExoticProspecting-TooltipText: You now have access to freelance prospects. Explore for exotics, undertaking vast journeys, where your survival is not guaranteed.

SettingsSchema.Display-Ray Tracing-[DNT] Debug Force Op: (Debug) Forces Opaque Materials when Casting Rays. Can be used to significantly increase the performance of RT by ignoring transparency
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Terrain Deformation (Exp: (Experimental) Enable terrain deformation to be applied to the landscape for objects that intersect the tessellated geometry
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Save Game Frequency-Des: (Host only) Controls how many minutes between autosaves
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Large Stones Respawn-De: (Host only) Large stones respawn during load
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Fiber Foliage Respawn-D: (Host only, Open World Only) Fibrous plants respawn during load
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Pause Game in Escape Me: (Single-player only) Whether the game should automatically pause when Escape Menu is opened
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Post Processing-Descript: Adjust the quality of various visual effects like Ambient Occlusion, Bloom, Depth of Field and more
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Interact Timer Length-D: Adjusts the time (in seconds) required to hold Alternate Interact
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Show Lightning Effects-: Allows lightning strikes to use lights and particle effects which may be bright and sudden
SettingsSchema.Controls-Keybindings-Actions-Description: Alter your keybindings for actions in-game
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Anti-Aliasing-Descriptio: Anti-aliasing provides a smoother looking image with less jagged edges
SettingsSchema.Display-Video-Field Of View-Description: Change the default field of view
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-User Interface-Display Temperat: Choose either Celsius or Fahrenheit to display temperature in
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Contact Shadows-Descript: Contact Shadows are an inexpensive method of rendering shadows but they are limited in that they are screenspace and low quality
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Shadows-Description: Controls the distance, resolution and overall quality of Shadows (High Impact)
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Max Shadow Cascades-Desc: Controls the number of shadow cascades used to calculate dynamics shadows, dropping this will greatly improve shadow performance at the cost of quality
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Screen Hit Effects Stre: Controls the strength of the screen effects when hitting a target, or being hit
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Disable Deployable Came: Disables rotating the camera to view the deployable when interacting
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Limit Poolsize To VRAM-D: Disabling this on low-end GPUs with not enough memory may alleviate blurry textures
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Light Shadows-Descriptio: Disabling this will turn off shadows on all light sources, except sun light. This can have a big performance impact
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Killcam-Description: Enable Killcam sequences on possible ranged attacks
SettingsSchema.Display-Ray Tracing-RT Shadows-Descripti: Enable Raytraced Shadows (for lights that support them)
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Show Screenshake-Descri: Enable shaking of the 1st/3rd person camera
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Volumetric Clouds-Descri: Enables rendering of volumetric clouds. This can be expensive on older hardware.
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Use Simple Building Shad: Enables simple shadow geometry on buildings, and disables detailed shadows on the standard building geometry.
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Show Blood Effects-Desc: Enables the showing of blood and gore effects
SettingsSchema.Display-NVIDIA DLSS-Frame Generation-Req: Ensure DLSS 3 is supported on your current system (Check Hardware-accelerated GPU scheduling is enabled in Windows)
Ensure current GPU drivers are up to date
Ensure you are running in DX12 mode
SettingsSchema.Display-Ray Tracing-Ambient Occlusion-Re: Ensure you are running in DX12 mode and your card supports RT (RTX 20 series and higher, AMD RX 6000 series and higher)
SettingsSchema.Display-Ray Tracing-Global Illumination-: Ensure you are running in DX12 mode and your card supports RT (RTX 20 series and higher, AMD RX 6000 series and higher)
SettingsSchema.Display-Ray Tracing-RT Shadows-Requireme: Ensure you are running in DX12 mode and your card supports RT (RTX 20 series and higher, AMD RX 6000 series and higher)
SettingsSchema.Display-Ray Tracing-RTX Enabled-Requirem: Ensure you are running in DX12 mode and your card supports RT (RTX 20 series and higher, AMD RX 6000 series and higher)
SettingsSchema.Display-Ray Tracing-Reflections-Requirem: Ensure you are running in DX12 mode and your card supports RT (RTX 20 series and higher, AMD RX 6000 series and higher)
SettingsSchema.Display-Ray Tracing-Skylight Shadows-Req: Ensure you are running in DX12 mode and your card supports RT (RTX 20 series and higher, AMD RX 6000 series and higher)
SettingsSchema.Display-Ray Tracing-[DNT] Debug Force Op: Ensure you are running in DX12 mode and your card supports RT (RTX 20 series and higher, AMD RX 6000 series and higher)
SettingsSchema.Display-NVIDIA DLSS-Frame Generation-Req: Ensure your card supports NVIDIA DLSS 3 (GeForce RTX 40 Series and higher NVIDIA graphics cards)
SettingsSchema.Display-NVIDIA Reflex-NVIDIA Reflex Low: Ensure your card supports NVIDIA Reflex (GeForce GTX 900 and higher NVIDIA graphics cards)
SettingsSchema.Display-NVIDIA DLSS-Frame Generation-Req: Ensure your installation of Windows is up to date
SettingsSchema.Display-NVIDIA DLSS-Frame Generation-Des: Frame Generation boosts frame rates by using AI to render additional frames. This feature requires a GeForce RTX 40 Series graphics card
SettingsSchema.Frame-Generation-Description: Frame Generation boosts frame rates by using AI to render additional frames. This feature requires a GeForce RTX 40 Series graphics card
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-User Interface-Disable Map Sele: Hides the difficulty warning message that shows when selecting prospects on maps other than Olympus
SettingsSchema.Controls-General-Crouch Ledge Safety-Des: If enabled, Player will not be able to move over a ledge while crouched
SettingsSchema.Controls-General-Invert Y Axis-Descripti: Invert look rotation on the Y axis
SettingsSchema.Controls-General-Mouse Sensitivity X-Des: Mouse sensitivity on the horizontal axis
SettingsSchema.Controls-General-Mouse Sensitivity Y-Des: Mouse sensitivity on the vertical axis
SettingsSchema.Display-NVIDIA Reflex-NVIDIA Reflex Low: NVIDIA Reflex reduces system latency and increases PC responsiveness
SettingsSchema.Reflex-Description: NVIDIA Reflex reduces system latency and increases PC responsiveness
SettingsSchema.Display-NVIDIA Reflex-NVIDIA Reflex Low: NVIDIA Reflex setting cannot be changed while Frame Generation is enabled (forced ON)
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Shadow Filter Method-Des: PCF can be used to alleviate grainy looking shadows when DLSS/FSR is disabled. PCSS (default) should be used in conjunction with DLSS/FSR.
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-User Interface-Crosshair Color-: Select from a variety of crosshair color options
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-User Interface-Crosshair Style-: Select from a variety of crosshair style options
SettingsSchema.Display-Video-Motion Blur-Description: Set the amount of motion blur
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Textures-Description: Set this based on your Video Card Memory. Low: 2GB, Med: 3GB, High: 4.5GB, Epic: 8GB+
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Skybox Quality-Descripti: Sets how much detail is applied to the sky.
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Foliage-Description: Sets the density, and adjusts LOD switching distance for foliage
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-View Distance-Descriptio: Sets the distance at which objects will be visible
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Shading-Description: Sets the quality of hair shading
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Effects-Description: Sets the quality of things like Reflections and Atmospheric Effects
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Disable Grass Shadows-De: Setting this to On will disable shadows on Grass (and similar) objects. This should have a relatively low performance impact
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Show Deployable Shelter: Show an on-screen warning when trying to place a structure that is affected by a lack of shelter
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-User Interface-Display Health N: Show the players health value on top of health bars
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Show Tutorial Prospect-: Shows the Tutorial Prospect screen for new characters
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Multiplayer Ghost Build: Shows the transparent ghosts of other players placing buildings and deployables
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-User Interface-Skip Startup Mov: Skip showing of startup movies when launching Icarus. A black screen will be displayed until game finishes loading
SettingsSchema.Display-NVIDIA DLSS-Super Resolution-Des: Super Resolution boosts frame rates by rendering fewer pixels and using AI to output high resolution frames. This feature requires a GeForce RTX graphics card
SettingsSchema.Super-Resolution-Description: Super Resolution boosts frame rates by rendering fewer pixels and using AI to output high resolution frames. This feature requires a GeForce RTX graphics card
SettingsSchema.Display-Video-VSync-Description: Synchronize frame-rate to your refresh rate
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Tessellation-Description: Tessellation improves landscape visuals, providing more height variation and surface detail
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-User Interface-Blueprint Toolti: The Blueprint unlock screen tooltips use a several second opening animation
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-User Interface-Workshop Tooltip: The Workshop tooltips use a several second opening animation
SettingsSchema.Display-Quality-Texture Streaming Poolsi: This is the size in MB of your Texture Pool. Increasing will use more VRAM but reduce texture popping. Set this based on your Video Card Memory. Low: 2000, Med: 3000, High: 4500, Epic: 8000+
SettingsSchema.Display-Video-Resolution Scale-Descripti: This setting scales the resolution of the world rendering independently from the UI
SettingsSchema.Controls-General-Sprint Cancel Reload-De: When set, reloading of magazine weapons can be cancelled by sprinting
SettingsSchema.Gameplay-General-Show Only My Damage Num: Will hide damage numbers from other players if set to True
SettingsSchema.Display-Window-ConfirmMessage: Would you like to apply these display changes?

ST_Beta.ForestDescription: Build, hunt, explore and gain valuable experience in the forest biome during our first beta weekend.
ST_Beta.DesertTitle: From one extreme to the other
ST_Beta.ArcticTitle: Get ready to brace the ice
ST_Beta.CommunityDescription: Join a range of community competitions and challenges in our seventh beta weekend.
ST_Beta.ArcticDescription: Preparation is essential before you venture into the arctic biome for the first time. Battle fiercer wildlife and subzero temperatures in our third beta weekend.
ST_Beta.MissionsDesciption: Take on missions offered by the corporations vying for control of Icarus. Balance the risks with the rewards as you discover more of Icarus' secrets.
ST_Beta.DesertDescription: Take your newfound experience into the desert biome. The arid sands and canyons are full of riches but light on resources to sustain life.
ST_Beta.StormsDescription: The base building skills you learnt in the first beta weekend will be put to the test as storms damage your structures and you scramble to find or build shelter.
ST_Beta.W4Description: Warm up for faction missions with an epic three-part journey across Icarus. Retrieve lost UDA terraforming technology with the power to warp worlds.

ST_Prospect.NewGameTutorialPrompt:
Welcome to Icarus.

There are 3 main modes of play within Icarus: Missions, Open World, and Outposts.

Missions are the classic way to play Icarus, with a series of objectives and a finite timeframe.

Open World is a persistent survival experience with no time restrictions, the ability to engage in dynamic SMPL3 missions, and a subset of our classic missions offered on-planet as Operations.

Outposts are persistent worlds on a smaller scale, allowing dynamic SMPL3 missions.

ST_Quests.Lab_Poster_A:
1. Collect Scalpel
2. Collect Tissue Sample
3. Homogenise Sample
4. Add Tris-EDTA
5. Mix Solution Thoroughly
6. Heat Solution
7. Separate Supernatant & Debris
8. Add Ethanol
9. Separate DNA from Solution
10. Confirm Sample

Once you place the C0NT4CT Device you can view available Campaigns, and start a Great Hunt Campaign specific to your area.
